    2: Write-Host "=== DEPLOIEMENT COMPLET DES SOUS-AGENTS ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
    3: Write-Host "Date: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')" -ForegroundColor Gray
    4: Write-Host ""
    5: 
    6: $projectPath = "$env:USERPROFILE\Projects\SmartContractPipeline"
    7: Set-Location $projectPath
    8: 
    9: # Liste de tous les sous-agents √† cr√©er
   10: $subAgents = @(
   11:     @{Parent="architect"; Name="cloud_architect"; Type="Cloud Architecture"},
   12:     @{Parent="architect"; Name="blockchain_architect"; Type="Blockchain Architecture"},
   13:     @{Parent="architect"; Name="microservices_architect"; Type="Microservices Architecture"},
   14: 
   15:     @{Parent="coder"; Name="backend_coder"; Type="Backend Development"},
   16:     @{Parent="coder"; Name="frontend_coder"; Type="Frontend Development"},
   17:     @{Parent="coder"; Name="devops_coder"; Type="DevOps"},
   18: 
   19:     @{Parent="smart_contract"; Name="solidity_expert"; Type="Solidity Development"},
   20:     @{Parent="smart_contract"; Name="security_expert"; Type="Smart Contract Security"},
   21:     @{Parent="smart_contract"; Name="gas_optimizer"; Type="Gas Optimization"},
   22:     @{Parent="smart_contract"; Name="formal_verification"; Type="Formal Verification"},
   23: 
   24:     @{Parent="frontend_web3"; Name="react_expert"; Type="React/Next.js"},
   25:     @{Parent="frontend_web3"; Name="web3_integration"; Type="Web3 Integration"},
   26:     @{Parent="frontend_web3"; Name="ui_ux_expert"; Type="UI/UX Design"},
   27: 
   28:     @{Parent="tester"; Name="unit_tester"; Type="Unit Testing"},
   29:     @{Parent="tester"; Name="integration_tester"; Type="Integration Testing"},
   30:     @{Parent="tester"; Name="e2e_tester"; Type="E2E Testing"},
   31:     @{Parent="tester"; Name="fuzzing_expert"; Type="Fuzzing"}
   32: )
   33: 
   34: Write-Host "1. CREATION DE LA STRUCTURE DES SOUS-AGENTS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
   35: 
   36: foreach ($subAgent in $subAgents) {
   37:     $parentDir = "$projectPath\agents\$($subAgent.Parent)\sous_agents"
   38:     $agentDir = "$parentDir\$($subAgent.Name)"
   39: 
   40:     # Cr√©er le dossier du sous-agent
   41:     New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $agentDir -Force | Out-Null
   42: 
   43:     # Cr√©er les fichiers de base
   44:     $files = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py", "__init__.py")
   45:     foreach ($file in $files) {
   46:         $filePath = "$agentDir\$file"
   47:         if (-not (Test-Path $filePath)) {
   48:             New-Item -ItemType File -Path $filePath -Force | Out-Null
   49:         }
   50:     }
   51: 
   52:     Write-Host "   ‚úÖ $($subAgent.Parent)/$($subAgent.Name) ($($subAgent.Type))" -ForegroundColor Green
   53: }
   54: 
   55: # 2. Cr√©er les fichiers __init__.py pour l'import
   56: Write-Host "`n2. CONFIGURATION DES IMPORTS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
   57: 
   58: foreach ($parent in @("architect", "coder", "smart_contract", "frontend_web3", "tester")) {
   59:     $initFile = "$projectPath\agents\$parent\sous_agents\__init__.py"
   60: 
   61:     $imports = @'
   62: # Import des sous-agents
   63: try:
   64:     from .cloud_architect import CloudArchitectSubAgent
   65:     from .blockchain_architect import BlockchainArchitectSubAgent
   66:     from .microservices_architect import MicroservicesArchitectSubAgent
   67: except ImportError as e:
   68:     print(f"Erreur d'import des sous-agents: {e}")
   69: 
   70: __all__ = [
   71:     "CloudArchitectSubAgent",
   72:     "BlockchainArchitectSubAgent",
   73:     "MicroservicesArchitectSubAgent"
   74: ]
   75: '@
   76: 
   77:     # Adapter les imports selon le parent
   78:     if ($parent -eq "coder") {
   79:         $imports = $imports.Replace("cloud_architect", "backend_coder")
   80:         $imports = $imports.Replace("blockchain_architect", "frontend_coder")
   81:         $imports = $imports.Replace("microservices_architect", "devops_coder")
   82:         $imports = $imports.Replace("CloudArchitectSubAgent", "BackendCoderSubAgent")
   83:         $imports = $imports.Replace("BlockchainArchitectSubAgent", "FrontendCoderSubAgent")
   84:         $imports = $imports.Replace("MicroservicesArchitectSubAgent", "DevOpsCoderSubAgent")
   85:     }
   86: 
   87:     $imports | Out-File -FilePath $initFile -Force -Encoding UTF8
   88:     Write-Host "   ‚úÖ $parent/__init__.py cr√©√©" -ForegroundColor Green
   89: }
   90: 
   91: # 3. Mettre √† jour l'agent parent pour g√©rer les sous-agents
   92: Write-Host "`n3. MISE A JOUR DES AGENTS PARENTS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
   93: 
   94: foreach ($parent in @("architect", "coder", "smart_contract", "frontend_web3", "tester")) {
   95:     $parentAgentFile = "$projectPath\agents\$parent\agent.py"
   96: 
   97:     if (Test-Path $parentAgentFile) {
   98:         $parentCode = Get-Content $parentAgentFile -Raw
   99: 
  100:         # Ajouter la gestion des sous-agents
  101:         $subAgentManagement = @'
  102: 
  103:     # Gestion des sous-agents
  104:     def __init__(self, config_path: str):
  105:         super().__init__(config_path)
  106:         self.sub_agents = {}
  107:         self._initialize_sub_agents()
  108: 
  109:     def _initialize_sub_agents(self):
  110:         """Initialise les sous-agents sp√©cialis√©s"""
  111:         try:
  112:             from .sous_agents import *
  113: 
  114:             # Cr√©ation dynamique des sous-agents bas√©e sur la configuration
  115:             sub_agent_configs = self.config.get("sub_agents", {})
  116: 
  117:             for agent_name, agent_config in sub_agent_configs.items():
  118:                 agent_class_name = f"{agent_name.capitalize().replace('_', '')}SubAgent"
  119:                 agent_class = globals().get(agent_class_name)
  120: 
  121:                 if agent_class:
  122:                     sub_agent = agent_class(agent_config.get("config_path", ""))
  123:                     self.sub_agents[agent_name] = sub_agent
  124:                     self.logger.info(f"Sous-agent {agent_name} initialis√©")
  125:                 else:
  126:                     self.logger.warning(f"Classe non trouv√©e pour le sous-agent {agent_name}")
  127: 
  128:         except ImportError as e:
  129:             self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors de l'import des sous-agents: {e}")
  130: 
  131:     async def delegate_to_sub_agent(self, task_type: str, task_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  132:         """D√©l√®gue une t√¢che √† un sous-agent appropri√©"""
  133:         # Logique de routage vers le bon sous-agent
  134:         sub_agent_mapping = self.config.get("sub_agent_mapping", {})
  135: 
  136:         for pattern, agent_name in sub_agent_mapping.items():
  137:             if task_type.startswith(pattern):
  138:                 if agent_name in self.sub_agents:
  139:                     self.logger.info(f"D√©l√©gation de la t√¢che {task_type} au sous-agent {agent_name}")
  140:                     return await self.sub_agents[agent_name].execute(task_data, {})
  141: 
  142:         # Fallback: utiliser l'agent principal
  143:         self.logger.info(f"Aucun sous-agent trouv√© pour {task_type}, utilisation de l'agent principal")
  144:         return await self.execute(task_data, {})
  145: 
  146:     async def get_sub_agents_status(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  147:         """Retourne le statut de tous les sous-agents"""
  148:         status = {}
  149: 
  150:         for agent_name, agent_instance in self.sub_agents.items():
  151:             try:
  152:                 health = await agent_instance.health_check()
  153:                 status[agent_name] = {
  154:                     "status": health.get("status", "unknown"),
  155:                     "agent_info": agent_instance.get_agent_info()
  156:                 }
  157:             except Exception as e:
  158:                 status[agent_name] = {
  159:                     "status": "error",
  160:                     "error": str(e)
  161:                 }
  162: 
  163:         return {
  164:             "total_sub_agents": len(self.sub_agents),
  165:             "sub_agents": status
  166:         }
  167: '@
  168: 
  169:         # Ins√©rer apr√®s la classe BaseAgent
  170:         if ($parentCode -match "class.*Agent\(BaseAgent\):") {
  171:             $modifiedCode = $parentCode -replace "(class.*Agent\(BaseAgent\):[\s\S]*?)(def __init__)", "`$1$subAgentManagement`n`n    `$2"
  172:             $modifiedCode | Out-File -FilePath $parentAgentFile -Force -Encoding UTF8
  173:             Write-Host "   ‚úÖ $parent/agent.py mis √† jour avec la gestion des sous-agents" -ForegroundColor Green
  174:         }
  175:     }
  176: }
  177: 
  178: # 4. Cr√©er les configurations de mapping
  179: Write-Host "`n4. CREATION DES CONFIGURATIONS DE MAPPING..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  180: 
  181: foreach ($parent in @("architect", "coder", "smart_contract", "frontend_web3", "tester")) {
  182:     $configFile = "$projectPath\agents\$parent\config.yaml"
  183: 
  184:     if (Test-Path $configFile) {
  185:         $configContent = Get-Content $configFile -Raw
  186: 
  187:         # Ajouter la section sub_agents
  188:         $subAgentSection = @'
  189: # Configuration des sous-agents
  190: sub_agents:
  191:   cloud_architect:
  192:     enabled: true
  193:     config_path: "agents/architect/sous_agents/cloud_config.yaml"
  194:     specialization: "Architecture Cloud"
  195:   blockchain_architect:
  196:     enabled: true
  197:     config_path: "agents/architect/sous_agents/blockchain_config.yaml"
  198:     specialization: "Architecture Blockchain"
  199:   microservices_architect:
  200:     enabled: true
  201:     config_path: "agents/architect/sous_agents/microservices_config.yaml"
  202:     specialization: "Architecture Microservices"
  203: 
  204: # Mapping des t√¢ches vers les sous-agents
  205: sub_agent_mapping:
  206:   "cloud_": "cloud_architect"
  207:   "aws_": "cloud_architect"
  208:   "azure_": "cloud_architect"
  209:   "gcp_": "cloud_architect"
  210:   "blockchain_": "blockchain_architect"
  211:   "web3_": "blockchain_architect"
  212:   "smart_contract_": "blockchain_architect"
  213:   "microservices_": "microservices_architect"
  214:   "service_": "microservices_architect"
  215:   "api_": "microservices_architect"
  216: '@
  217: 
  218:         # Adapter pour chaque parent
  219:         if ($parent -eq "coder") {
  220:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("cloud_architect", "backend_coder")
  221:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("blockchain_architect", "frontend_coder")
  222:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("microservices_architect", "devops_coder")
  223:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("Architecture Cloud", "Backend Development")
  224:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("Architecture Blockchain", "Frontend Development")
  225:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("Architecture Microservices", "DevOps")
  226:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("cloud_", "backend_")
  227:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("aws_", "api_")
  228:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("azure_", "database_")
  229:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("gcp_", "infrastructure_")
  230:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("blockchain_", "frontend_")
  231:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("web3_", "ui_")
  232:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("smart_contract_", "component_")
  233:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("microservices_", "devops_")
  234:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("service_", "pipeline_")
  235:             $subAgentSection = $subAgentSection.Replace("api_", "deployment_")
  236:         }
  237: 
  238:         # Ajouter √† la fin du fichier
  239:         $newContent = $configContent.Trim() + "`n`n" + $subAgentSection
  240:         $newContent | Out-File -FilePath $configFile -Force -Encoding UTF8
  241: 
  242:         Write-Host "   ‚úÖ $parent/config.yaml mis √† jour avec le mapping des sous-agents" -ForegroundColor Green
  243:     }
  244: }
  245: 
  246: # 5. Tester l'int√©gration des sous-agents
  247: Write-Host "`n5. TEST DE L'INTEGRATION..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  248: 
  249: $testIntegrationScript = @'
  250: # test_subagents_integration.py
  251: import asyncio
  252: import sys
  253: from pathlib import Path
  254: 
  255: # Ajouter le dossier agents au path
  256: agents_dir = Path(__file__).parent / "agents"
  257: sys.path.insert(0, str(agents_dir))
  258: 
  259: async def test_subagents():
  260:     """Teste l'int√©gration des sous-agents"""
  261:     print("üß™ TEST D'INTEGRATION DES SOUS-AGENTS")
  262:     print("="*60)
  263: 
  264:     # Test avec l'agent architecte
  265:     try:
  266:         from architect.agent import ArchitectAgent
  267: 
  268:         # Cr√©er l'agent
  269:         architect = ArchitectAgent("agents/architect/config.yaml")
  270:         await architect.initialize()
  271: 
  272:         print(f"‚úÖ Agent architecte initialis√©")
  273:         print(f"üìä Sous-agents charg√©s: {len(architect.sub_agents)}")
  274: 
  275:         # Tester chaque sous-agent
  276:         for agent_name, agent_instance in architect.sub_agents.items():
  277:             try:
  278:                 info = agent_instance.get_agent_info()
  279:                 print(f"  ‚Ä¢ {agent_name}: {info.get('specialization', 'N/A')}")
  280:             except Exception as e:
  281:                 print(f"  ‚Ä¢ {agent_name}: ‚ùå Erreur - {e}")
  282: 
  283:         # Tester la d√©l√©gation
  284:         test_task = {
  285:             "type": "cloud_design",
  286:             "requirements": {
  287:                 "name": "Test Cloud Architecture",
  288:                 "budget_constrained": True,
  289:                 "needs_global_presence": False
  290:             }
  291:         }
  292: 
  293:         result = await architect.delegate_to_sub_agent("cloud_design", test_task)
  294:         print(f"üìã R√©sultat de d√©l√©gation: {result.get('status', 'N/A')}")
  295: 
  296:     except Exception as e:
  297:         print(f"‚ùå Erreur lors du test: {e}")
  298:         import traceback
  299:         traceback.print_exc()
  300: 
  301:     print("="*60)
  302:     print("‚úÖ TEST D'INTEGRATION TERMINE")
  303: 
  304: if __name__ == "__main__":
  305:     asyncio.run(test_subagents())
  306: '@
  307: 
  308: $testIntegrationScript | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\test_subagents_integration.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
  309: 
  310: try {
  311:     & "$projectPath\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1"
  312:     python "$projectPath\test_subagents_integration.py"
  313:     Write-Host "   ‚úÖ Test d'int√©gration r√©ussi" -ForegroundColor Green
  314: } catch {
  315:     Write-Host "   ‚ö†Ô∏è  Erreur lors du test d'int√©gration: $_" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  316: }
  317: 
  318: # 6. G√©n√©rer le rapport final
  319: Write-Host "`n6. GENERATION DU RAPPORT FINAL..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  320: 
  321: $subAgentsReport = @{
  322:     deployment_date = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
  323:     total_sub_agents = $subAgents.Count
  324:     sub_agents_by_parent = @{}
  325:     structure = @{}
  326: }
  327: 
  328: foreach ($parent in @("architect", "coder", "smart_contract", "frontend_web3", "tester")) {
  329:     $parentSubAgents = $subAgents | Where-Object { $_.Parent -eq $parent }
  330:     $subAgentsReport.sub_agents_by_parent[$parent] = @{
  331:         count = $parentSubAgents.Count
  332:         agents = $parentSubAgents.Name
  333:         types = $parentSubAgents.Type
  334:     }
  335: 
  336:     # Compter les fichiers cr√©√©s
  337:     $parentDir = "$projectPath\agents\$parent\sous_agents"
  338:     if (Test-Path $parentDir) {
  339:         $fileCount = (Get-ChildItem -Path $parentDir -File -Recurse).Count
  340:         $dirCount = (Get-ChildItem -Path $parentDir -Directory).Count
  341:         $subAgentsReport.structure[$parent] = @{
  342:             directories = $dirCount
  343:             files = $fileCount
  344:         }
  345:     }
  346: }
  347: 
  348: $subAgentsReport | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10 | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\reports\subagents_deployment_report.json" -Force
  349: 
  350: Write-Host "`n" + "="*60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
  351: Write-Host "üéâ DEPLOIEMENT DES SOUS-AGENTS TERMINE !" -ForegroundColor Green
  352: Write-Host "="*60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
  353: Write-Host ""
  354: Write-Host "üìä RESUME:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  355: Write-Host "  ‚Ä¢ Sous-agents d√©ploy√©s: $($subAgentsReport.total_sub_agents)" -ForegroundColor White
  356: Write-Host ""
  357: Write-Host "üîß PAR AGENT PRINCIPAL:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  358: foreach ($parent in $subAgentsReport.sub_agents_by_parent.Keys) {
  359:     $parentData = $subAgentsReport.sub_agents_by_parent[$parent]
  360:     Write-Host "  ‚Ä¢ $parent : $($parentData.count) sous-agents" -ForegroundColor White
  361:     foreach ($agent in $parentData.agents) {
  362:         Write-Host "    ‚ó¶ $agent" -ForegroundColor Gray
  363:     }
  364: }
  365: Write-Host ""
  366: Write-Host "üìÅ FICHIERS CREES:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  367: foreach ($parent in $subAgentsReport.structure.Keys) {
  368:     $structure = $subAgentsReport.structure[$parent]
  369:     Write-Host "  ‚Ä¢ $parent : $($structure.files) fichiers dans $($structure.directories) dossiers" -ForegroundColor White
  370: }
  371: Write-Host ""
  372: Write-Host "‚ö° COMMANDES DE TEST:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  373: Write-Host "  Tester l'int√©gration: python test_subagents_integration.py" -ForegroundColor White
  374: Write-Host "  Voir le rapport: cat reports\subagents_deployment_report.json" -ForegroundColor White
  375: Write-Host "  Lister tous les agents: Get-ChildItem agents\*\sous_agents\*" -ForegroundColor White
  376: Write-Host ""
  377: Write-Host "‚úÖ ARCHITECTURE HIERARCHIQUE COMPLETE" -ForegroundColor Green

SCRIPT 2 | install-blockchain.ps1
Size: 13020 bytes | Type: .ps1 | Modified: 2026-01-26 20:59:00.750096
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    1: # install-blockchain.ps1 - Script d'installation des outils blockchain
    2: # Version corrig√©e pour d√©tecter Foundry sur D: - 2026-01-27
    3: 
    4: # ========== FONCTIONS ==========
    5: function Test-CommandExists {
    6:     param([string]$CommandName)
    7:     try {
    8:         # Essayer d'abord la m√©thode standard
    9:         $cmd = Get-Command $CommandName -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
   10:         if ($null -ne $cmd) {
   11:             return $true
   12:         }
   13: 
   14:         # V√©rifier sur le disque D: sp√©cifiquement
   15:         if ($CommandName -eq "forge") {
   16:             $forgePaths = @(
   17:                 "D:\Foundry\forge.exe",
   18:                 "D:\foundry\forge.exe",
   19:                 "$env:ProgramFiles\Foundry\bin\forge.exe",
   20:                 "$env:USERPROFILE\.foundry\bin\forge.exe"
   21:             )
   22: 
   23:             foreach ($path in $forgePaths) {
   24:                 if (Test-Path $path) {
   25:                     # Ajouter au PATH de la session si trouv√©
   26:                     $binDir = Split-Path $path -Parent
   27:                     if ($env:Path -notlike "*$binDir*") {
   28:                         $env:Path += ";$binDir"
   29:                     }
   30:                     return $true
   31:                 }
   32:             }
   33:         }
   34: 
   35:         return $false
   36:     } catch {
   37:         return $false
   38:     }
   39: }
   40: 
   41: function Write-InstallLog {
   42:     param([string]$Message, [string]$Type = "INFO")
   43:     $timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
   44:     $color = "White"
   45:     if ($Type -eq "SUCCESS") { $color = "Green" }
   46:     elseif ($Type -eq "ERROR") { $color = "Red" }
   47:     elseif ($Type -eq "WARNING") { $color = "Yellow" }
   48:     Write-Host "[$timestamp] $Type : $Message" -ForegroundColor $color
   49: }
   50: 
   51: function Invoke-Silent {
   52:     param([string]$Command)
   53:     try {
   54:         Invoke-Expression $Command 2>$null 1>$null
   55:         return $true
   56:     } catch {
   57:         return $false
   58:     }
   59: }
   60: 
   61: # ========== INSTALLATION DES OUTILS ==========
   62: Write-Host "`n=== INSTALLATION DES OUTILS BLOCKCHAIN ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
   63: $installDate = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
   64: Write-Host "Date: $installDate`n"
   65: 
   66: # 1. V√âRIFICATION FOUNDRY (VERSION CORRIG√âE POUR D:)
   67: Write-Host "1. V√âRIFICATION FOUNDRY..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
   68: 
   69: # V√©rifier sp√©cifiquement sur D:
   70: $foundryFound = $false
   71: $foundryPath = $null
   72: 
   73: $possiblePaths = @(
   74:     "D:\Foundry\forge.exe",
   75:     "D:\foundry\forge.exe",  # Votre installation
   76:     "D:\Foundry\bin\forge.exe",
   77:     "D:\foundry\bin\forge.exe",
   78:     "$env:ProgramFiles\Foundry\bin\forge.exe",
   79:     "$env:USERPROFILE\.foundry\bin\forge.exe"
   80: )
   81: 
   82: foreach ($path in $possiblePaths) {
   83:     if (Test-Path $path) {
   84:         $foundryFound = $true
   85:         $foundryPath = $path
   86:         $binDir = Split-Path $path -Parent
   87: 
   88:         # Ajouter au PATH de la session si n√©cessaire
   89:         if ($env:Path -notlike "*$binDir*") {
   90:             $env:Path += ";$binDir"
   91:             Write-InstallLog "Ajout√© au PATH de la session: $binDir" -Type "INFO"
   92:         }
   93:         break
   94:     }
   95: }
   96: 
   97: if ($foundryFound) {
   98:     Write-InstallLog "Foundry trouv√© √†: $foundryPath" -Type "SUCCESS"
   99: 
  100:     # Tenter de v√©rifier la version
  101:     try {
  102:         $forgeVersion = forge --version 2>&1 | Select-Object -First 1
  103:         if ($forgeVersion -match "forge") {
  104:             Write-InstallLog "Version: $forgeVersion" -Type "INFO"
  105:         } else {
  106:             # Essayer en appelant directement
  107:             $directPath = $foundryPath
  108:             & $directPath --version 2>&1 | ForEach-Object {
  109:                 if ($_ -match "forge") {
  110:                     Write-InstallLog "Version: $_" -Type "INFO"
  111:                 }
  112:             }
  113:         }
  114:     } catch {
  115:         Write-InstallLog "Impossible de v√©rifier la version de Foundry" -Type "WARNING"
  116:     }
  117: } else {
  118:     Write-InstallLog "Foundry non d√©tect√©" -Type "WARNING"
  119:     Write-Host "`nFoundry semble √™tre install√© sur D:\foundry\" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  120:     Write-Host "Mais n'est pas dans le PATH de cette session." -ForegroundColor White
  121:     Write-Host "`nPour corriger:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  122:     Write-Host "1. Ajoutez D:\foundry\ au PATH syst√®me:" -ForegroundColor White
  123:     Write-Host "   [Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable('Path', `$env:Path + ';D:\foundry', 'Machine')" -ForegroundColor Gray
  124:     Write-Host "2. Red√©marrez PowerShell" -ForegroundColor White
  125:     Write-Host "3. Testez: forge --version" -ForegroundColor White
  126:     Write-Host "`nOU ex√©cutez cette commande maintenant:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  127:     Write-Host "   `$env:Path += ';D:\foundry'" -ForegroundColor Gray
  128: }
  129: 
  130: # 2. INSTALLATION HARDHAT
  131: Write-Host "`n2. INSTALLATION HARDHAT..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  132: 
  133: if (Test-CommandExists "npm") {
  134:     # V√©rifier si Hardhat est d√©j√† disponible
  135:     $hardhatCheck = $false
  136:     try {
  137:         $output = npx hardhat --version 2>$null
  138:         if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
  139:             $hardhatCheck = $true
  140:         }
  141:     } catch {
  142:         $hardhatCheck = $false
  143:     }
  144: 
  145:     if (-not $hardhatCheck) {
  146:         Write-InstallLog "Installation Hardhat..." -Type "INFO"
  147:         try {
  148:             npm install -g hardhat 2>$null
  149:             Write-InstallLog "Hardhat install√©" -Type "SUCCESS"
  150:         } catch {
  151:             Write-InstallLog "Erreur installation Hardhat" -Type "ERROR"
  152:         }
  153:     } else {
  154:         Write-InstallLog "Hardhat d√©j√† disponible" -Type "INFO"
  155:     }
  156: } else {
  157:     Write-InstallLog "npm non disponible" -Type "WARNING"
  158: }
  159: 
  160: # 3. INSTALLATION OUTILS SECURITE
  161: Write-Host "`n3. INSTALLATION OUTILS SECURITE..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  162: 
  163: # V√©rifier Python/pip
  164: $pipExists = Test-CommandExists "pip"
  165: 
  166: $securityTools = @(
  167:     @{Name="Solhint"; Command="solhint"; Type="npm"; Install="npm install -g solhint"}
  168: )
  169: 
  170: # Ajouter outils pip seulement si pip existe
  171: if ($pipExists) {
  172:     Write-InstallLog "pip d√©tect√©, ajout des outils Python..." -Type "INFO"
  173:     $securityTools += @{Name="Slither"; Command="slither"; Type="pip"; Install="pip install slither-analyzer --user"}
  174:     $securityTools += @{Name="Mythril"; Command="myth"; Type="pip"; Install="pip install mythril --user"}
  175: } else {
  176:     Write-InstallLog "pip non d√©tect√©, outils Python ignor√©s" -Type "INFO"
  177: }
  178: 
  179: foreach ($tool in $securityTools) {
  180:     # V√©rifier si d√©j√† install√©
  181:     if (Test-CommandExists $tool.Command) {
  182:         Write-InstallLog "$($tool.Name) d√©j√† install√©" -Type "INFO"
  183:         continue
  184:     }
  185: 
  186:     Write-InstallLog "Installation $($tool.Name)..." -Type "INFO"
  187: 
  188:     if ($tool.Type -eq "npm") {
  189:         try {
  190:             Invoke-Silent "npm install -g solhint"
  191:             Write-InstallLog "$($tool.Name) install√©" -Type "SUCCESS"
  192:         } catch {
  193:             Write-InstallLog "Erreur installation $($tool.Name)" -Type "ERROR"
  194:         }
  195:     } elseif ($tool.Type -eq "pip") {
  196:         try {
  197:             Invoke-Silent $tool.Install
  198:             Write-InstallLog "$($tool.Name) install√©" -Type "SUCCESS"
  199:         } catch {
  200:             Write-InstallLog "Erreur installation $($tool.Name)" -Type "ERROR"
  201:         }
  202:     }
  203: }
  204: 
  205: # 4. INSTALLATION OUTILS FRONTEND
  206: Write-Host "`n4. INSTALLATION OUTILS FRONTEND..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  207: 
  208: $frontendTools = @(
  209:     @{Name="TypeScript"; Command="tsc"; Install="npm install -g typescript"},
  210:     @{Name="Yarn"; Command="yarn"; Install="npm install -g yarn"}
  211: )
  212: 
  213: foreach ($tool in $frontendTools) {
  214:     if (Test-CommandExists $tool.Command) {
  215:         Write-InstallLog "$($tool.Name) d√©j√† install√©" -Type "INFO"
  216:     } else {
  217:         Write-InstallLog "Installation $($tool.Name)..." -Type "INFO"
  218:         try {
  219:             Invoke-Silent $tool.Install
  220:             Write-InstallLog "$($tool.Name) install√©" -Type "SUCCESS"
  221:         } catch {
  222:             Write-InstallLog "Erreur installation $($tool.Name)" -Type "ERROR"
  223:         }
  224:     }
  225: }
  226: 
  227: Write-InstallLog "Next.js: utiliser 'npx create-next-app'" -Type "INFO"
  228: 
  229: # 5. INSTALLATION LIBRAIRIES WEB3
  230: Write-Host "`n5. INSTALLATION LIBRAIRIES WEB3..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  231: 
  232: # Wagmi CLI
  233: if (-not (Test-CommandExists "wagmi")) {
  234:     Write-InstallLog "Installation @wagmi/cli..." -Type "INFO"
  235:     try {
  236:         Invoke-Silent "npm install -g @wagmi/cli"
  237:         Write-InstallLog "@wagmi/cli install√©" -Type "SUCCESS"
  238:     } catch {
  239:         Write-InstallLog "Erreur installation @wagmi/cli" -Type "ERROR"
  240:     }
  241: } else {
  242:     Write-InstallLog "@wagmi/cli d√©j√† install√©" -Type "INFO"
  243: }
  244: 
  245: # Viem - Installation locale seulement
  246: Write-InstallLog "Installation Viem (local)..." -Type "INFO"
  247: try {
  248:     # V√©rifier si package.json existe
  249:     if (-not (Test-Path "package.json")) {
  250:         '{"name":"web3-temp","version":"1.0.0","private":true}' | Out-File "package.json" -Encoding UTF8
  251:         Write-InstallLog "package.json cr√©√©" -Type "INFO"
  252:     }
  253: 
  254:     # Installer viem localement
  255:     Invoke-Silent "npm install viem"
  256:     Write-InstallLog "Viem install√© localement" -Type "SUCCESS"
  257: } catch {
  258:     Write-InstallLog "Erreur installation Viem" -Type "ERROR"
  259: }
  260: 
  261: # 6. CONFIGURATION RPC ENDPOINTS
  262: Write-Host "`n6. CONFIGURATION RPC ENDPOINTS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  263: 
  264: $rpcConfig = @{
  265:     "ethereum_mainnet" = "https://eth.llamarpc.com"
  266:     "polygon" = "https://polygon.llamarpc.com"
  267:     "arbitrum" = "https://arbitrum.llamarpc.com"
  268:     "optimism" = "https://optimism.llamarpc.com"
  269:     "base" = "https://base.llamarpc.com"
  270: }
  271: 
  272: $configPath = "$PWD\rpc_endpoints.json"
  273: try {
  274:     $rpcConfig | ConvertTo-Json | Set-Content $configPath -Encoding UTF8
  275:     Write-InstallLog "Configuration RPC sauvegard√©e dans $configPath" -Type "SUCCESS"
  276: } catch {
  277:     Write-InstallLog "Erreur sauvegarde RPC" -Type "ERROR"
  278: }
  279: 
  280: # 7. VERIFICATION DES INSTALLATIONS
  281: Write-Host "`n7. VERIFICATION DES INSTALLATIONS..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
  282: 
  283: # V√©rifier Foundry avec notre fonction am√©lior√©e
  284: $forgeInstalled = Test-CommandExists "forge"
  285: 
  286: # V√©rifications des autres outils
  287: $toolsToVerify = @(
  288:     @{Name="Foundry"; Installed=$forgeInstalled},
  289:     @{Name="Hardhat"; Installed=(Test-CommandExists "npx")},
  290:     @{Name="Solhint"; Installed=(Test-CommandExists "solhint")},
  291:     @{Name="TypeScript"; Installed=(Test-CommandExists "tsc")},
  292:     @{Name="Yarn"; Installed=(Test-CommandExists "yarn")},
  293:     @{Name="Wagmi CLI"; Installed=(Test-CommandExists "wagmi")}
  294: )
  295: 
  296: Write-Host "`nR√©sum√© des installations:" -ForegroundColor White
  297: Write-Host ("-" * 50) -ForegroundColor Gray
  298: 
  299: foreach ($tool in $toolsToVerify) {
  300:     if ($tool.Installed) {
  301:         Write-Host "  ‚úÖ $($tool.Name)" -ForegroundColor Green
  302:     } else {
  303:         Write-Host "  ‚ùå $($tool.Name)" -ForegroundColor Red
  304:     }
  305: }
  306: 
  307: # V√©rifier Viem
  308: $viemInstalled = Test-Path "node_modules/viem"
  309: Write-Host "`n  V√©rification Viem..." -ForegroundColor White
  310: if ($viemInstalled) {
  311:     Write-Host "  ‚úÖ Viem (local)" -ForegroundColor Green
  312: } else {
  313:     Write-Host "  ‚ùå Viem" -ForegroundColor Red
  314: }
  315: 
  316: Write-Host ("`n" + "-" * 50) -ForegroundColor Gray
  317: 
  318: # 8. CR√âATION DU FICHIER DE R√âSUM√â
  319: $summary = @"
  320: === R√âSUM√â DE L'INSTALLATION BLOCKCHAIN ===
  321: Date: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
  322: R√©pertoire: $PWD
  323: 
  324: STATUT DES INSTALLATIONS:
  325: $(foreach ($tool in $toolsToVerify) {
  326:     $status = if ($tool.Installed) { "‚úì" } else { "‚úó" }
  327:     "  $status $($tool.Name)"
  328: })
  329: 
  330: $(if ($viemInstalled) { "  ‚úì Viem (local)" } else { "  ‚úó Viem" })
  331: 
  332: FICHIERS CONFIGUR√âS:
  333: ‚Ä¢ rpc_endpoints.json - Endpoints RPC
  334: 
  335: PROCHAINES √âTAPES:
  336: 1. Pour Foundry: Ex√©cuter 'forge --version' pour v√©rifier
  337: 2. Pour d√©velopper: npx hardhat init
  338: 3. Pour tester: forge test
  339: 4. Voir documentation dans SmartContractPipeline\
  340: 
  341: NOTES:
  342: $(if (-not $forgeInstalled) { "- Foundry install√© sur D:\\foundry\\ mais pas dans le PATH" })
  343: $(if (-not $pipExists) { "- pip non d√©tect√©, outils Python non install√©s" })
  344: "@
  345: 
  346: try {
  347:     $summary | Out-File "$PWD\installation_summary.txt" -Encoding UTF8
  348:     Write-InstallLog "R√©sum√© sauvegard√© dans installation_summary.txt" -Type "SUCCESS"
  349: } catch {
  350:     Write-InstallLog "Erreur sauvegarde r√©sum√©" -Type "ERROR"
  351: }
  352: 
  353: Write-Host "`n=== INSTALLATION TERMIN√âE ===" -ForegroundColor Green
  354: Write-Host "Consultez 'installation_summary.txt' pour le rapport complet" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  355: 
  356: if (-not $forgeInstalled) {
  357:     Write-Host "`n‚ö†  Foundry d√©tect√© sur D:\foundry\ mais pas accessible" -ForegroundColor Red
  358:     Write-Host "Pour rendre Foundry accessible:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  359: 
  360:     Write-Host "`nOption 1 - Ajouter au PATH de cette session:" -ForegroundColor White
  361:     Write-Host "   `$env:Path += ';D:\foundry'" -ForegroundColor Gray
  362:     Write-Host "   forge --version" -ForegroundColor Gray
  363: 
  364:     Write-Host "`nOption 2 - Ajouter au PATH syst√®me (red√©marrage requis):" -ForegroundColor White
  365:     Write-Host "   [Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable('Path', `$env:Path + ';D:\foundry', 'Machine')" -ForegroundColor Gray
  366:     Write-Host "   Red√©marrez PowerShell" -ForegroundColor Gray
  367: 
  368:     Write-Host "`nOption 3 - Cr√©er un alias:" -ForegroundColor White
  369:     Write-Host "   Set-Alias forge D:\foundry\forge.exe" -ForegroundColor Gray
  370:     Write-Host "   Set-Alias anvil D:\foundry\anvil.exe" -ForegroundColor Gray
  371:     Write-Host "   Set-Alias cast D:\foundry\cast.exe" -ForegroundColor Gray
  372: }

    8:     Auteur: SmartContractDevPipeline

   11: # Configuration par d√©faut
   12: $defaultConfig = @{
   13:     GITHUB_USERNAME = ""
   14:     GITHUB_REPO_NAME = "SmartContractDevPipeline"
   15:     GITHUB_TOKEN = ""
   16: }

   28: function Show-Menu {
   29:     Clear-Host
   30:     Write-Host "=" * 60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
   31:     Write-Host "SHARE SPLIT 1M - SmartContractDevPipeline" -ForegroundColor White
   32:     Write-Host "=" * 60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
   33:     Write-Host ""
   34:     Write-Host "=== MENU PRINCIPAL ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
   35:     Write-Host "1. Publier sur GitHub Repository" -ForegroundColor White
   36:     Write-Host "2. Partager sur GitHub Gists" -ForegroundColor White
   37:     Write-Host "3. G√©n√©rer seulement les fichiers locaux" -ForegroundColor White
   38:     Write-Host "4. Quitter" -ForegroundColor White
   39:     Write-Host ""
   40: }

   42: function Read-ValidatedInput {
   43:     param(
   44:         [string]$Prompt,
   45:         [string]$DefaultValue = "",
   46:         [switch]$Required
   47:     )
   48: 
   49:     while ($true) {
   50:         if ($DefaultValue) {
   51:             $inputText = Read-Host "$Prompt [$DefaultValue]"
   52:             if ([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($inputText)) {
   53:                 $inputText = $DefaultValue
   54:             }
   55:         } else {
   56:             $inputText = Read-Host $Prompt
   57:         }
   58: 
   59:         if (-not $Required -or (-not [string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($inputText))) {
   60:             return $inputText
   61:         } else {
   62:             Write-Host "Ce champ est requis. Veuillez entrer une valeur." -ForegroundColor Red
   63:         }
   64:     }
   65: }
   66: 
   67: function Test-GitHubToken {
   68:     param([string]$Token, [string]$Username)
   69: 
   70:     Write-Host "V√©rification du token GitHub..." -NoNewline
   71: 
   72:     try {
   73:         $headers = @{
   74:             "Authorization" = "token $Token"
   75:             "Accept" = "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
   76:         }
   77: 
   78:         $response = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://api.github.com/user" -Headers $headers -Method Get
   79: 
   80:         if ($response.login -eq $Username) {
   81:             Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
   82:             Write-Host "   Connect√© en tant que: $($response.login)" -ForegroundColor Green
   83:             Write-Host "   Nom: $($response.name)" -ForegroundColor Green
   84:             return $true
   85:         } else {
   86:             Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
   87:             Write-Host "   Le token ne correspond pas √† l'utilisateur $Username" -ForegroundColor Red
   88:             return $false
   89:         }
   90:     } catch {
   91:         Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
   92:         Write-Host "   Erreur: $($_.Exception.Message)" -ForegroundColor Red
   93:         return $false
   94:     }
   95: }
   96: 
   97: function Get-FilesToShare {
   98:     $files = @()
   99: 
  100:     # Fichiers principaux
  101:     $mainFiles = @(
  102:         "ShareSplit1M.ps1",
  103:         "smart-contract-dev-pipeline.sh",
  104:         "automated-deployment.ps1",
  105:         "security-audit-checklist.md",
  106:         "gas-optimization-guide.md",
  107:         "README.md"
  108:     )
  109: 
  110:     foreach ($file in $mainFiles) {
  111:         if (Test-Path $file) {
  112:             $files += $file
  113:         }
  114:     }
  115: 
  116:     # Dossiers suppl√©mentaires
  117:     $folders = @("scripts", "templates", "configs")
  118:     foreach ($folder in $folders) {
  119:         if (Test-Path $folder -PathType Container) {
  120:             $folderFiles = Get-ChildItem -Path $folder -File -Recurse | Where-Object { $_.Extension -in ".ps1", ".sh", ".md", ".yml", ".yaml", ".json", ".sol", ".js", ".ts" }
  121:             foreach ($file in $folderFiles) {
  122:                 $files += $file.FullName
  123:             }
  124:         }
  125:     }
  126: 
  127:     return $files
  128: }
  129: 
  130: function Create-ZipArchive {
  131:     param([array]$Files, [string]$OutputPath)
  132: 
  133:     Write-Host "Cr√©ation de l'archive ZIP..." -NoNewline
  134: 
  135:     try {
  136:         Compress-Archive -Path $Files -DestinationPath $OutputPath -Force
  137:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  138:         Write-Host "   Archive cr√©√©e: $OutputPath" -ForegroundColor Green
  139:         return $true
  140:     } catch {
  141:         Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
  142:         Write-Host "   Erreur: $($_.Exception.Message)" -ForegroundColor Red
  143:         return $false
  144:     }
  145: }
  146: 
  147: # ==================== FONCTIONS GITHUB ====================
  148: 
  149: function Publish-Repository {
  150:     param([hashtable]$config)
  151: 
  152:     Write-Host "`n=== PUBLICATION SUR GITHUB REPOSITORY ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  153:     Write-Host "V√©rification du r√©pertoire..." -NoNewline
  154: 
  155:     # V√©rifier le r√©pertoire courant
  156:     if (-not (Test-Path -Path ".git")) {
  157:         Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
  158:         Write-Host "‚ùå Erreur: Ce r√©pertoire n'est pas un d√©p√¥t Git." -ForegroundColor Red
  159:         Write-Host "   Ex√©cutez ce script depuis le r√©pertoire de votre projet Git." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  160:         return $false
  161:     }
  162:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  163: 
  164:     Write-Host "Nettoyage Git..." -NoNewline
  165:     git clean -fd 2>&1 | Out-Null
  166:     git reset --hard 2>&1 | Out-Null
  167:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  168: 
  169:     Write-Host "Configuration Git..." -NoNewline
  170:     git config user.name $config.GITHUB_USERNAME 2>&1 | Out-Null
  171:     git config user.email "$($config.GITHUB_USERNAME)@users.noreply.github.com" 2>&1 | Out-Null
  172:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  173: 
  174:     Write-Host "Remote: https://github.com/$($config.GITHUB_USERNAME)/$($config.GITHUB_REPO_NAME)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  175:     $remoteUrl = "https://x-access-token:${newToken}@github.com/$($config.GITHUB_USERNAME)/$($config.GITHUB_REPO_NAME).git"
  176:     git remote remove origin 2>&1 | Out-Null
  177:     git remote add origin $remoteUrl 2>&1 | Out-Null
  178: 
  179:     Write-Host "Ajout fichiers..." -NoNewline
  180:     git add . 2>&1 | Out-Null
  181:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  182: 
  183:     Write-Host "Commit..." -NoNewline
  184:     $commitResult = git commit -m "SmartContractDevPipeline - $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')" 2>&1
  185:     if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
  186:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  187:     } else {
  188:         # Si pas de changements, cr√©er un commit vide
  189:         if ($commitResult -match "nothing to commit") {
  190:             git commit --allow-empty -m "SmartContractDevPipeline - $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')" 2>&1 | Out-Null
  191:             Write-Host " (commit vide) ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  192:         } else {
  193:             Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
  194:             Write-Host "‚ùå Erreur: $commitResult" -ForegroundColor Red
  195:             return $false
  196:         }
  197:     }
  198: 
  199:     Write-Host "Branche..." -NoNewline
  200:     git branch -M main 2>&1 | Out-Null
  201:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  202: 
  203:     # CORRECTION UNIQUE : Section push modifi√©e
  204:     # Push vers GitHub
  205:     Write-Host "Push vers GitHub..." -NoNewline
  206: 
  207:     # CORRECTION : Approche en deux √©tapes au lieu de --allow-unrelated-histories --force
  208:     $pushResult = git push -u origin main 2>&1
  209: 
  210:     if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) {
  211:         if ($pushResult -match "failed to push some refs" -or $pushResult -match "unrelated histories" -or $pushResult -match "non-fast-forward") {
  212:             Write-Host " (tentative avec --force)..." -NoNewline -ForegroundColor Yellow
  213:             $pushResult = git push -u origin main --force 2>&1
  214:         }
  215:     }
  216: 
  217:     if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
  218:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  219:     } else {
  220:         Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
  221:         Write-Host "‚ùå Erreur: $pushResult" -ForegroundColor Red
  222:         return $false
  223:     }
  224: 
  225:     Write-Host "`n‚úÖ Publication r√©ussie sur GitHub !" -ForegroundColor Green
  226:     Write-Host "üìÇ Repository: https://github.com/$($config.GITHUB_USERNAME)/$($config.GITHUB_REPO_NAME)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  227:     return $true
  228: }
  229: 
  230: function Share-Gists {
  231:     param([hashtable]$config)
  232: 
  233:     Write-Host "`n=== PARTAGE SUR GITHUB GISTS ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  234: 
  235:     $files = Get-FilesToShare
  236: 
  237:     if ($files.Count -eq 0) {
  238:         Write-Host "‚ùå Aucun fichier √† partager trouv√©." -ForegroundColor Red
  239:         return $false
  240:     }
  241: 
  242:     Write-Host "Fichiers √† partager ($($files.Count) trouv√©s):" -ForegroundColor White
  243:     foreach ($file in $files) {
  244:         Write-Host "  ‚Ä¢ $file" -ForegroundColor Gray
  245:     }
  246: 
  247:     Write-Host "`nCr√©ation des Gists..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
  248: 
  249:     $successCount = 0
  250:     $failedCount = 0
  251:     $gistLinks = @()
  252: 
  253:     foreach ($file in $files) {
  254:         Write-Host "  $file..." -NoNewline
  255: 
  256:         try {
  257:             $content = Get-Content -Path $file -Raw -Encoding UTF8
  258:             $fileName = Split-Path $file -Leaf
  259: 
  260:             $body = @{
  261:                 description = "SmartContractDevPipeline - $fileName"
  262:                 public = $true
  263:                 files = @{
  264:                     $fileName = @{ content = $content }
  265:                 }
  266:             } | ConvertTo-Json
  267: 
  268:             $headers = @{
  269:                 "Authorization" = "token $($config.GITHUB_TOKEN)"
  270:                 "Accept" = "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
  271:             }
  272: 
  273:             $response = Invoke-RestMethod `
  274:                 -Uri "https://api.github.com/gists" `
  275:                 -Headers $headers `
  276:                 -Method Post `
  277:                 -Body $body `
  278:                 -ContentType "application/json"
  279: 
  280:             $successCount++
  281:             $gistLinks += "$fileName : $($response.html_url)"
  282:             Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  283:         } catch {
  284:             $failedCount++
  285:             Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
  286:             Write-Host "    Erreur: $($_.Exception.Message)" -ForegroundColor Red
  287:         }
  288:     }
  289: 
  290:     Write-Host "`n=== R√âSUM√â GISTS ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  291:     Write-Host "Gists cr√©√©s avec succ√®s: $successCount" -ForegroundColor Green
  292:     Write-Host "Gists √©chou√©s: $failedCount" -ForegroundColor $(if ($failedCount -gt 0) { "Red" } else { "Green" })
  293: 
  294:     if ($gistLinks.Count -gt 0) {
  295:         Write-Host "`nüìã Liens des Gists:" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  296:         foreach ($link in $gistLinks) {
  297:             Write-Host "  ‚Ä¢ $link" -ForegroundColor White
  298:         }
  299:     }
  300: 
  301:     return $true
  302: }
  303: 
  304: function Generate-LocalFiles {
  305:     param([hashtable]$config)
  306: 
  307:     Write-Host "`n=== G√âN√âRATION DE FICHIERS LOCAUX ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  308: 
  309:     $files = Get-FilesToShare
  310: 
  311:     if ($files.Count -eq 0) {
  312:         Write-Host "‚ùå Aucun fichier trouv√© √† partager." -ForegroundColor Red
  313:         return $false
  314:     }
  315: 
  316:     Write-Host "Fichiers trouv√©s ($($files.Count)):" -ForegroundColor White
  317:     foreach ($file in $files) {
  318:         Write-Host "  ‚Ä¢ $file" -ForegroundColor Gray
  319:     }
  320: 
  321:     # Cr√©er un dossier pour les fichiers partag√©s
  322:     $shareDir = "SmartContractDevPipeline_Share_$(Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd_HHmmss')"
  323:     New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $shareDir -Force | Out-Null
  324: 
  325:     Write-Host "`nCopie des fichiers dans: $shareDir" -NoNewline
  326: 
  327:     foreach ($file in $files) {
  328:         $destFile = Join-Path $shareDir (Split-Path $file -Leaf)
  329:         Copy-Item -Path $file -Destination $destFile -Force
  330:     }
  331: 
  332:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  333: 
  334:     # Cr√©er une archive ZIP
  335:     $zipPath = "$shareDir.zip"
  336:     if (Create-ZipArchive -Files (Get-ChildItem -Path $shareDir -File).FullName -OutputPath $zipPath) {
  337:         Write-Host "`n‚úÖ Fichiers g√©n√©r√©s avec succ√®s !" -ForegroundColor Green
  338:         Write-Host "üìÅ Dossier: $shareDir" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  339:         Write-Host "üì¶ Archive: $zipPath" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  340:     }
  341: 
  342:     return $true
  343: }
  344: 
  345: function Test-GitPush {
  346:     param([hashtable]$config, [string]$newToken)
  347: 
  348:     Write-Host "Test Git push..." -NoNewline
  349:     $testDir = "test_push_$(Get-Date -Format 'HHmmss')"
  350:     New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $testDir -Force | Out-Null
  351:     Set-Location $testDir
  352: 
  353:     git init
  354:     git config user.name "$($config.GITHUB_USERNAME)"
  355:     git config user.email "$($config.GITHUB_USERNAME)@users.noreply.github.com"
  356: 
  357:     # Cr√©er un fichier test
  358:     "Test file" | Out-File -FilePath "test.txt" -Encoding UTF8
  359: 
  360:     git add .
  361:     git commit -m "Test" --quiet
  362: 
  363:     # IMPORTANT: Cr√©er la branche main avant de pousser
  364:     git branch -M main
  365: 
  366:     # Essayer avec x-access-token
  367:     $remoteUrl = "https://x-access-token:${newToken}@github.com/$($config.GITHUB_USERNAME)/$($config.GITHUB_REPO_NAME).git"
  368:     git remote add origin $remoteUrl
  369: 
  370:     # CORRECTION : Approche en deux √©tapes
  371:     Write-Host "  Tentative de push..." -NoNewline
  372:     $pushOutput = git push -u origin main 2>&1
  373: 
  374:     if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) {
  375:         if ($pushOutput -match "failed to push some refs" -or $pushOutput -match "unrelated histories") {
  376:             Write-Host " √©chou√©, tentative avec --force..." -NoNewline -ForegroundColor Yellow
  377:             $pushOutput = git push -u origin main --force 2>&1
  378:         }
  379:     }
  380: 
  381:     if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
  382:         Write-Host " ‚úì Git push OK!" -ForegroundColor Green
  383:     } else {
  384:         Write-Host " ‚úó Git push √©chou√©" -ForegroundColor Red
  385:         # Afficher l'erreur pour diagnostiquer
  386:         Write-Host "Erreur: $pushOutput" -ForegroundColor Red
  387: 
  388:         # V√©rifier si c'est un probl√®me de branche
  389:         if ($pushOutput -match "src refspec main does not match any") {
  390:             Write-Host "ASTUCE: La branche 'main' n'existe pas localement" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  391:         }
  392:     }
  393: 
  394:     # Nettoyer
  395:     Set-Location ..
  396:     Remove-Item $testDir -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
  397: }
  398: 
  399: # ==================== PROGRAMME PRINCIPAL ====================
  400: 
  401: # Point d'entr√©e
  402: Clear-Host
  403: Write-Host "SHARE SPLIT 1M - SmartContractDevPipeline" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  404: Write-Host "=" * 60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
  405: 
  406: # Configuration
  407: $config = $defaultConfig.Clone()
  408: 
  409: Write-Host "`n=== CONFIGURATION GITHUB ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  410: 
  411: $config.GITHUB_USERNAME = Read-ValidatedInput -Prompt "Nom d'utilisateur GitHub" -Required
  412: $config.GITHUB_REPO_NAME = Read-ValidatedInput -Prompt "Nom du repository GitHub" -DefaultValue "SmartContractDevPipeline"
  413: $config.GITHUB_TOKEN = Read-ValidatedInput -Prompt "Token GitHub (classic, avec permissions repo et gist)" -Required -MaskInput
  414: 
  415: Write-Host "`nConfiguration enregistr√©e:" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  416: Write-Host "  Utilisateur: $($config.GITHUB_USERNAME)" -ForegroundColor White
  417: Write-Host "  Repository: $($config.GITHUB_REPO_NAME)" -ForegroundColor White
  418: Write-Host "  Token: ******" -ForegroundColor White
  419: 
  420: # Test du token
  421: if (-not (Test-GitHubToken -Token $config.GITHUB_TOKEN -Username $config.GITHUB_USERNAME)) {
  422:     Write-Host "`n‚ùå Le token GitHub est invalide." -ForegroundColor Red
  423:     Write-Host "Veuillez v√©rifier votre token et r√©essayer." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  424:     Read-Host "`nAppuyez sur Entr√©e pour quitter"
  425:     exit 1
  426: }
  427: 
  428: # Initialiser la variable newToken (utilis√©e dans Publish-Repository)
  429: $newToken = $config.GITHUB_TOKEN
  430: 
  431: # Test Git push
  432: Test-GitPush -config $config -newToken $newToken
  433: 
  434: # Menu principal
  435: do {
  436:     Show-Menu
  437:     $choice = Read-Host "Votre choix [1-4]"
  438: 
  439:     switch ($choice) {
  440:         "1" {
  441:             # Publication sur GitHub Repository
  442:             Publish-Repository -config $config
  443:             Read-Host "`nAppuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
  444:         }
  445:         "2" {
  446:             # Partage sur GitHub Gists
  447:             Share-Gists -config $config
  448:             Read-Host "`nAppuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
  449:         }
  450:         "3" {
  451:             # G√©n√©ration de fichiers locaux
  452:             Generate-LocalFiles -config $config
  453:             Read-Host "`nAppuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
  454:         }
  455:         "4" {
  456:             Write-Host "`nAu revoir !" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  457:             exit 0
  458:         }
  459:         default {
  460:             Write-Host "Choix invalide. Veuillez s√©lectionner une option entre 1 et 4." -ForegroundColor Red
  461:             Start-Sleep -Seconds 2
  462:         }
  463:     }
  464: } while ($true)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    1: # setup.ps1 - Version sans accents
    2: Write-Host "=== SMART CONTRACT PIPELINE SETUP ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
    3: Write-Host "Complete installation script" -ForegroundColor Yellow
    4: Write-Host ""
    5: 
    6: # Ask for confirmation
    7: $confirm = Read-Host "Do you want to install all components? (Y/N)"
    8: if ($confirm -ne "Y" -and $confirm -ne "y") {
    9:     Write-Host "Installation cancelled" -ForegroundColor Yellow
   10:     exit
   11: }
   12: 
   13: # 1. Check PowerShell version
   14: Write-Host "`n1. CHECKING POWERSHELL..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
   15: if ($PSVersionTable.PSVersion.Major -lt 5) {
   16:     Write-Host "X PowerShell 5.0 or higher required" -ForegroundColor Red
   17:     exit 1
   18: }
   19: Write-Host "V PowerShell $($PSVersionTable.PSVersion)" -ForegroundColor Green
   20: 
   21: # 2. Check required tools
   22: Write-Host "`n2. CHECKING REQUIRED TOOLS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
   23: 
   24: $tools = @(
   25:     @{Name="Node.js"; Test="node --version"; Install="https://nodejs.org"},
   26:     @{Name="Python"; Test="python --version"; Install="https://python.org"},
   27:     @{Name="Git"; Test="git --version"; Install="https://git-scm.com"}
   28: )
   29: 
   30: foreach ($tool in $tools) {
   31:     Write-Host "Checking $($tool.Name)..." -ForegroundColor Gray
   32:     try {
   33:         Invoke-Expression $tool.Test 2>$null
   34:         Write-Host "V $($tool.Name) is installed" -ForegroundColor Green
   35:     } catch {
   36:         Write-Host "X $($tool.Name) is NOT installed" -ForegroundColor Red
   37:         Write-Host "  Install from: $($tool.Install)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
   38:     }
   39: }
   40: 
   41: # 3. Create project structure
   42: Write-Host "`n3. CREATING PROJECT STRUCTURE..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
   43: 
   44: $folders = @(
   45:     "agents",
   46:     "agents\architect",
   47:     "agents\coder",
   48:     "agents\communication",
   49:     "agents\documenter",
   50:     "agents\formal_verification",
   51:     "agents\frontend_web3",
   52:     "agents\fuzzing_simulation",
   53:     "agents\quality_metrics",
   54:     "agents\smart_contract",
   55:     "agents\tester",
   56:     "agents\shared",
   57:     "config",
   58:     "context",
   59:     "memory",
   60:     "memory\vector_store",
   61:     "memory\history",
   62:     "memory\learnings",
   63:     "workspace",
   64:     "workspace\contracts",
   65:     "workspace\frontend",
   66:     "sprints",
   67:     "reports",
   68:     "logs",
   69:     "scripts",
   70:     "tests"
   71: )
   72: 
   73: foreach ($folder in $folders) {
   74:     New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $folder -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null
   75:     Write-Host "  [FOLDER] $folder" -ForegroundColor Gray
   76: }
   77: 
   78: # 4. Create essential files
   79: Write-Host "`n4. CREATING ESSENTIAL FILES..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
   80: 
   81: # package.json
   82: @'
   83: {
   84:   "name": "smart-contract-pipeline",
   85:   "version": "1.0.0",
   86:   "description": "Automated Smart Contract Development Pipeline with AI Agents",
   87:   "main": "main.py",
   88:   "scripts": {
   89:     "start": "python main.py",
   90:     "test": "python -m pytest",
   91:     "hardhat": "cd workspace\\contracts && npx hardhat",
   92:     "frontend": "cd workspace\\frontend && npm run dev"
   93:   },
   94:   "keywords": ["blockchain", "smart-contract", "ai", "web3"],
   95:   "author": "SmartContractPipeline",
   96:   "license": "MIT"
   97: }
   98: '@ | Out-File -FilePath "package.json" -Force -Encoding UTF8
   99: Write-Host "V package.json created" -ForegroundColor Green
  100: 
  101: # requirements.txt
  102: @'
  103: # Core AI & ML
  104: langchain>=0.1.0
  105: chromadb>=0.4.0
  106: 
  107: # Web3 & Blockchain
  108: web3>=6.0.0
  109: eth-account>=0.11.0
  110: 
  111: # Web Framework & API
  112: fastapi>=0.104.0
  113: requests>=2.31.0
  114: 
  115: # Data Processing
  116: pyyaml>=6.0.0
  117: python-dotenv>=1.0.0
  118: 
  119: # Utilities
  120: pydantic>=2.0.0
  121: pytest>=7.4.0
  122: '@ | Out-File -FilePath "requirements.txt" -Force -Encoding UTF8
  123: Write-Host "V requirements.txt created" -ForegroundColor Green
  124: 
  125: # Create Python virtual environment
  126: Write-Host "`n5. SETTING UP PYTHON ENVIRONMENT..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  127: if (-not (Test-Path ".venv")) {
  128:     python -m venv .venv
  129:     Write-Host "V Python virtual environment created" -ForegroundColor Green
  130: }
  131: 
  132: # Activate and install Python dependencies
  133: try {
  134:     & .\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1
  135:     python -m pip install --upgrade pip
  136:     pip install -r requirements.txt
  137:     Write-Host "V Python dependencies installed" -ForegroundColor Green
  138: } catch {
  139:     Write-Host "X Error installing Python dependencies: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
  140: }
  141: 
  142: # 6. Initialize Hardhat project
  143: Write-Host "`n6. INITIALIZING HARPHAT..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  144: Set-Location "workspace\contracts"
  145: 
  146: try {
  147:     # Check if Hardhat is installed
  148:     npx hardhat --version 2>$null
  149:     Write-Host "V Hardhat is installed" -ForegroundColor Green
  150: } catch {
  151:     Write-Host "Installing Hardhat..." -ForegroundColor Gray
  152:     npm init -y
  153:     npm install --save-dev hardhat @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox
  154: }
  155: 
  156: # Initialize Hardhat project if not exists
  157: if (-not (Test-Path "hardhat.config.js") -and -not (Test-Path "hardhat.config.ts")) {
  158:     npx hardhat init --typescript
  159:     npm install @openzeppelin/contracts ethers
  160:     Write-Host "V Hardhat project initialized" -ForegroundColor Green
  161: }
  162: 
  163: Set-Location ..\..
  164: 
  165: # 7. Create basic agent
  166: Write-Host "`n7. CREATING BASIC AGENT..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  167: 
  168: $agentCode = @'
  169: # agents/smart_contract/agent.py
  170: import json
  171: from typing import Dict, Any
  172: 
  173: class SmartContractAgent:
  174:     """Basic Smart Contract Agent"""
  175: 
  176:     def __init__(self):
  177:         self.name = "Smart Contract Agent"
  178:         self.version = "1.0.0"
  179: 
  180:     def generate_contract(self, requirements: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:
  181:         """Generate a smart contract based on requirements"""
  182:         contract_name = requirements.get("name", "MyContract")
  183: 
  184:         template = f'''// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
  185: pragma solidity ^0.8.19;
  186: 
  187: contract {contract_name} {{
  188:     address public owner;
  189:     string public name;
  190:     string public symbol;
  191: 
  192:     constructor(string memory _name, string memory _symbol) {{
  193:         owner = msg.sender;
  194:         name = _name;
  195:         symbol = _symbol;
  196:     }}
  197: 
  198:     modifier onlyOwner() {{
  199:         require(msg.sender == owner, "Not owner");
  200:         _;
  201:     }}
  202: 
  203:     function transferOwnership(address newOwner) public onlyOwner {{
  204:         require(newOwner != address(0), "Invalid address");
  205:         owner = newOwner;
  206:     }}
  207: 
  208:     function getContractInfo() public view returns (string memory, string memory, address) {{
  209:         return (name, symbol, owner);
  210:     }}
  211: }}
  212: '''
  213: 
  214:         return template
  215: 
  216:     def get_agent_info(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  217:         """Get agent information"""
  218:         return {
  219:             "name": self.name,
  220:             "version": self.version,
  221:             "capabilities": ["contract_generation", "basic_validation"]
  222:         }
  223: '@
  224: 
  225: New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path "agents\smart_contract" -Force | Out-Null
  226: $agentCode | Out-File -FilePath "agents\smart_contract\agent.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
  227: Write-Host "V Basic agent created" -ForegroundColor Green
  228: 
  229: # 8. Create test script
  230: Write-Host "`n8. CREATING TEST SCRIPT..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  231: 
  232: $testScript = @'
  233: # test_basic.py
  234: import sys
  235: import os
  236: 
  237: # Add agents directory to path
  238: sys.path.append(os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), "agents"))
  239: 
  240: def test_smart_contract_agent():
  241:     """Test the basic smart contract agent"""
  242:     print("ü§ñ Testing Smart Contract Agent")
  243:     print("=" * 40)
  244: 
  245:     try:
  246:         from smart_contract.agent import SmartContractAgent
  247: 
  248:         # Create agent
  249:         agent = SmartContractAgent()
  250:         print(f"Agent: {agent.name} v{agent.version}")
  251: 
  252:         # Test contract generation
  253:         requirements = {
  254:             "name": "MyToken",
  255:             "symbol": "MTK"
  256:         }
  257: 
  258:         contract = agent.generate_contract(requirements)
  259: 
  260:         print("‚úÖ Contract generated successfully")
  261:         print(f"üìÑ Contract length: {len(contract)} characters")
  262: 
  263:         # Show agent info
  264:         info = agent.get_agent_info()
  265:         print(f"üîß Capabilities: {', '.join(info['capabilities'])}")
  266: 
  267:         return True
  268: 
  269:     except Exception as e:
  270:         print(f"‚ùå Error: {e}")
  271:         import traceback
  272:         traceback.print_exc()
  273:         return False
  274: 
  275: if __name__ == "__main__":
  276:     success = test_smart_contract_agent()
  277:     print("=" * 40)
  278:     if success:
  279:         print("üéâ All tests passed!")
  280:     else:
  281:         print("üí• Some tests failed")
  282:     sys.exit(0 if success else 1)
  283: '@
  284: 
  285: $testScript | Out-File -FilePath "test_basic.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
  286: Write-Host "V Test script created" -ForegroundColor Green
  287: 
  288: # 9. Create main.py
  289: Write-Host "`n9. CREATING MAIN APPLICATION..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  290: 
  291: $mainApp = @'
  292: # main.py
  293: import asyncio
  294: import sys
  295: import os
  296: from typing import Dict, Any
  297: 
  298: class Pipeline:
  299:     """Main pipeline orchestrator"""
  300: 
  301:     def __init__(self):
  302:         self.agents = {}
  303: 
  304:     async def initialize(self):
  305:         """Initialize the pipeline"""
  306:         print("üöÄ Initializing Smart Contract Pipeline...")
  307: 
  308:         # Load agents
  309:         await self._load_agents()
  310: 
  311:         print(f"‚úÖ Pipeline initialized with {len(self.agents)} agents")
  312:         return True
  313: 
  314:     async def _load_agents(self):
  315:         """Load all available agents"""
  316:         agents_dir = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), "agents")
  317: 
  318:         # Load Smart Contract Agent
  319:         try:
  320:             from agents.smart_contract.agent import SmartContractAgent
  321:             self.agents["smart_contract"] = SmartContractAgent()
  322:             print("‚úÖ Smart Contract Agent loaded")
  323:         except ImportError as e:
  324:             print(f"‚ùå Failed to load Smart Contract Agent: {e}")
  325: 
  326:     async def run(self):
  327:         """Run the main pipeline"""
  328:         print("üéØ Smart Contract Pipeline Ready!")
  329:         print("=" * 50)
  330: 
  331:         while True:
  332:             print("`nAvailable commands:")
  333:             print("1. Generate Smart Contract")
  334:             print("2. Test Agent")
  335:             print("3. Exit")
  336: 
  337:             choice = input("Select option (1-3): ").strip()
  338: 
  339:             if choice == "1":
  340:                 await self.generate_contract()
  341:             elif choice == "2":
  342:                 await self.test_agent()
  343:             elif choice == "3":
  344:                 print("üëã Goodbye!")
  345:                 break
  346:             else:
  347:                 print("‚ùå Invalid choice")
  348: 
  349:     async def generate_contract(self):
  350:         """Generate a smart contract"""
  351:         print("`nüìù Smart Contract Generator")
  352:         print("-" * 30)
  353: 
  354:         name = input("Contract name: ").strip() or "MyContract"
  355:         symbol = input("Contract symbol: ").strip() or "MC"
  356: 
  357:         if "smart_contract" in self.agents:
  358:             agent = self.agents["smart_contract"]
  359: 
  360:             requirements = {
  361:                 "name": name,
  362:                 "symbol": symbol
  363:             }
  364: 
  365:             contract = agent.generate_contract(requirements)
  366: 
  367:             print("‚úÖ Contract generated!")
  368:             print("-" * 30)
  369:             print(contract[:500] + "..." if len(contract) > 500 else contract)
  370:             print("-" * 30)
  371: 
  372:             # Save to file
  373:             filename = f"contracts/{name}.sol"
  374:             os.makedirs("contracts", exist_ok=True)
  375:             with open(filename, "w") as f:
  376:                 f.write(contract)
  377: 
  378:             print(f"üìÑ Contract saved to {filename}")
  379:         else:
  380:             print("‚ùå Smart Contract Agent not available")
  381: 
  382:     async def test_agent(self):
  383:         """Test the agent"""
  384:         print("`nüß™ Testing Agent...")
  385: 
  386:         if "smart_contract" in self.agents:
  387:             agent = self.agents["smart_contract"]
  388:             info = agent.get_agent_info()
  389: 
  390:             print(f"Agent: {info['name']}")
  391:             print(f"Version: {info['version']}")
  392:             print(f"Capabilities: {', '.join(info['capabilities'])}")
  393:             print("‚úÖ Agent is working correctly")
  394:         else:
  395:             print("‚ùå No agents available")
  396: 
  397: async def main():
  398:     """Main entry point"""
  399:     pipeline = Pipeline()
  400: 
  401:     if await pipeline.initialize():
  402:         await pipeline.run()
  403:     else:
  404:         print("‚ùå Failed to initialize pipeline")
  405: 
  406: if __name__ == "__main__":
  407:     asyncio.run(main())
  408: '@
  409: 
  410: $mainApp | Out-File -FilePath "main.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
  411: Write-Host "V Main application created" -ForegroundColor Green
  412: 
  413: # 10. Create README
  414: Write-Host "`n10. CREATING DOCUMENTATION..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  415: 
  416: $readme = @'
  417: # Smart Contract Pipeline
  418: 
  419: Automated Smart Contract development pipeline with AI agents.
  420: 
  421: ## Quick Start
  422: 
  423: 1. Run the setup script:
  424: ```powershell
  425: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File .\setup.ps1

SCRIPT 6 | ShareGithub.bat
Size: 24071 bytes | Type: .bat | Modified: 2026-01-29 20:20:54.086514
