   40: 
   41: # Fonction pour cr√©er un Gist GitHub
   42: function New-GitHubGist {
   43:     param(
   44:         [string]$Token,
   45:         [string]$FileName,
   46:         [string]$Content,
   47:         [string]$Description
   48:     )
   49: 
   50:     try {
   51:         $Token = $Token.Trim()
   52: 
   53:         if ($Token -eq "ghp_********" -or $Token -eq "ghp_*" -or [string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($Token) -or $Token -match "^\*+$") {
   54:             return @{
   55:                 success = $false
   56:                 error = "Token invalide ou non configur√©"
   57:             }
   58:         }
   59: 
   60:         $body = @{
   61:             description = $Description
   62:             public = $false
   63:             files = @{
   64:                 $FileName = @{content = $Content}
   65:             }
   66:         }
   67: 
   68:         $jsonBody = $body | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10
   69: 
   70:         $headers = @{
   71:             Authorization = "token $Token"
   72:             Accept = "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
   73:             "User-Agent" = "PowerShell-Gist-Uploader"
   74:         }
   75: 
   76:         $response = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://api.github.com/gists" `
   77:                                      -Method POST `
   78:                                      -Headers $headers `
   79:                                      -Body $jsonBody `
   80:                                      -ContentType "application/json" `
   81:                                      -ErrorAction Stop
   82: 
   83:         return @{
   84:             success = $true
   85:             url = $response.html_url
   86:             id = $response.id
   87:         }
   88:     } catch {
   89:         $errorMsg = $_.Exception.Message
   90: 
   91:         if ($errorMsg -like "*401*") {
   92:             $errorMsg = "Token GitHub invalide ou expir√© (401). Reg√©n√©rez un token avec permission 'gist'."
   93:         } elseif ($errorMsg -like "*403*") {
   94:             $errorMsg = "Acc√®s refus√© (403). V√©rifiez les permissions du token."
   95:         }
   96: 
   97:         return @{
   98:             success = $false
   99:             error = $errorMsg
  100:         }
  101:     }
  102: }
  103: 
  104: # Fonction pour tester le token GitHub
  105: function Test-GitHubToken {
  106:     param([string]$Token)
  107: 
  108:     try {
  109:         $headers = @{
  110:             Authorization = "token $Token"
  111:             Accept = "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
  112:             "User-Agent" = "PowerShell-Test"
  113:         }
  114: 
  115:         $response = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri "https://api.github.com/user" -Headers $headers -ErrorAction Stop
  116:         $user = $response.Content | ConvertFrom-Json
  117: 
  118:         return @{
  119:             valid = $true
  120:             username = $user.login
  121:         }
  122:     } catch {
  123:         $errorMsg = $_.Exception.Message
  124:         if ($errorMsg -like "*401*") {
  125:             $errorMsg = "Token invalide ou expir√© (401 Unauthorized)"
  126:         }
  127: 
  128:         return @{
  129:             valid = $false
  130:             error = $errorMsg
  131:         }
  132:     }
  133: }
  134: 
  135: # Fonction pour publier sur GitHub Repository - SANS INTERACTION
  136: # Fonction ULTIME CORRIG√âE pour publier sur GitHub Repository
  137: function Publish-ToGitHubRepo {
  138:     param(
  139:         [string]$Token,
  140:         [string]$Username,
  141:         [string]$RepoName,
  142:         [string]$Description,
  143:         [bool]$IsPrivate
  144:     )
  145: 
  146:     Write-Host "`n=== PUBLICATION SUR GITHUB REPOSITORY ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  147: 
  148:     # V√©rifier et nettoyer le token
  149:     $Token = $Token.Trim()
  150: 
  151:     # Log pour d√©bogage
  152:     Write-Host "Token (premiers 10 chars): $($Token.Substring(0, [math]::Min(10, $Token.Length)))..." -ForegroundColor Gray
  153:     Write-Host "Longueur token: $($Token.Length)" -ForegroundColor Gray
  154: 
  155:     if ($Token -match "^\*+$" -or $Token -eq "ghp_********" -or [string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($Token)) {
  156:         Write-Host "‚ùå Token vide ou masqu√©" -ForegroundColor Red
  157:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Token GitHub vide ou masqu√©" }
  158:     }
  159: 
  160:     if (-not $Token.StartsWith("ghp_")) {
  161:         Write-Host "‚ùå Format de token invalide (doit commencer par 'ghp_')" -ForegroundColor Red
  162:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Format de token invalide" }
  163:     }
  164: 
  165:     # Sauvegarder le r√©pertoire original
  166:     $originalLocation = Get-Location
  167: 
  168:     try {
  169:         # V√©rifier si Git est install√©
  170:         try {
  171:             git --version | Out-Null
  172:             Write-Host "‚úì Git install√©" -ForegroundColor Gray
  173:         } catch {
  174:             Write-Host "‚úó Git non trouv√© sur le syst√®me" -ForegroundColor Red
  175:             Write-Host "Installation requise: https://git-scm.com/downloads" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  176:             return @{ success = $false; error = "Git non install√©" }
  177:         }
  178: 
  179:         # V√©rifier si le dossier existe
  180:         if (-not (Test-Path $PROJECT_PATH)) {
  181:             Write-Host "Cr√©ation du dossier: $PROJECT_PATH" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  182:             New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $PROJECT_PATH -Force | Out-Null
  183:         }
  184: 
  185:         # Se d√©placer dans le dossier du projet
  186:         Write-Host "Changement vers: $PROJECT_PATH" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  187:         Set-Location -Path $PROJECT_PATH -ErrorAction Stop
  188:         Write-Host "R√©pertoire actuel: $(Get-Location)" -ForegroundColor Gray
  189: 
  190:         # Nettoyer la configuration Git
  191:         Write-Host "Configuration Git..." -NoNewline
  192: 
  193:         # 1. Essayer avec x-access-token (recommand√© par GitHub)
  194:         $remoteUrl1 = "https://x-access-token:${Token}@github.com/${Username}/${RepoName}.git"
  195: 
  196:         # 2. Essayer avec username:token (m√©thode classique)
  197:         $encodedToken = [System.Web.HttpUtility]::UrlEncode($Token)
  198:         $remoteUrl2 = "https://${Username}:${encodedToken}@github.com/${Username}/${RepoName}.git"
  199: 
  200:         Write-Host " URL: https://github.com/${Username}/${RepoName}.git" -ForegroundColor Gray
  201:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  202: 
  203:         # Tester d'abord si on peut se connecter au repository
  204:         Write-Host "Test de connexion au repository..." -NoNewline
  205: 
  206:         # Essayer la premi√®re m√©thode
  207:         $testOutput = git ls-remote $remoteUrl1 2>&1
  208:         if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
  209:             Write-Host " ‚úì (x-access-token)" -ForegroundColor Green
  210:             $remoteUrl = $remoteUrl1
  211:         } else {
  212:             # Essayer la deuxi√®me m√©thode
  213:             $testOutput = git ls-remote $remoteUrl2 2>&1
  214:             if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
  215:                 Write-Host " ‚úì (username:token)" -ForegroundColor Green
  216:                 $remoteUrl = $remoteUrl2
  217:             } else {
  218:                 Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
  219:                 Write-Host "Impossible de se connecter au repository" -ForegroundColor Red
  220:                 Write-Host "Message: $testOutput" -ForegroundColor Red
  221: 
  222:                 Set-Location -Path $originalLocation
  223:                 return @{
  224:                     success = $false
  225:                     error = "Connexion impossible au repository. V√©rifiez:"
  226:                     details = @(
  227:                         "1. Le token est-il valide?",
  228:                         "2. Le repository '$RepoName' existe-t-il?",
  229:                         "3. Le token a-t-il la permission 'repo'?",
  230:                         "4. Le token est-il expir√©?",
  231:                         "Erreur Git: $testOutput"
  232:                     )
  233:                 }
  234:             }
  235:         }
  236: 
  237:         # Initialiser Git si n√©cessaire
  238:         if (-not (Test-Path ".git")) {
  239:             Write-Host "Initialisation Git..." -NoNewline
  240:             git init | Out-Null
  241:             Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  242:         } else {
  243:             Write-Host "‚úì Repository Git d√©j√† initialis√©" -ForegroundColor Gray
  244:         }
  245: 
  246:         # Configurer Git
  247:         git config user.name "$Username"
  248:         git config user.email "$Username@users.noreply.github.com"
  249: 
  250:         # Ajouter/supprimer remote
  251:         git remote remove origin 2>$null
  252:         git remote add origin $remoteUrl
  253: 
  254:         # Ajouter les fichiers
  255:         Write-Host "Ajout des fichiers..." -NoNewline
  256:         git add . 2>&1 | Out-Null
  257:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  258: 
  259:         # Commit
  260:         Write-Host "Commit..." -NoNewline
  261:         $commitMsg = "üöÄ Publication: $PROJECT_NAME - $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')"
  262:         git commit -m $commitMsg --quiet 2>&1 | Out-Null
  263:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  264: 
  265:         # Cr√©er la branche main
  266:         Write-Host "Configuration branche..." -NoNewline
  267:         git branch -M main 2>&1 | Out-Null
  268:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  269: 
  270:         # Push avec gestion d'erreur am√©lior√©e
  271:         Write-Host "Push vers GitHub..." -NoNewline
  272: 
  273:         # D√©sactiver les prompts
  274:         $env:GIT_TERMINAL_PROMPT = "0"
  275: 
  276:         # Ex√©cuter le push
  277:         $pushOutput = git push -u origin main --force 2>&1
  278: 
  279:         if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
  280:             Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  281:             Write-Host "‚úÖ PUBLICATION R√âUSSIE !" -ForegroundColor Green
  282:             Write-Host "Repository: https://github.com/$Username/$RepoName" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  283: 
  284:             # Afficher le dernier commit
  285:             $lastCommit = git log --oneline -1 2>$null
  286:             if ($lastCommit) {
  287:                 Write-Host "Commit: $lastCommit" -ForegroundColor Gray
  288:             }
  289: 
  290:             Set-Location -Path $originalLocation
  291:             return @{
  292:                 success = $true
  293:                 repo_url = "https://github.com/$Username/$RepoName"
  294:                 commit = $lastCommit
  295:                 message = "Publication r√©ussie"
  296:             }
  297:         } else {
  298:             Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
  299: 
  300:             # Analyser l'erreur
  301:             $errorDetails = $pushOutput -join " "
  302: 
  303:             # CORRECTION: Ne pas appeler .Trim() sur un tableau ou ErrorRecord
  304:             if ($pushOutput -is [array]) {
  305:                 $errorMessage = $pushOutput -join " "
  306:             } elseif ($pushOutput -is [string]) {
  307:                 $errorMessage = $pushOutput.Trim()
  308:             } else {
  309:                 $errorMessage = $pushOutput.ToString()
  310:             }
  311: 
  312:             Write-Host "‚ùå Erreur lors du push" -ForegroundColor Red
  313:             Write-Host "D√©tails: $errorMessage" -ForegroundColor Red
  314: 
  315:             Set-Location -Path $originalLocation
  316:             return @{
  317:                 success = $false
  318:                 error = "√âchec du push Git"
  319:                 details = $errorMessage
  320:                 git_output = $pushOutput
  321:             }
  322:         }
  323: 
  324:     } catch {
  325:         Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
  326: 
  327:         # CORRECTION: G√©rer l'erreur proprement sans .Trim()
  328:         $errorMsg = $_.Exception.Message
  329:         Write-Host "‚ùå Erreur inattendue: $errorMsg" -ForegroundColor Red
  330: 
  331:         # Essayer de revenir au r√©pertoire original
  332:         try {
  333:             Set-Location -Path $originalLocation -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
  334:         } catch {
  335:             # Ignorer
  336:         }
  337: 
  338:         return @{
  339:             success = $false
  340:             error = $errorMsg
  341:             exception_type = $_.Exception.GetType().Name
  342:         }
  343:     }
  344: }
  345: 
  346: # Fonction pour g√©n√©rer des fichiers locaux
  347: function Generate-LocalFiles {
  348:     Write-Host "`n=== G√âN√âRATION DE FICHIERS LOCAUX ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  349: 
  350:     # Analyser tous les fichiers du projet
  351:     Write-Host "Analyse des fichiers dans: $PROJECT_PATH" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  352: 
  353:     $allFiles = Get-ChildItem -Path $PROJECT_PATH -Recurse -File | Where-Object {
  354:         $relativePath = $_.FullName.Replace($PROJECT_PATH, "").TrimStart('\')
  355:         -not (Should-ExcludePath -Path $relativePath)
  356:     }
  357: 
  358:     Write-Host "Nombre de fichiers trouv√©s: $($allFiles.Count)" -ForegroundColor Green
  359: 
  360:     if ($allFiles.Count -eq 0) {
  361:         Write-Host "Aucun fichier √† traiter." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  362:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Aucun fichier trouv√©" }
  363:     }
  364: 
  365:     # Cr√©er un fichier d'index
  366:     $indexContent = @"
  367: INDEX DES FICHIERS DU PROJET: $PROJECT_NAME
  368: Date de g√©n√©ration: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
  369: Chemin du projet: $PROJECT_PATH
  370: 
  371: LISTE DES FICHIERS:
  372: "@
  373: 
  374:     $fileIndex = 1
  375:     $processedFiles = @()
  376: 
  377:     foreach ($file in $allFiles) {
  378:         $relativePath = $file.FullName.Replace($PROJECT_PATH, "").TrimStart('\')
  379:         $fileSizeKB = [math]::Round($file.Length / 1KB, 2)
  380: 
  381:         $indexContent += "`n$fileIndex. $relativePath (${fileSizeKB} KB)"
  382:         $fileIndex++
  383: 
  384:         $processedFiles += @{
  385:             FullPath = $file.FullName
  386:             RelativePath = $relativePath
  387:             Size = $file.Length
  388:             ProcessedSize = $file.Length
  389:         }
  390:     }
  391: 
  392:     # √âcrire le fichier d'index
  393:     $indexContent | Out-File -FilePath $INDEX_FILENAME -Encoding UTF8
  394:     Write-Host "‚úÖ Fichier d'index cr√©√©: $INDEX_FILENAME" -ForegroundColor Green
  395: 
  396:     # G√©n√©rer des fichiers partag√©s si n√©cessaire
  397:     $totalSize = ($processedFiles | Measure-Object -Property Size -Sum).Sum
  398:     $totalSizeMB = [math]::Round($totalSize / 1MB, 2)
  399: 
  400:     Write-Host "Taille totale des fichiers: ${totalSizeMB} MB" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  401: 
  402:     if ($totalSize -gt $MAX_FILE_SIZE) {
  403:         Write-Host "Le projet est trop volumineux, g√©n√©ration de fichiers partag√©s..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
  404: 
  405:         $groups = Optimize-FileGrouping -Files $processedFiles -MaxSize $MAX_FILE_SIZE -TargetSize $TARGET_FILE_SIZE
  406: 
  407:         $shareFiles = @()
  408:         $groupIndex = 1
  409: 
  410:         foreach ($group in $groups) {
  411:             $shareFileName = "${SHARE_FILENAME_PREFIX}_PART${groupIndex}.txt"
  412:             $shareContent = @"
  413: FICHIER PARTAG√â: $shareFileName
  414: Projet: $PROJECT_NAME
  415: Partie: $groupIndex/$($groups.Count)
  416: Date: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
  417: Taille totale: $([math]::Round($group.TotalSize/1KB, 2)) KB
  418: 
  419: "@
  420: 
  421:             foreach ($file in $group.Files) {
  422:                 $fileContent = Get-Content -Path $file.FullPath -Raw -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
  423:                 if ($fileContent) {
  424:                     $shareContent += "=" * 60 + "`n"
  425:                     $shareContent += "FICHIER: $($file.RelativePath)`n"
  426:                     $shareContent += "TAILLE: $([math]::Round($file.Size/1KB, 2)) KB`n"
  427:                     $shareContent += "=" * 60 + "`n`n"
  428:                     $shareContent += Add-LineNumbers -Content $fileContent
  429:                     $shareContent += "`n`n"
  430:                 }
  431:             }
  432: 
  433:             $shareContent | Out-File -FilePath $shareFileName -Encoding UTF8
  434:             $shareFiles += $shareFileName
  435:             Write-Host "  Fichier cr√©√©: $shareFileName ($([math]::Round($group.TotalSize/1KB, 2)) KB)" -ForegroundColor Gray
  436:             $groupIndex++
  437:         }
  438: 
  439:         Write-Host "‚úÖ $($groups.Count) fichier(s) partag√©(s) cr√©√©(s)" -ForegroundColor Green
  440: 
  441:         return @{
  442:             success = $true
  443:             index_file = $INDEX_FILENAME
  444:             share_files = $shareFiles
  445:             total_size = $totalSize
  446:             file_count = $allFiles.Count
  447:         }
  448:     } else {
  449:         Write-Host "Le projet tient dans un seul fichier." -ForegroundColor Green
  450:         return @{
  451:             success = $true
  452:             index_file = $INDEX_FILENAME
  453:             total_size = $totalSize
  454:             file_count = $allFiles.Count
  455:         }
  456:     }
  457: }
  458: 
  459: # Fonction pour partager sur GitHub Gists
  460: function Share-ToGitHubGists {
  461:     Write-Host "`n=== PARTAGE SUR GITHUB GISTS ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  462: 
  463:     # V√©rifier le token
  464:     if (-not $GITHUB_TOKEN -or $GITHUB_TOKEN -match "^\*+$" -or $GITHUB_TOKEN -eq "ghp_********") {
  465:         Write-Host "‚ùå Token GitHub non configur√©" -ForegroundColor Red
  466:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Token GitHub manquant" }
  467:     }
  468: 
  469:     # G√©n√©rer d'abord les fichiers locaux
  470:     $localResult = Generate-LocalFiles
  471:     if (-not $localResult.success) {
  472:         return $localResult
  473:     }
  474: 
  475:     $gists = @()
  476: 
  477:     # Partager le fichier d'index
  478:     if (Test-Path $INDEX_FILENAME) {
  479:         $indexContent = Get-Content -Path $INDEX_FILENAME -Raw
  480:         $indexGist = New-GitHubGist -Token $GITHUB_TOKEN `
  481:                                    -FileName "$($PROJECT_NAME)_INDEX.txt" `
  482:                                    -Content $indexContent `
  483:                                    -Description "Index du projet $PROJECT_NAME"
  484: 
  485:         if ($indexGist.success) {
  486:             Write-Host "‚úÖ Index partag√©: $($indexGist.url)" -ForegroundColor Green
  487:             $gists += @{
  488:                 type = "index"
  489:                 url = $indexGist.url
  490:             }
  491:         } else {
  492:             Write-Host "‚ùå Erreur partage index: $($indexGist.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
  493:         }
  494:     }
  495: 
  496:     # Partager les fichiers de partage
  497:     if ($localResult.share_files) {
  498:         $fileIndexCounter = 1
  499:         foreach ($shareFile in $localResult.share_files) {
  500:             if (Test-Path $shareFile) {
  501:                 $fileContent = Get-Content -Path $shareFile -Raw
  502:                 $gistResult = New-GitHubGist -Token $GITHUB_TOKEN `
  503:                                             -FileName "$($PROJECT_NAME)_PART${fileIndexCounter}.txt" `
  504:                                             -Content $fileContent `
  505:                                             -Description "Partie $fileIndexCounter du projet $PROJECT_NAME"
  506: 
  507:                 if ($gistResult.success) {
  508:                     Write-Host "‚úÖ Partie $fileIndexCounter partag√©e: $($gistResult.url)" -ForegroundColor Green
  509:                     $gists += @{
  510:                         type = "part"
  511:                         part = $fileIndexCounter
  512:                         url = $gistResult.url
  513:                     }
  514:                 } else {
  515:                     Write-Host "‚ùå Erreur partie $fileIndexCounter : $($gistResult.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
  516:                 }
  517:                 $fileIndexCounter++
  518:             }
  519:         }
  520:     }
  521: 
  522:     # Cr√©er un index des Gists
  523:     if ($gists.Count -gt 0) {
  524:         $gistsIndex = @"
  525: INDEX DES GISTS GITHUB - $PROJECT_NAME
  526: Date: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
  527: 
  528: "@
  529: 
  530:         foreach ($gist in $gists) {
  531:             if ($gist.type -eq "index") {
  532:                 $gistsIndex += "üìÑ INDEX: $($gist.url)`n"
  533:             } else {
  534:                 $gistsIndex += "üì¶ PARTIE $($gist.part): $($gist.url)`n"
  535:             }
  536:         }
  537: 
  538:         $timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd_HHmmss'
  539:         $gistsIndexFile = "GISTS_INDEX_${timestamp}.txt"
  540:         $gistsIndex | Out-File -FilePath $gistsIndexFile -Encoding UTF8
  541:         Write-Host "‚úÖ Index des Gists cr√©√© localement: $gistsIndexFile" -ForegroundColor Green
  542: 
  543:         return @{
  544:             success = $true
  545:             gists = $gists
  546:             gists_count = $gists.Count
  547:             index_file = $gistsIndexFile
  548:         }
  549:     } else {
  550:         return @{
  551:             success = $false
  552:             error = "Aucun Gist n'a pu √™tre cr√©√©"
  553:         }
  554:     }
  555: }
  556: 
  557: # Fonction pour l'optimisation
  558: function Optimize-FileGrouping {
  559:     param(
  560:         [array]$Files,
  561:         [int]$MaxSize,
  562:         [int]$TargetSize
  563:     )
  564: 
  565:     $sortedFiles = $Files | Sort-Object @{Expression = {$_.ProcessedSize}; Descending = $true}
  566: 
  567:     $groups = @()
  568:     $currentGroup = @()
  569:     $currentSize = 0
  570: 
  571:     foreach ($file in $sortedFiles) {
  572:         $fileSize = $file.ProcessedSize
  573: 
  574:         if ($fileSize -gt $MaxSize) {
  575:             Write-Host "  AVERTISSEMENT: $($file.RelativePath) est trop gros ($([math]::Round($fileSize/1KB, 2)) Ko) - sera dans son propre fichier" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  576:             if ($currentGroup.Count -gt 0) {
  577:                 $groups += @{
  578:                     Files = $currentGroup
  579:                     TotalSize = $currentSize
  580:                 }
  581:                 $currentGroup = @()
  582:                 $currentSize = 0
  583:             }
  584:             $groups += @{
  585:                 Files = @($file)
  586:                 TotalSize = $fileSize
  587:             }
  588:             continue
  589:         }
  590: 
  591:         if (($currentSize + $fileSize) -gt $TargetSize -and $currentGroup.Count -gt 0) {
  592:             $groups += @{
  593:                 Files = $currentGroup
  594:                 TotalSize = $currentSize
  595:             }
  596:             $currentGroup = @()
  597:             $currentSize = 0
  598:         }
  599: 
  600:         $currentGroup += $file
  601:         $currentSize += $fileSize
  602:     }
  603: 
  604:     if ($currentGroup.Count -gt 0) {
  605:         $groups += @{
  606:             Files = $currentGroup
  607:             TotalSize = $currentSize
  608:         }
  609:     }
  610: 
  611:     return $groups
  612: }
  613: 
  614: # Fonction pour ajouter des num√©ros de ligne
  615: function Add-LineNumbers {
  616:     param([string]$Content)
  617: 
  618:     if (-not $SHOW_LINE_NUMBERS) { return $Content }
  619: 
  620:     $lines = $Content -split "`n"
  621:     $result = @()
  622:     $i = 1
  623: 
  624:     foreach ($line in $lines) {
  625:         $result += "{0:D5}: {1}" -f $i, $line
  626:         $i++
  627:     }
  628: 
  629:     return $result -join "`n"
  630: }
  631: 
  632: # Fonction pour v√©rifier les exclusions
  633: function Should-ExcludePath {
  634:     param([string]$Path)
  635: 
  636:     if ($Path -like "*${SHARE_FILENAME_PREFIX}_*" -or $Path -like "*GISTS_INDEX*" -or $Path -like "*GITHUB_PUBLISH_*") {
  637:         return $true
  638:     }
  639: 
  640:     foreach ($pattern in $EXCLUDE_PATTERNS) {
  641:         if ($pattern -match "^\*\.") {
  642:             $ext = $pattern.Substring(1)
  643:             if ($Path -like "*$ext") { return $true }
  644:         }
  645:         elseif ($Path -like "*$pattern*") {
  646:             return $true
  647:         }
  648:     }
  649:     return $false
  650: }
  651: 
  652: # ============================================================================
  653: # SCRIPT PRINCIPAL
  654: # ============================================================================
  655: 
  656: Clear-Host
  657: Write-Host ""
  658: Write-Host ("=" * 60) -ForegroundColor Cyan
  659: Write-Host "SHARE SPLIT 1M - $PROJECT_NAME" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  660: Write-Host ("=" * 60) -ForegroundColor Cyan
  661: Write-Host ""
  662: 
  663: # V√©rifier le dossier
  664: if (-not (Test-Path $PROJECT_PATH)) {
  665:     Write-Host "ERREUR: Chemin introuvable: $PROJECT_PATH" -ForegroundColor Red
  666:     exit 1
  667: }
  668: 
  669: Write-Host "Chemin: $PROJECT_PATH" -ForegroundColor Green
  670: Write-Host ""
  671: 
  672: # ============================================================================
  673: # CONNEXION AUTOMATIQUE √Ä GITHUB (NON INTERACTIVE)
  674: # ============================================================================
  675: 
  676: $autoConnectSuccess = $false
  677: $showMenu = $true
  678: 
  679: # Correction du pattern regex pour √©viter l'erreur
  680: $validTokenPattern = "ghp_[a-zA-Z0-9]{36,}"
  681: 
  682: # V√©rifier si la configuration GitHub est compl√®te
  683: if ($GITHUB_TOKEN -and $GITHUB_TOKEN -match $validTokenPattern -and
  684:     $GITHUB_USERNAME -and $GITHUB_REPO_NAME -and
  685:     $GITHUB_TOKEN -notmatch "^\*+$" -and $GITHUB_TOKEN -ne "ghp_********") {
  686: 
  687:     Write-Host "=== CONNEXION AUTOMATIQUE GITHUB ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  688:     Write-Host "Configuration GitHub d√©tect√©e" -ForegroundColor Green
  689:     Write-Host "Utilisateur: $GITHUB_USERNAME" -ForegroundColor Gray
  690:     Write-Host "Repository: $GITHUB_REPO_NAME" -ForegroundColor Gray
  691:     Write-Host ""
  692: 
  693:     # Tester le token d'abord
  694:     Write-Host "V√©rification du token GitHub..." -NoNewline
  695:     $tokenTest = Test-GitHubToken -Token $GITHUB_TOKEN
  696: 
  697:     if ($tokenTest.valid) {
  698:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  699:         Write-Host "Token valide pour: $($tokenTest.username)" -ForegroundColor Green
  700: 
  701:         # V√©rifier si le repository existe
  702:         Write-Host "V√©rification du repository..." -NoNewline
  703:         $headers = @{
  704:             Authorization = "token $GITHUB_TOKEN"
  705:             Accept = "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
  706:         }
  707: 
  708:         try {
  709:             $repoCheck = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://api.github.com/repos/$GITHUB_USERNAME/$GITHUB_REPO_NAME" `
  710:                                           -Headers $headers `
  711:                                           -ErrorAction Stop
  712:             Write-Host " ‚úì (existe d√©j√†)" -ForegroundColor Green
  713:             $repoExists = $true
  714:         } catch {
  715:             # Le repository n'existe pas, le cr√©er automatiquement
  716:             Write-Host " ‚úó (n'existe pas)" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  717:             Write-Host "Cr√©ation automatique du repository..." -NoNewline
  718: 
  719:             $body = @{
  720:                 name = $GITHUB_REPO_NAME
  721:                 description = $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION
  722:                 private = $GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE
  723:             } | ConvertTo-Json
  724: 
  725:             try {
  726:                 $newRepo = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://api.github.com/user/repos" `
  727:                                              -Method POST `
  728:                                              -Headers $headers `
  729:                                              -Body $body `
  730:                                              -ContentType "application/json"
  731:                 Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  732:                 $repoExists = $true
  733:             } catch {
  734:                 Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
  735:                 Write-Host "Erreur cr√©ation: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
  736:                 $repoExists = $false
  737:             }
  738:         }
  739: 
  740:         if ($repoExists) {
  741:             # Publier sur GitHub automatiquement
  742:             Write-Host "Publication automatique sur GitHub..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
  743: 
  744:             $result = Publish-ToGitHubRepo -Token $GITHUB_TOKEN `
  745:                                           -Username $GITHUB_USERNAME `
  746:                                           -RepoName $GITHUB_REPO_NAME `
  747:                                           -Description $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION `
  748:                                           -IsPrivate $GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE
  749: 
  750:             if ($result.success) {
  751:                 $autoConnectSuccess = $true
  752:                 Write-Host ""
  753:                 Write-Host "‚úÖ CONNEXION AUTOMATIQUE R√âUSSIE !" -ForegroundColor Green
  754:                 Write-Host "Repository: $($result.repo_url)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  755:                 Write-Host "Commit: $($result.commit)" -ForegroundColor Gray
  756:                 Write-Host ""
  757: 
  758:                 # Demander si on veut voir le menu
  759:                 $showMenuAnswer = Read-Host "Voulez-vous voir le menu principal ? (O/N)"
  760:                 if ($showMenuAnswer -eq 'O' -or $showMenuAnswer -eq 'o') {
  761:                     $showMenu = $true
  762:                 } else {
  763:                     Write-Host "Au revoir!" -ForegroundColor Green
  764:                     exit 0
  765:                 }
  766:             } else {
  767:                 Write-Host ""
  768:                 Write-Host "‚ùå Connexion automatique √©chou√©e" -ForegroundColor Red
  769:                 if ($result.error) {
  770:                     Write-Host "Erreur: $($result.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
  771:                 }
  772:                 Write-Host ""
  773:                 $showMenu = $true
  774:             }
  775:         } else {
  776:             Write-Host "‚ùå Impossible de cr√©er le repository" -ForegroundColor Red
  777:             $showMenu = $true
  778:         }
  779:     } else {
  780:         Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
  781:         Write-Host "‚ùå Token GitHub invalide" -ForegroundColor Red
  782:         Write-Host "Erreur: $($tokenTest.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
  783:         Write-Host ""
  784:         $showMenu = $true
  785:     }
  786: } else {
  787:     Write-Host "‚ö† Configuration GitHub incompl√®te ou token masqu√©" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  788:     Write-Host "   Impossible de se connecter automatiquement √† GitHub" -ForegroundColor Gray
  789:     Write-Host ""
  790:     $showMenu = $true
  791: }
  792: 
  793: # ============================================================================
  794: # MENU PRINCIPAL
  795: # ============================================================================
  796: 
  797: if ($showMenu) {
  798:     do {
  799:         Clear-Host
  800:         Write-Host ""
  801:         Write-Host ("=" * 60) -ForegroundColor Cyan
  802:         Write-Host "SHARE SPLIT 1M - $PROJECT_NAME" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  803:         Write-Host ("=" * 60) -ForegroundColor Cyan
  804:         Write-Host ""
  805: 
  806:         if ($autoConnectSuccess) {
  807:             Write-Host "‚úÖ Publication GitHub d√©j√† effectu√©e" -ForegroundColor Green
  808:             Write-Host ""
  809:         }
  810: 
  811:         Write-Host "=== MENU PRINCIPAL ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  812:         Write-Host "1. Publier sur GitHub Repository" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  813:         Write-Host "2. Partager sur GitHub Gists" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  814:         Write-Host "3. G√©n√©rer seulement les fichiers locaux" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  815:         Write-Host "4. Quitter" -ForegroundColor Red
  816:         Write-Host ""
  817: 
  818:         $choice = Read-Host "Votre choix [1-4]"
  819: 
  820:         switch ($choice) {
  821:             '1' {
  822:                 # OPTION 1: GitHub Repository
  823:                 Write-Host "`n=== PUBLICATION GITHUB REPOSITORY ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  824: 
  825:                 # Demander les informations manquantes
  826:                 if (-not $GITHUB_TOKEN -or $GITHUB_TOKEN -match "^\*+$" -or $GITHUB_TOKEN -eq "ghp_********") {
  827:                     Write-Host ""
  828:                     Write-Host "üîë TOKEN GITHUB REQUIS" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  829:                     Write-Host "Pour cr√©er un token:" -ForegroundColor Gray
  830:                     Write-Host "1. https://github.com/settings/tokens" -ForegroundColor Gray
  831:                     Write-Host "2. 'Generate new token (classic)'" -ForegroundColor Gray
  832:                     Write-Host "3. Donnez un nom" -ForegroundColor Gray
  833:                     Write-Host "4. S√©lectionnez 'repo' (TOUTE la section)" -ForegroundColor Green
  834:                     Write-Host "5. 'Generate token'" -ForegroundColor Gray
  835:                     Write-Host "6. Copiez le token (commence par 'ghp_')" -ForegroundColor Gray
  836:                     Write-Host ""
  837: 
  838:                     $GITHUB_TOKEN = Read-Host "Collez votre token GitHub"
  839:                 }
  840: 
  841:                 if (-not $GITHUB_USERNAME) {
  842:                     $GITHUB_USERNAME = Read-Host "Nom d'utilisateur GitHub"
  843:                 }
  844: 
  845:                 if (-not $GITHUB_REPO_NAME) {
  846:                     $GITHUB_REPO_NAME = Read-Host "Nom du repository"
  847:                 }
  848: 
  849:                 # Publier sur GitHub
  850:                 $result = Publish-ToGitHubRepo -Token $GITHUB_TOKEN `
  851:                                               -Username $GITHUB_USERNAME `
  852:                                               -RepoName $GITHUB_REPO_NAME `
  853:                                               -Description $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION `
  854:                                               -IsPrivate $GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE
  855: 
  856:                 if ($result.success) {
  857:                     Write-Host ""
  858:                     Write-Host "‚úÖ Publication r√©ussie sur GitHub!" -ForegroundColor Green
  859:                     Write-Host "Repository: $($result.repo_url)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  860:                     Write-Host "Commit: $($result.commit)" -ForegroundColor Gray
  861:                     $autoConnectSuccess = $true
  862:                 } else {
  863:                     Write-Host ""
  864:                     Write-Host "‚ùå √âchec de la publication" -ForegroundColor Red
  865:                     Write-Host "Erreur: $($result.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
  866:                 }
  867: 
  868:                 Write-Host ""
  869:                 Write-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
  870:                 Read-Host
  871:             }
  872: 
  873:             '2' {
  874:                 # OPTION 2: GitHub Gists
  875:                 $result = Share-ToGitHubGists
  876:                 if ($result.success) {
  877:                     Write-Host ""
  878:                     Write-Host "‚úÖ Partage Gists r√©ussi!" -ForegroundColor Green
  879:                     Write-Host "Nombre de Gists cr√©√©s: $($result.gists_count)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  880:                     Write-Host "Index local cr√©√©: $($result.index_file)" -ForegroundColor Gray
  881:                 } else {
  882:                     Write-Host ""
  883:                     Write-Host "‚ùå √âchec du partage Gists" -ForegroundColor Red
  884:                     Write-Host "Erreur: $($result.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
  885:                 }
  886: 
  887:                 Write-Host ""
  888:                 Write-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
  889:                 Read-Host
  890:             }
  891: 
  892:             '3' {
  893:                 # OPTION 3: Fichiers locaux seulement
  894:                 $result = Generate-LocalFiles
  895:                 if ($result.success) {
  896:                     Write-Host ""
  897:                     Write-Host "‚úÖ G√©n√©ration locale r√©ussie!" -ForegroundColor Green
  898:                     Write-Host "Fichier d'index: $($result.index_file)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  899:                     if ($result.share_files) {
  900:                         Write-Host "Fichiers partag√©s: $($result.share_files.Count)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  901:                         foreach ($file in $result.share_files) {
  902:                             Write-Host "  - $file" -ForegroundColor Gray
  903:                         }
  904:                     }
  905:                     Write-Host "Nombre total de fichiers: $($result.file_count)" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  906:                 } else {
  907:                     Write-Host ""
  908:                     Write-Host "‚ùå √âchec de la g√©n√©ration locale" -ForegroundColor Red
  909:                     Write-Host "Erreur: $($result.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
  910:                 }
  911: 
  912:                 Write-Host ""
  913:                 Write-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
  914:                 Read-Host
  915:             }
  916: 
  917:             '4' {
  918:                 Write-Host "Au revoir!" -ForegroundColor Green
  919:                 exit 0
  920:             }
  921: 
  922:             default {
  923:                 Write-Host "Choix invalide!" -ForegroundColor Red
  924:                 Start-Sleep -Seconds 1
  925:             }
  926:         }
  927:     } while ($true)
  928: }
