    1: #!/usr/bin/env python3
    2: """
    3: Share GitHub V7 - Python Version
    4: Lit la configuration depuis project_config.json
    5: """
    6: 
    7: import json
    8: import os
    9: import sys
   10: import subprocess
   11: import datetime
   12: from pathlib import Path
   13: import requests
   14: import re
   15: import fnmatch
   16: 
   17: # ============================================================================
   18: # CONFIGURATION
   19: # ============================================================================
   20: 
   21: class Config:
   22:     """Charge et g√®re la configuration depuis JSON"""
   23: 
   24:     def __init__(self, config_path="../project_config.json"):
   25:         self.config_path = Path(config_path)
   26:         self.default_config = {
   27:             "PROJECT_NAME": "Structured Lending Protocol",
   28:             "PROJECT_PATH": ".",
   29:             "GITHUB_USERNAME": "poolsyncdefi-ui",
   30:             "GITHUB_REPO_NAME": "structured-lending-protocol-clean",
   31:             "GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION": "Structured Lending Protocol Clean Version",
   32:             "GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE": False,
   33:             "GITHUB_TOKEN": "",
   34:             "EXCLUDE_PATTERNS": [],
   35:             "EXCLUDE_DIRS": [],
   36:             "INCLUDE_PATTERNS": []
   37:         }
   38:         self.config = self.load_config()
   39: 
   40:     def load_config(self):
   41:         """Charge la configuration depuis le fichier JSON"""
   42:         if self.config_path.exists():
   43:             try:
   44:                 with open(self.config_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
   45:                     config = json.load(f)
   46:                 print(f"‚úì Configuration charg√©e depuis: {self.config_path}")
   47:                 return {**self.default_config, **config}  # Merge avec defaults
   48:             except Exception as e:
   49:                 print(f"‚ö† Erreur lecture config: {e}")
   50:                 return self.default_config
   51:         else:
   52:             print(f"‚ö† Fichier config non trouv√©: {self.config_path}")
   53:             print("Utilisation des valeurs par d√©faut")
   54:             return self.default_config
   55: 
   56:     def get(self, key, default=None):
   57:         """R√©cup√®re une valeur de configuration"""
   58:         return self.config.get(key, default)
   59: 
   60:     def save_token(self, token):
   61:         """Sauvegarde le token dans la config"""
   62:         self.config["GITHUB_TOKEN"] = token
   63:         try:
   64:             with open(self.config_path, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
   65:                 json.dump(self.config, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False)
   66:             print(f"‚úì Token sauvegard√© dans: {self.config_path}")
   67:             return True
   68:         except Exception as e:
   69:             print(f"‚úó Erreur sauvegarde token: {e}")
   70:             return False
   71: 
   72: # ============================================================================
   73: # FONCTIONS UTILITAIRES
   74: # ============================================================================
   75: 
   76: def run_command(cmd, cwd=None, capture_output=True):
   77:     """Ex√©cute une commande shell"""
   78:     try:
   79:         if capture_output:
   80:             result = subprocess.run(cmd, shell=True, cwd=cwd,
   81:                                   capture_output=True, text=True, encoding='utf-8')
   82:             return result.returncode, result.stdout, result.stderr
   83:         else:
   84:             result = subprocess.run(cmd, shell=True, cwd=cwd)
   85:             return result.returncode, "", ""
   86:     except Exception as e:
   87:         return -1, "", str(e)
   88: 
   89: def get_git_info():
   90:     """R√©cup√®re les informations Git"""
   91:     info = {}
   92: 
   93:     # Branche actuelle
   94:     code, stdout, _ = run_command("git branch --show-current")
   95:     if code == 0:
   96:         info['branch'] = stdout.strip()
   97: 
   98:     # Dernier commit
   99:     code, stdout, _ = run_command("git rev-parse --short HEAD")
  100:     if code == 0:
  101:         info['commit'] = stdout.strip()
  102: 
  103:     # Message du dernier commit
  104:     code, stdout, _ = run_command('git log --oneline -1 --pretty=format:"%s"')
  105:     if code == 0:
  106:         info['last_commit_msg'] = stdout.strip()
  107: 
  108:     return info
  109: 
  110: def should_exclude(path, config):
  111:     """V√©rifie si un chemin doit √™tre exclu"""
  112:     path_str = str(path).replace('\\', '/')  # Normaliser les s√©parateurs
  113:     path_name = path.name
  114: 
  115:     # V√©rifier d'abord les dossiers complets (EXCLUDE_DIRS)
  116:     exclude_dirs = config.get("EXCLUDE_DIRS", [])
  117:     path_parts = path_str.split('/')  # Utiliser '/' normalis√©
  118: 
  119:     for dir_name in exclude_dirs:
  120:         if dir_name in path_parts:
  121:             return True
  122: 
  123:     # V√©rifier les patterns avec wildcards (EXCLUDE_PATTERNS)
  124:     exclude_patterns = config.get("EXCLUDE_PATTERNS", [])
  125: 
  126:     for pattern in exclude_patterns:
  127:         # G√©rer les patterns de dossier avec /*
  128:         if pattern.endswith('/*'):
  129:             dir_pattern = pattern[:-2]
  130:             if dir_pattern in path_parts:
  131:                 return True
  132:             continue  # Ne pas v√©rifier plus loin pour les patterns de dossier
  133: 
  134:         # Pour les fichiers, utiliser fnmatch directement
  135:         if fnmatch.fnmatch(path_name, pattern) or fnmatch.fnmatch(path_str, pattern):
  136:             return True
  137: 
  138:     return False
  139: 
  140: def should_include(path, config):
  141:     """V√©rifie si un chemin doit √™tre inclus (prioritaire sur exclude)"""
  142:     path_str = str(path).replace('\\', '/')  # Normaliser les s√©parateurs
  143:     path_name = path.name
  144: 
  145:     include_patterns = config.get("INCLUDE_PATTERNS", [])
  146: 
  147:     # Si pas de patterns d'inclusion d√©finis, tout est inclus
  148:     if not include_patterns:
  149:         return True
  150: 
  151:     # V√©rifier chaque pattern d'inclusion
  152:     for pattern in include_patterns:
  153:         if fnmatch.fnmatch(path_name, pattern) or fnmatch.fnmatch(path_str, pattern):
  154:             return True
  155: 
  156:     # Si aucun pattern ne correspond, le fichier n'est pas inclus
  157:     return False
  158: 
  159: # ============================================================================
  160: # FONCTIONS DE PARTAGE
  161: # ============================================================================
  162: 
  163: def create_full_share(config):
  164:     """Cr√©e un fichier de partage complet avec num√©ros de ligne"""
  165:     print("\n" + "="*60)
  166:     print("CREATE FULL SHARE")
  167:     print("="*60)
  168: 
  169:     project_path = Path(config.get("PROJECT_PATH", "."))
  170: 
  171:     if not project_path.exists():
  172:         print(f"‚úó Chemin introuvable: {project_path}")
  173:         return False
  174: 
  175:     print(f"Chemin du projet: {project_path}")
  176:     print(f"Patterns d'inclusion: {len(config.get('INCLUDE_PATTERNS', []))}")
  177:     print(f"Dossiers exclus: {len(config.get('EXCLUDE_DIRS', []))}")
  178:     print(f"Patterns exclus: {len(config.get('EXCLUDE_PATTERNS', []))}")
  179: 
  180:     # Scanner les fichiers
  181:     print("\nScanning des fichiers...")
  182:     all_files = []
  183:     scanned = 0
  184:     excluded = 0
  185: 
  186:     for item in project_path.rglob("*"):
  187:         if item.is_file():
  188:             scanned += 1
  189: 
  190:             # V√©rifier d'abord si le fichier doit √™tre inclus
  191:             if not should_include(item, config):
  192:                 excluded += 1
  193:                 continue
  194: 
  195:             # V√©rifier ensuite si le fichier doit √™tre exclu
  196:             if should_exclude(item, config):
  197:                 excluded += 1
  198:                 continue
  199: 
  200:             all_files.append(item)
  201: 
  202:     print(f"\nR√©sultats du scan:")
  203:     print(f"  Fichiers scann√©s: {scanned}")
  204:     print(f"  Fichiers exclus: {excluded}")
  205:     print(f"  Fichiers inclus: {len(all_files)}")
  206: 
  207:     if len(all_files) == 0:
  208:         print("\n‚ö† Aucun fichier √† inclure!")
  209:         print("V√©rifiez vos patterns d'inclusion/exclusion dans project_config.json")
  210:         return False
  211: 
  212:     with open("PROJECT_SHARE.txt", "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
  213:         # En-t√™te
  214:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
  215:         f.write(f"STRUCTURED LENDING PROTOCOL - FULL PROJECT SHARE\n")
  216:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
  217:         f.write(f"GitHub: {config.get('GITHUB_USERNAME')}/{config.get('GITHUB_REPO_NAME')}\n")
  218:         f.write(f"Repo URL: https://github.com/{config.get('GITHUB_USERNAME')}/{config.get('GITHUB_REPO_NAME')}\n")
  219:         f.write(f"Date: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
  220:         f.write("\n")
  221: 
  222:         # Informations Git
  223:         git_info = get_git_info()
  224:         f.write("[GIT INFORMATION]\n")
  225:         f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
  226:         if git_info.get('branch'):
  227:             f.write(f"Branch: {git_info['branch']}\n")
  228:         if git_info.get('commit'):
  229:             f.write(f"Commit: {git_info['commit']}\n")
  230:         if git_info.get('last_commit_msg'):
  231:             f.write(f"Last commit: {git_info['last_commit_msg']}\n")
  232:         f.write("\n")
  233: 
  234:         # Parcourir les fichiers AVEC FILTRAGE
  235:         file_counters = {
  236:             'contracts': 0,
  237:             'scripts': 0,
  238:             'tests': 0,
  239:             'other': 0
  240:         }
  241: 
  242:         # Grouper les fichiers par type pour un affichage organis√©
  243:         solidity_files = [f for f in all_files if f.suffix == '.sol']
  244:         script_files = [f for f in all_files if f.suffix in ['.js', '.py', '.sh', '.bat', '.ps1', '.ts']]
  245:         test_files = [f for f in all_files if any(test_dir in str(f) for test_dir in ['test', 'tests', '__tests__'])]
  246:         other_files = [f for f in all_files if f not in solidity_files + script_files + test_files]
  247: 
  248:         # Fichiers Solidity (contrats)
  249:         if solidity_files:
  250:             f.write("[CONTRACTS DIRECTORY - *.sol files]\n")
  251:             f.write("="*80 + "\n")
  252: 
  253:             for sol_file in solidity_files:
  254:                 file_counters['contracts'] += 1
  255:                 relative_path = sol_file.relative_to(project_path)
  256: 
  257:                 f.write(f"\nFILE {file_counters['contracts']} | {relative_path}\n")
  258:                 f.write(f"Size: {sol_file.stat().st_size} bytes | Modified: {datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(sol_file.stat().st_mtime)}\n")
  259:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
  260: 
  261:                 try:
  262:                     with open(sol_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as sf:
  263:                         lines = sf.readlines()
  264:                         for i, line in enumerate(lines, 1):
  265:                             f.write(f"{i:5d}: {line.rstrip()}\n")
  266:                 except Exception as e:
  267:                     f.write(f"[ERROR READING FILE: {e}]\n")
  268: 
  269:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
  270: 
  271:         # Fichiers de scripts
  272:         if script_files:
  273:             f.write(f"\n[SCRIPTS DIRECTORY]\n")
  274:             f.write("="*80 + "\n")
  275: 
  276:             for script_file in script_files:
  277:                 file_counters['scripts'] += 1
  278:                 relative_path = script_file.relative_to(project_path)
  279: 
  280:                 f.write(f"\nSCRIPT {file_counters['scripts']} | {relative_path}\n")
  281:                 f.write(f"Size: {script_file.stat().st_size} bytes | Type: {script_file.suffix} | ")
  282:                 f.write(f"Modified: {datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(script_file.stat().st_mtime)}\n")
  283:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
  284: 
  285:                 try:
  286:                     with open(script_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as sf:
  287:                         lines = sf.readlines()
  288:                         for i, line in enumerate(lines, 1):
  289:                             f.write(f"{i:5d}: {line.rstrip()}\n")
  290:                 except Exception as e:
  291:                     f.write(f"[ERROR READING FILE: {e}]\n")
  292: 
  293:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
  294: 
  295:         # Fichiers de test
  296:         if test_files:
  297:             f.write("\n[TESTS DIRECTORY]\n")
  298:             f.write("="*80 + "\n")
  299: 
  300:             for test_file in test_files:
  301:                 file_counters['tests'] += 1
  302:                 relative_path = test_file.relative_to(project_path)
  303: 
  304:                 f.write(f"\nTEST {file_counters['tests']} | {relative_path}\n")
  305:                 f.write(f"Size: {test_file.stat().st_size} bytes | Type: {test_file.suffix} | ")
  306:                 f.write(f"Modified: {datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(test_file.stat().st_mtime)}\n")
  307:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
  308: 
  309:                 try:
  310:                     with open(test_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as tf:
  311:                         lines = tf.readlines()
  312:                         for i, line in enumerate(lines, 1):
  313:                             f.write(f"{i:5d}: {line.rstrip()}\n")
  314:                 except Exception as e:
  315:                     f.write(f"[ERROR READING FILE: {e}]\n")
  316: 
  317:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
  318: 
  319:         # Autres fichiers (selon les patterns d'inclusion)
  320:         if other_files:
  321:             f.write("\n[OTHER FILES]\n")
  322:             f.write("="*80 + "\n")
  323: 
  324:             for other_file in other_files:
  325:                 file_counters['other'] += 1
  326:                 relative_path = other_file.relative_to(project_path)
  327: 
  328:                 f.write(f"\nFILE {file_counters['other']} | {relative_path}\n")
  329:                 f.write(f"Size: {other_file.stat().st_size} bytes | Type: {other_file.suffix} | ")
  330:                 f.write(f"Modified: {datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(other_file.stat().st_mtime)}\n")
  331:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
  332: 
  333:                 try:
  334:                     with open(other_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as of:
  335:                         lines = of.readlines()
  336:                         for i, line in enumerate(lines, 1):
  337:                             f.write(f"{i:5d}: {line.rstrip()}\n")
  338:                 except Exception as e:
  339:                     f.write(f"[ERROR READING FILE: {e}]\n")
  340: 
  341:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
  342: 
  343:         # Structure du projet (version filtr√©e)
  344:         f.write("\n[PROJECT FILE STRUCTURE - FILTERED]\n")
  345:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
  346:         f.write("Listing filtered project files...\n\n")
  347: 
  348:         for item in all_files:
  349:             relative_path = item.relative_to(project_path)
  350:             f.write(f"{relative_path}\n")
  351: 
  352:         # R√©sum√©
  353:         total_files = sum(file_counters.values())
  354:         f.write("\n" + "="*80 + "\n")
  355:         f.write("[SUMMARY]\n")
  356:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
  357:         f.write(f"Total contract files: {file_counters['contracts']}\n")
  358:         f.write(f"Total script files: {file_counters['scripts']}\n")
  359:         f.write(f"Total test files: {file_counters['tests']}\n")
  360:         f.write(f"Total other files: {file_counters['other']}\n")
  361:         f.write(f"Total code files: {total_files}\n")
  362:         f.write(f"\nGenerated: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
  363:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
  364: 
  365:     print(f"\n‚úì Fichier cr√©√©: PROJECT_SHARE.txt")
  366:     print(f"‚úì Fichiers inclus: {total_files}")
  367:     print(f"  - Contrats: {file_counters['contracts']}")
  368:     print(f"  - Scripts: {file_counters['scripts']}")
  369:     print(f"  - Tests: {file_counters['tests']}")
  370:     print(f"  - Autres: {file_counters['other']}")
  371:     return True
  372: 
  373: def create_diff_share():
  374:     """Cr√©e un rapport des changements"""
  375:     print("\n" + "="*60)
  376:     print("CREATE DIFF SHARE")
  377:     print("="*60)
  378: 
  379:     # V√©rifier si on est dans un repo Git
  380:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git status")
  381:     if code != 0:
  382:         print("‚úó Pas dans un repository Git ou Git non install√©")
  383:         return False
  384: 
  385:     with open("DIFF_REPORT.txt", "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
  386:         # En-t√™te
  387:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
  388:         f.write("STRUCTURED LENDING PROTOCOL - DIFF REPORT\n")
  389:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
  390:         f.write(f"Date: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
  391:         f.write("\n")
  392: 
  393:         # Status Git
  394:         f.write("[GIT STATUS]\n")
  395:         f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
  396:         code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git status --porcelain")
  397:         if code == 0 and stdout.strip():
  398:             changed_files = stdout.strip().split('\n')
  399:             f.write(f"Changed files: {len(changed_files)}\n\n")
  400: 
  401:             for file_status in changed_files:
  402:                 if file_status.strip():
  403:                     status = file_status[:2].strip()
  404:                     filename = file_status[3:].strip()
  405:                     f.write(f"{status}: {filename}\n")
  406: 
  407:                     # Afficher les diff√©rences
  408:                     if status in ['M', 'A', '??']:
  409:                         f.write("-"*40 + "\n")
  410:                         if status == '??':  # Nouveau fichier
  411:                             if os.path.exists(filename):
  412:                                 with open(filename, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as nf:
  413:                                     lines = nf.readlines()
  414:                                     for i, line in enumerate(lines, 1):
  415:                                         f.write(f"{i:4d}: {line.rstrip()}\n")
  416:                         else:  # Fichier modifi√©
  417:                             code, diff_output, _ = run_command(f"git diff {filename}")
  418:                             if code == 0 and diff_output:
  419:                                 f.write("Changes:\n")
  420:                                 f.write(diff_output)
  421:                         f.write("-"*40 + "\n")
  422:         else:
  423:             f.write("No changes detected in the working directory.\n")
  424: 
  425:         f.write("\n" + "="*80 + "\n")
  426:         f.write("[GIT DIFF SUMMARY]\n")
  427:         f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
  428:         code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git diff --stat")
  429:         if code == 0 and stdout:
  430:             f.write(stdout)
  431:         else:
  432:             f.write("No staged changes.\n")
  433: 
  434:     print("‚úì Fichier cr√©√©: DIFF_REPORT.txt")
  435:     return True
  436: 
  437: def git_commit_push_publish(config):
  438:     """Commit, push et publication sur GitHub"""
  439:     print("\n" + "="*60)
  440:     print("GIT COMMIT + PUSH + PUBLISH TO GITHUB")
  441:     print("="*60)
  442: 
  443:     github_token = config.get("GITHUB_TOKEN")
  444:     username = config.get("GITHUB_USERNAME")
  445:     repo_name = config.get("GITHUB_REPO_NAME")
  446: 
  447:     # V√©rifier le token
  448:     if not github_token or github_token.strip() == "":
  449:         print("\nüîë TOKEN GITHUB REQUIS")
  450:         print("Pour cr√©er un token:")
  451:         print("1. https://github.com/settings/tokens")
  452:         print("2. 'Generate new token (classic)'")
  453:         print("3. Donnez un nom")
  454:         print("4. S√©lectionnez 'repo' (TOUTE la section)")
  455:         print("5. 'Generate token'")
  456:         print("6. Copiez le token (commence par 'ghp_')\n")
  457: 
  458:         github_token = input("Collez votre token GitHub: ").strip()
  459:         if github_token:
  460:             if config.save_token(github_token):
  461:                 print("‚úì Token sauvegard√©")
  462:             else:
  463:                 print("‚ö† Token non sauvegard√© dans la config")
  464:         else:
  465:             print("‚úó Aucun token fourni")
  466:             return False
  467: 
  468:     # Demander le message de commit
  469:     commit_msg = input("\nMessage de commit (ENTER pour d√©faut): ").strip()
  470:     if not commit_msg:
  471:         commit_msg = f"üöÄ Automated commit: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}"
  472: 
  473:     # √âtape 1: V√©rifier Git
  474:     print("\n1. V√©rification Git...")
  475:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git --version")
  476:     if code != 0:
  477:         print("‚úó Git non install√©")
  478:         print("T√©l√©chargez depuis: https://git-scm.com/downloads")
  479:         return False
  480:     print("‚úì Git install√©")
  481: 
  482:     # √âtape 2: Ajouter les fichiers
  483:     print("2. Ajout des fichiers...")
  484:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git add .")
  485:     if code != 0:
  486:         print(f"‚úó Erreur git add: {stderr}")
  487:         return False
  488:     print("‚úì Fichiers ajout√©s")
  489: 
  490:     # √âtape 3: Commit
  491:     print("3. Commit...")
  492:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command(f'git commit -m "{commit_msg}"')
  493:     if code != 0:
  494:         print(f"‚ö† Erreur commit (peut √™tre normal si pas de changements): {stderr}")
  495: 
  496:     # √âtape 4: Configurer remote
  497:     print("4. Configuration remote GitHub...")
  498:     remote_url = f"https://x-access-token:{github_token}@github.com/{username}/{repo_name}.git"
  499: 
  500:     # Supprimer et recr√©er le remote
  501:     run_command("git remote remove origin")
  502:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command(f'git remote add origin "{remote_url}"')
  503:     if code != 0:
  504:         print(f"‚úó Erreur configuration remote: {stderr}")
  505:         return False
  506:     print("‚úì Remote configur√©")
  507: 
  508:     # √âtape 5: Push
  509:     print("5. Push vers GitHub...")
  510:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git branch -M main")
  511:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git push -u origin main --force")
  512: 
  513:     if code == 0:
  514:         print("\n" + "="*60)
  515:         print("‚úÖ PUBLICATION R√âUSSIE !")
  516:         print("="*60)
  517:         print(f"Repository: https://github.com/{username}/{repo_name}")
  518:         print(f"Commit: {commit_msg}")
  519: 
  520:         # Afficher le dernier commit
  521:         code, last_commit, _ = run_command('git log --oneline -1')
  522:         if code == 0:
  523:             print(f"Dernier commit: {last_commit.strip()}")
  524: 
  525:         return True
  526:     else:
  527:         print(f"\n‚úó ERREUR PUSH: {stderr}")
  528: 
  529:         # Essayer m√©thode alternative
  530:         print("\nEssai m√©thode alternative...")
  531:         alt_remote_url = f"https://{username}:{github_token}@github.com/{username}/{repo_name}.git"
  532:         run_command("git remote remove origin")
  533:         run_command(f'git remote add origin "{alt_remote_url}"')
  534: 
  535:         code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git push -u origin main --force")
  536:         if code == 0:
  537:             print("‚úÖ Publication r√©ussie avec m√©thode alternative!")
  538:             print(f"Repository: https://github.com/{username}/{repo_name}")
  539:             return True
  540:         else:
  541:             print(f"‚úó √âchec m√©thode alternative: {stderr}")
  542:             return False
  543: 
  544: def share_to_github_gists(config):
  545:     """Partage sur GitHub Gists"""
  546:     print("\n" + "="*60)
  547:     print("SHARE TO GITHUB GISTS")
  548:     print("="*60)
  549: 
  550:     github_token = config.get("GITHUB_TOKEN")
  551: 
  552:     # V√©rifier le token
  553:     if not github_token or github_token.strip() == "":
  554:         print("\nüîë TOKEN GITHUB REQUIS")
  555:         print("Pour cr√©er un token:")
  556:         print("1. https://github.com/settings/tokens")
  557:         print("2. 'Generate new token (classic)'")
  558:         print("3. Donnez un nom")
  559:         print("4. S√©lectionnez 'gist' permission")
  560:         print("5. 'Generate token'")
  561:         print("6. Copiez le token (commence par 'ghp_')\n")
  562: 
  563:         github_token = input("Collez votre token GitHub (avec permission gist): ").strip()
  564:         if github_token:
  565:             if config.save_token(github_token):
  566:                 print("‚úì Token sauvegard√©")
  567:             else:
  568:                 print("‚ö† Token non sauvegard√© dans la config")
  569:         else:
  570:             print("‚úó Aucun token fourni")
  571:             return False
  572: 
  573:     # V√©rifier si le fichier de partage existe
  574:     if not os.path.exists("PROJECT_SHARE.txt"):
  575:         print("\n‚ö† PROJECT_SHARE.txt non trouv√©")
  576:         create = input("Cr√©er le fichier de partage d'abord? (o/n): ").lower()
  577:         if create == 'o':
  578:             create_full_share(config)
  579:         else:
  580:             print("‚úó Op√©ration annul√©e")
  581:             return False
  582: 
  583:     # V√©rifier la taille du fichier
  584:     file_size = os.path.getsize("PROJECT_SHARE.txt")
  585:     file_size_mb = file_size / (1024 * 1024)
  586: 
  587:     print(f"\nFichier: PROJECT_SHARE.txt")
  588:     print(f"Taille: {file_size} bytes ({file_size_mb:.2f} MB)")
  589:     print(f"Limite Gist: 1 MB")
  590: 
  591:     if file_size_mb > 1:
  592:         print("\n‚ö† Le fichier d√©passe la limite de 1 MB pour les Gists")
  593:         print("Options:")
  594:         print("1. Diviser en plusieurs Gists")
  595:         print("2. Essayer quand m√™me (peut √©chouer)")
  596:         print("3. Annuler")
  597: 
  598:         choice = input("\nVotre choix (1-3): ").strip()
  599:         if choice == '3':
  600:             return False
  601:         elif choice == '1':
  602:             return split_and_upload_gists(config, github_token)
  603: 
  604:     # Lire le contenu du fichier
  605:     try:
  606:         with open("PROJECT_SHARE.txt", 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
  607:             content = f.read()
  608:     except Exception as e:
  609:         print(f"‚úó Erreur lecture fichier: {e}")
  610:         return False
  611: 
  612:     # Pr√©parer la requ√™te API
  613:     headers = {
  614:         "Authorization": f"token {github_token}",
  615:         "Accept": "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
  616:     }
  617: 
  618:     data = {
  619:         "description": f"{config.get('PROJECT_NAME')} - Full Project Share {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}",
  620:         "public": False,
  621:         "files": {
  622:             "PROJECT_SHARE.txt": {
  623:                 "content": content
  624:             }
  625:         }
  626:     }
  627: 
  628:     print("\nEnvoi vers GitHub Gists...")
  629:     try:
  630:         response = requests.post("https://api.github.com/gists",
  631:                                 headers=headers,
  632:                                 json=data)
  633: 
  634:         if response.status_code == 201:
  635:             gist_data = response.json()
  636:             gist_url = gist_data["html_url"]
  637:             gist_id = gist_data["id"]
  638: 
  639:             print("\n" + "="*60)
  640:             print("‚úÖ GIST CR√â√â AVEC SUCC√àS !")
  641:             print("="*60)
  642:             print(f"URL: {gist_url}")
  643:             print(f"ID: {gist_id}")
  644: 
  645:             # Sauvegarder l'info du Gist
  646:             with open("GIST_INFO.txt", "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
  647:                 f.write(f"Gist URL: {gist_url}\n")
  648:                 f.write(f"Gist ID: {gist_id}\n")
  649:                 f.write(f"Created: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
  650:                 f.write(f"Description: {data['description']}\n")
  651:                 f.write(f"File: PROJECT_SHARE.txt\n")
  652:                 f.write(f"Size: {file_size} bytes\n")
  653: 
  654:             print(f"\n‚úì Informations sauvegard√©es dans: GIST_INFO.txt")
  655:             return True
  656:         else:
  657:             print(f"‚úó Erreur API GitHub: {response.status_code}")
  658:             print(f"Message: {response.text}")
  659:             return False
  660: 
  661:     except Exception as e:
  662:         print(f"‚úó Erreur connexion: {e}")
  663:         return False
  664: 
  665: def split_and_upload_gists(config, github_token):
  666:     """Divise et upload sur plusieurs Gists"""
  667:     print("\n" + "="*60)
  668:     print("SPLIT AND UPLOAD TO MULTIPLE GISTS")
  669:     print("="*60)
  670: 
  671:     # Lire le fichier
  672:     try:
  673:         with open("PROJECT_SHARE.txt", 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
  674:             lines = f.readlines()
  675:     except Exception as e:
  676:         print(f"‚úó Erreur lecture fichier: {e}")
  677:         return False
  678: 
  679:     total_lines = len(lines)
  680:     max_lines_per_gist = 10000  # Environ 500KB-1MB selon la taille des lignes
  681:     num_parts = (total_lines // max_lines_per_gist) + 1
  682: 
  683:     print(f"Lignes totales: {total_lines}")
  684:     print(f"Lignes par Gist: {max_lines_per_gist}")
  685:     print(f"Nombre de parties: {num_parts}")
  686: 
  687:     gist_urls = []
  688: 
  689:     for part_num in range(1, num_parts + 1):
  690:         start_idx = (part_num - 1) * max_lines_per_gist
  691:         end_idx = min(part_num * max_lines_per_gist, total_lines)
  692: 
  693:         print(f"\nPartie {part_num}/{num_parts} (lignes {start_idx+1}-{end_idx})")
  694: 
  695:         # Extraire les lignes pour cette partie
  696:         part_lines = lines[start_idx:end_idx]
  697:         part_content = "".join(part_lines)
  698: 
  699:         # Pr√©parer la requ√™te API
  700:         headers = {
  701:             "Authorization": f"token {github_token}",
  702:             "Accept": "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
  703:         }
  704: 
  705:         data = {
  706:             "description": f"{config.get('PROJECT_NAME')} - Part {part_num}/{num_parts} {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}",
  707:             "public": False,
  708:             "files": {
  709:                 f"PROJECT_SHARE_PART{part_num}.txt": {
  710:                     "content": part_content
  711:                 }
  712:             }
  713:         }
  714: 
  715:         try:
  716:             response = requests.post("https://api.github.com/gists",
  717:                                     headers=headers,
  718:                                     json=data)
  719: 
  720:             if response.status_code == 201:
  721:                 gist_data = response.json()
  722:                 gist_url = gist_data["html_url"]
  723:                 gist_urls.append(gist_url)
  724:                 print(f"‚úì Partie {part_num} cr√©√©e: {gist_url}")
  725:             else:
  726:                 print(f"‚úó Erreur partie {part_num}: {response.status_code}")
  727: 
  728:         except Exception as e:
  729:             print(f"‚úó Erreur partie {part_num}: {e}")
  730: 
  731:     # Cr√©er un index des Gists
  732:     if gist_urls:
  733:         with open("GISTS_INDEX.txt", "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
  734:             f.write("="*60 + "\n")
  735:             f.write("GITHUB GISTS INDEX\n")
  736:             f.write("="*60 + "\n")
  737:             f.write(f"Project: {config.get('PROJECT_NAME')}\n")
  738:             f.write(f"Split into: {len(gist_urls)} parts\n")
  739:             f.write(f"Date: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
  740:             f.write("\nGIST URLs:\n\n")
  741: 
  742:             for i, url in enumerate(gist_urls, 1):
  743:                 f.write(f"Part {i}: {url}\n")
  744: 
  745:         print("\n" + "="*60)
  746:         print("‚úÖ TOUS LES GISTS CR√â√âS !")
  747:         print("="*60)
  748:         print(f"Nombre de Gists: {len(gist_urls)}")
  749:         print(f"Index sauvegard√© dans: GISTS_INDEX.txt")
  750: 
  751:         # Afficher les URLs
  752:         print("\nURLs des Gists:")
  753:         for i, url in enumerate(gist_urls, 1):
  754:             print(f"  Part {i}: {url}")
  755: 
  756:         return True
  757: 
  758:     return False
  759: 
  760: # ============================================================================
  761: # MENU PRINCIPAL
  762: # ============================================================================
  763: 
  764: def clear_screen():
  765:     """Efface l'√©cran"""
  766:     os.system('cls' if os.name == 'nt' else 'clear')
  767: 
  768: def main_menu(config):
  769:     """Affiche le menu principal"""
  770:     while True:
  771:         clear_screen()
  772:         print("\n" + "="*60)
  773:         print(f"SHARE GITHUB V7 - {config.get('PROJECT_NAME')}")
  774:         print("="*60)
  775:         print(f"Repo: {config.get('GITHUB_USERNAME')}/{config.get('GITHUB_REPO_NAME')}")
  776:         print(f"Path: {config.get('PROJECT_PATH')}")
  777: 
  778:         # Afficher le statut du token
  779:         token = config.get("GITHUB_TOKEN")
  780:         if token and token.strip() != "":
  781:             print(f"GitHub: CONFIGUR√â {'*' * min(len(token), 10)}...")
  782:         else:
  783:             print("GitHub: NON CONFIGUR√â")
  784: 
  785:         print("\n" + "="*60)
  786:         print("MENU PRINCIPAL")
  787:         print("="*60)
  788:         print("1. CREATE FULL SHARE (all files with line numbers)")
  789:         print("2. CREATE DIFF SHARE (changed files only)")
  790:         print("3. GIT COMMIT + PUSH + PUBLISH TO GITHUB")
  791:         print("4. SHARE TO GITHUB GISTS")
  792:         print("5. CONFIGURATION")
  793:         print("6. EXIT")
  794:         print("="*60)
  795: 
  796:         choice = input("\nVotre choix (1-6): ").strip()
  797: 
  798:         if choice == "1":
  799:             create_full_share(config)
  800:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
  801: 
  802:         elif choice == "2":
  803:             create_diff_share()
  804:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
  805: 
  806:         elif choice == "3":
  807:             git_commit_push_publish(config)
  808:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
  809: 
  810:         elif choice == "4":
  811:             share_to_github_gists(config)
  812:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
  813: 
  814:         elif choice == "5":
  815:             configuration_menu(config)
  816: 
  817:         elif choice == "6":
  818:             print("\nAu revoir!")
  819:             break
  820: 
  821:         else:
  822:             print("Choix invalide!")
  823:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
  824: 
  825: def configuration_menu(config):
  826:     """Menu de configuration"""
  827:     while True:
  828:         clear_screen()
  829:         print("\n" + "="*60)
  830:         print("CONFIGURATION")
  831:         print("="*60)
  832: 
  833:         print("\nConfiguration actuelle:")
  834:         print(f"1. PROJECT_NAME: {config.get('PROJECT_NAME')}")
  835:         print(f"2. PROJECT_PATH: {config.get('PROJECT_PATH')}")
  836:         print(f"3. GITHUB_USERNAME: {config.get('GITHUB_USERNAME')}")
  837:         print(f"4. GITHUB_REPO_NAME: {config.get('GITHUB_REPO_NAME')}")
  838: 
  839:         token = config.get("GITHUB_TOKEN")
  840:         if token and token.strip() != "":
  841:             masked_token = token[:4] + "*" * (len(token) - 8) + token[-4:] if len(token) > 8 else "***"
  842:             print(f"5. GITHUB_TOKEN: {masked_token}")
  843:         else:
  844:             print("5. GITHUB_TOKEN: NON CONFIGUR√â")
  845: 
  846:         print(f"6. EXCLUDE_PATTERNS: {len(config.get('EXCLUDE_PATTERNS', []))} patterns")
  847:         print(f"7. EXCLUDE_DIRS: {len(config.get('EXCLUDE_DIRS', []))} dossiers")
  848:         print(f"8. INCLUDE_PATTERNS: {len(config.get('INCLUDE_PATTERNS', []))} patterns")
  849: 
  850:         print("\n9. Tester la connexion GitHub")
  851:         print("10. Sauvegarder la configuration")
  852:         print("11. Retour au menu principal")
  853:         print("="*60)
  854: 
  855:         choice = input("\nVotre choix (1-11): ").strip()
  856: 
  857:         if choice == "1":
  858:             new_name = input(f"Nouveau PROJECT_NAME [{config.get('PROJECT_NAME')}]: ").strip()
  859:             if new_name:
  860:                 config.config["PROJECT_NAME"] = new_name
  861: 
  862:         elif choice == "2":
  863:             new_path = input(f"Nouveau PROJECT_PATH [{config.get('PROJECT_PATH')}]: ").strip()
  864:             if new_path:
  865:                 config.config["PROJECT_PATH"] = new_path
  866: 
  867:         elif choice == "3":
  868:             new_user = input(f"Nouveau GITHUB_USERNAME [{config.get('GITHUB_USERNAME')}]: ").strip()
  869:             if new_user:
  870:                 config.config["GITHUB_USERNAME"] = new_user
  871: 
  872:         elif choice == "4":
  873:             new_repo = input(f"Nouveau GITHUB_REPO_NAME [{config.get('GITHUB_REPO_NAME')}]: ").strip()
  874:             if new_repo:
  875:                 config.config["GITHUB_REPO_NAME"] = new_repo
  876: 
  877:         elif choice == "5":
  878:             new_token = input("Nouveau GITHUB_TOKEN (ENTER pour effacer): ").strip()
  879:             config.config["GITHUB_TOKEN"] = new_token
  880: 
  881:         elif choice == "6":
  882:             print(f"\nEXCLUDE_PATTERNS actuel:")
  883:             for i, pattern in enumerate(config.get('EXCLUDE_PATTERNS', [])[:10], 1):
  884:                 print(f"  {i}. {pattern}")
  885:             if len(config.get('EXCLUDE_PATTERNS', [])) > 10:
  886:                 print(f"  ... et {len(config.get('EXCLUDE_PATTERNS', [])) - 10} autres")
  887:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
  888: 
  889:         elif choice == "7":
  890:             print(f"\nEXCLUDE_DIRS actuel:")
  891:             for i, dir_name in enumerate(config.get('EXCLUDE_DIRS', [])[:10], 1):
  892:                 print(f"  {i}. {dir_name}")
  893:             if len(config.get('EXCLUDE_DIRS', [])) > 10:
  894:                 print(f"  ... et {len(config.get('EXCLUDE_DIRS', [])) - 10} autres")
  895:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
  896: 
  897:         elif choice == "8":
  898:             print(f"\nINCLUDE_PATTERNS actuel:")
  899:             for i, pattern in enumerate(config.get('INCLUDE_PATTERNS', [])[:10], 1):
  900:                 print(f"  {i}. {pattern}")
  901:             if len(config.get('INCLUDE_PATTERNS', [])) > 10:
  902:                 print(f"  ... et {len(config.get('INCLUDE_PATTERNS', [])) - 10} autres")
  903:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
  904: 
  905:         elif choice == "9":
  906:             test_github_connection(config)
  907:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
  908: 
  909:         elif choice == "10":
  910:             try:
  911:                 with open(config.config_path, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
  912:                     json.dump(config.config, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False)
  913:                 print("‚úì Configuration sauvegard√©e!")
  914:             except Exception as e:
  915:                 print(f"‚úó Erreur sauvegarde: {e}")
  916:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
  917: 
  918:         elif choice == "11":
  919:             break
  920: 
  921: def test_github_connection(config):
  922:     """Teste la connexion √† l'API GitHub"""
  923:     print("\n" + "="*60)
  924:     print("TEST CONNEXION GITHUB")
  925:     print("="*60)
  926: 
  927:     token = config.get("GITHUB_TOKEN")
  928:     if not token or token.strip() == "":
  929:         print("‚úó Token GitHub non configur√©")
  930:         return
  931: 
  932:     headers = {
  933:         "Authorization": f"token {token}",
  934:         "Accept": "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
  935:     }
  936: 
  937:     try:
  938:         response = requests.get("https://api.github.com/user", headers=headers)
  939: 
  940:         if response.status_code == 200:
  941:             user_data = response.json()
  942:             print(f"‚úÖ Connexion r√©ussie!")
  943:             print(f"   Utilisateur: {user_data.get('login')}")
  944:             print(f"   Nom: {user_data.get('name', 'Non d√©fini')}")
  945:             print(f"   Email: {user_data.get('email', 'Non d√©fini')}")
  946: 
  947:             # Tester les permissions
  948:             print("\nüîç Test des permissions...")
  949: 
  950:             # Tester permission gist
  951:             try:
  952:                 gist_response = requests.post("https://api.github.com/gists",
  953:                                             headers=headers,
  954:                                             json={"description": "Test", "public": False, "files": {"test.txt": {"content": "test"}}})
  955:                 if gist_response.status_code in [201, 401, 403]:
  956:                     print(f"   Permission gist: {'‚úÖ' if gist_response.status_code == 201 else '‚úó'}")
  957:             except:
  958:                 print("   Permission gist: ‚úó")
  959: 
  960:         else:
  961:             print(f"‚úó Erreur connexion: {response.status_code}")
  962:             print(f"   Message: {response.text}")
  963: 
  964:     except Exception as e:
  965:         print(f"‚úó Erreur r√©seau: {e}")
  966: 
  967: # ============================================================================
  968: # POINT D'ENTR√âE
  969: # ============================================================================
  970: 
  971: if __name__ == "__main__":
  972:     print("\n" + "="*60)
  973:     print("SHARE GITHUB V7 - Python Version")
  974:     print("="*60)
  975: 
  976:     # Charger la configuration
  977:     config = Config()
  978: 
  979:     try:
  980:         main_menu(config)
  981:     except KeyboardInterrupt:
  982:         print("\n\nProgramme interrompu. Au revoir!")
  983:     except Exception as e:
  984:         print(f"\n‚úó Erreur inattendue: {e}")
  985:         import traceback
  986:         traceback.print_exc()
  987:         input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour quitter...")
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SCRIPT 10 | stop-all.ps1
Size: 958 bytes | Type: .ps1 | Modified: 2026-01-19 17:29:54.532875
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    1: # stop-all.ps1
    2: Write-Host "=== ARRET DU SYSTEME ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
    3: 
    4: # Arr√™ter tous les processus
    5: $processes = @("anvil", "node", "ollama", "python")
    6: 
    7: foreach ($process in $processes) {
    8:     Write-Host "Arr√™t de $process..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    9:     Get-Process -Name $process -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force
   10: }
   11: 
   12: # Sauvegarder l'√©tat
   13: $timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyyMMdd_HHmmss"
   14: $backupDir = "$env:USERPROFILE\Projects\SmartContractPipeline\backups\$timestamp"
   15: 
   16: New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $backupDir | Out-Null
   17: 
   18: Copy-Item -Path "$env:USERPROFILE\Projects\SmartContractPipeline\reports\*" -Destination "$backupDir\" -Recurse -Force
   19: Copy-Item -Path "$env:USERPROFILE\Projects\SmartContractPipeline\workspace\contracts\out\*" -Destination "$backupDir\" -Recurse -Force
   20: 
   21: Write-Host "`n‚úÖ Systeme arrete proprement" -ForegroundColor Green
   22: Write-Host "üìÅ Backup sauvegarde dans: $backupDir" -ForegroundColor Cyan
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SCRIPT 11 | v1_deploy-all-agents.ps1
Size: 37826 bytes | Type: .ps1 | Modified: 2026-01-16 20:49:14.313256
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    1: # deploy-all-agents.ps1
    2: Write-Host "=== DEPLOIEMENT COMPLET DES 9 AGENTS ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
    3: Write-Host "Date: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')" -ForegroundColor Gray
    4: Write-Host ""
    5: 
    6: $projectPath = "$env:USERPROFILE\Projects\SmartContractPipeline"
    7: if (-not (Test-Path $projectPath)) {
    8:     Write-Host "Cr√©ation du dossier projet..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    9:     New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $projectPath -Force | Out-Null
   10: }
   11: 
   12: Set-Location $projectPath
   13: 
   14: # 1. Cr√©er la structure compl√®te des agents
   15: Write-Host "1. CREATION DE LA STRUCTURE DES AGENTS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
   16: $agentsStructure = @{
   17:     "agents/architect" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py")
   18:     "agents/coder" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py")
   19:     "agents/communication" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "message_bus.py", "event_system.py")
   20:     "agents/documenter" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py")
   21:     "agents/formal_verification" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py")
   22:     "agents/frontend_web3" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py", "web3_hooks.py")
   23:     "agents/fuzzing_simulation" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py", "simulator.py")
   24:     "agents/quality_metrics" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py", "metrics.py")
   25:     "agents/smart_contract" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py", "security.py")
   26:     "agents/tester" = @("config.yaml", "agent.py", "tools.py", "test_generator.py")
   27:     "agents/orchestrator" = @("orchestrator.py", "task_manager.py", "state_manager.py")
   28:     "agents/shared" = @("base_agent.py", "memory.py", "context_manager.py")
   29: }
   30: 
   31: foreach ($folder in $agentsStructure.Keys) {
   32:     $fullPath = "$projectPath\$folder"
   33:     New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $fullPath -Force | Out-Null
   34: 
   35:     foreach ($file in $agentsStructure[$folder]) {
   36:         $filePath = "$fullPath\$file"
   37:         if (-not (Test-Path $filePath)) {
   38:             New-Item -ItemType File -Path $filePath -Force | Out-Null
   39:         }
   40:     }
   41:     Write-Host "   üìÅ $folder cr√©√©" -ForegroundColor Green
   42: }
   43: 
   44: # 2. Cr√©er le fichier de versions
   45: Write-Host "`n2. CREATION DU FICHIER DE VERSIONS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
   46: $versions = @{
   47:     timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
   48:     system = @{
   49:         os = "Windows $( [System.Environment]::OSVersion.Version.ToString())"
   50:         powershell = $PSVersionTable.PSVersion.ToString()
   51:     }
   52:     tools = @{}
   53:     python = @{}
   54:     node = @{}
   55:     blockchain = @{}
   56:     agents = @{}
   57: }
   58: 
   59: # R√©cup√©rer les versions des outils
   60: try { $versions.tools.git = (git --version 2>&1).ToString().Replace('git version ', '').Trim() } catch { $versions.tools.git = "N/A" }
   61: try { $versions.tools.docker = (docker --version 2>&1).ToString().Replace('Docker version ', '').Split(',')[0].Trim() } catch { $versions.tools.docker = "N/A" }
   62: 
   63: # R√©cup√©rer les versions Python
   64: try {
   65:     $pythonVersion = (python --version 2>&1).ToString().Replace('Python ', '').Trim()
   66:     $versions.python.version = $pythonVersion
   67: 
   68:     # Packages Python
   69:     $pythonPackages = @("langchain", "chromadb", "requests", "web3", "aiohttp")
   70:     foreach ($pkg in $pythonPackages) {
   71:         try {
   72:             $version = python -c "import $pkg; print(getattr($pkg, '__version__', 'N/A'))" 2>$null
   73:             if (-not $version -or $version -eq "N/A") {
   74:                 $version = pip show $pkg 2>$null | Select-String "Version:" | ForEach-Object { $_.ToString().Replace('Version: ', '').Trim() }
   75:             }
   76:             $versions.python.$pkg = $version
   77:         } catch {
   78:             $versions.python.$pkg = "N/A"
   79:         }
   80:     }
   81: } catch { $versions.python.version = "N/A" }
   82: 
   83: # R√©cup√©rer les versions Node.js
   84: try {
   85:     $nodeVersion = (node --version 2>&1).ToString().Replace('v', '').Trim()
   86:     $versions.node.version = $nodeVersion
   87: 
   88:     # Packages Node.js globaux
   89:     $nodePackages = @("npm", "yarn", "hardhat", "typescript", "next")
   90:     foreach ($pkg in $nodePackages) {
   91:         try {
   92:             if ($pkg -eq "npm") {
   93:                 $version = (npm --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim()
   94:             } elseif ($pkg -eq "next") {
   95:                 $version = (npx next --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim()
   96:             } else {
   97:                 $version = (npx $pkg --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim()
   98:             }
   99:             $versions.node.$pkg = $version
  100:         } catch {
  101:             $versions.node.$pkg = "N/A"
  102:         }
  103:     }
  104: } catch { $versions.node.version = "N/A" }
  105: 
  106: # R√©cup√©rer les versions blockchain
  107: try { $versions.blockchain.foundry = (forge --version 2>&1 | Select-String "forge").ToString().Split(' ')[1].Trim() } catch { $versions.blockchain.foundry = "N/A" }
  108: try { $versions.blockchain.slither = (slither --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim() } catch { $versions.blockchain.slither = "N/A" }
  109: try { $versions.blockchain.anvil = (anvil --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim() } catch { $versions.blockchain.anvil = "N/A" }
  110: 
  111: # Sauvegarder les versions
  112: $versions | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10 | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\config\versions.json" -Force
  113: Write-Host "   ‚úÖ Fichier de versions cr√©√©" -ForegroundColor Green
  114: 
  115: # 3. Cr√©er les configurations des agents
  116: Write-Host "`n3. CREATION DES CONFIGURATIONS D'AGENTS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  117: 
  118: # Agent Architecte

  482: 
  483: # Agent Tester
  484: $testerConfig = @"
  485: # agents/tester/config.yaml
  486: agent_id: "tester_001"
  487: name: "Agent Testeur"
  488: version: "1.0.0"
  489: model: "ollama:qwen2.5:7b"
  490: temperature: 0.4
  491: description: "G√©n√®re et ex√©cute des tests automatis√©s"
  492: 
  493: tools:
  494:   - name: "test_generator"
  495:     version: "1.0.0"
  496:     type: "auto_test_gen"
  497: 
  498:   - name: "test_executor"
  499:     version: "1.0.0"
  500:     type: "test_runner"
  501: 
  502:   - name: "coverage_tool"
  503:     version: "1.0.0"
  504:     type: "coverage.py"
  505: 
  506: context:
  507:   test_types: ["Unit", "Integration", "E2E", "Performance", "Security"]
  508:   frameworks: ["pytest", "jest", "forge test", "playwright"]
  509:   coverage_targets: {"unit": 90, "integration": 80, "e2e": 70}
  510: 
  511: outputs:
  512:   - test_reports/
  513:   - coverage_reports/
  514:   - bug_reports/
  515:   - test_data/
  516: 
  517: dependencies:
  518:   python: ">=3.8"
  519:   node: ">=18.0.0"
  520: "@
  521: 
  522: $testerConfig | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\agents\tester\config.yaml" -Force -Encoding UTF8
  523: 
  524: Write-Host "   ‚úÖ Configurations des 9 agents cr√©√©es" -ForegroundColor Green
  525: 
  526: # 4. Cr√©er le base_agent.py (classe parente)
  527: Write-Host "`n4. CREATION DE LA CLASSE BASE AGENT..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  528: $baseAgentCode = @'
  529: # agents/shared/base_agent.py
  530: import asyncio
  531: import json
  532: import logging
  533: from abc import ABC, abstractmethod
  534: from pathlib import Path
  535: from typing import Dict, Any, Optional
  536: import yaml
  537: 
  538: class BaseAgent(ABC):
  539:     """Classe de base pour tous les agents"""
  540: 
  541:     def __init__(self, config_path: str):
  542:         self.config = self._load_config(config_path)
  543:         self.agent_id = self.config.get("agent_id", "unknown")
  544:         self.name = self.config.get("name", "Unnamed Agent")
  545:         self.version = self.config.get("version", "1.0.0")
  546:         self.logger = self._setup_logger()
  547:         self.memory = {}
  548:         self.context = {}
  549: 
  550:     def _load_config(self, config_path: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  551:         """Charge la configuration YAML"""
  552:         try:
  553:             with open(config_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
  554:                 return yaml.safe_load(f)
  555:         except Exception as e:
  556:             print(f"Erreur lors du chargement de la configuration: {e}")
  557:             return {}
  558: 
  559:     def _setup_logger(self) -> logging.Logger:
  560:         """Configure le logger"""
  561:         logger = logging.getLogger(self.agent_id)
  562:         if not logger.handlers:
  563:             logger.setLevel(logging.INFO)
  564:             handler = logging.StreamHandler()
  565:             formatter = logging.Formatter(
  566:                 f'%(asctime)s - {self.agent_id} - %(levelname)s - %(message)s'
  567:             )
  568:             handler.setFormatter(formatter)
  569:             logger.addHandler(handler)
  570:         return logger
  571: 
  572:     @abstractmethod
  573:     async def initialize(self) -> bool:
  574:         """Initialise l'agent"""
  575:         pass
  576: 
  577:     @abstractmethod
  578:     async def execute(self, task: Dict[str, Any], context: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  579:         """Ex√©cute une t√¢che"""
  580:         pass
  581: 
  582:     async def load_context(self, context_path: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  583:         """Charge le contexte depuis un fichier"""
  584:         try:
  585:             if Path(context_path).exists():
  586:                 with open(context_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
  587:                     self.context = json.load(f)
  588:                     self.logger.info(f"Contexte charg√© depuis {context_path}")
  589:                     return self.context
  590:         except Exception as e:
  591:             self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors du chargement du contexte: {e}")
  592:         return {}
  593: 
  594:     async def save_memory(self, memory_path: str) -> bool:
  595:         """Sauvegarde la m√©moire de l'agent"""
  596:         try:
  597:             memory_dir = Path(memory_path).parent
  598:             memory_dir.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
  599: 
  600:             with open(memory_path, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
  601:                 json.dump(self.memory, f, indent=2)
  602: 
  603:             self.logger.info(f"M√©moire sauvegard√©e dans {memory_path}")
  604:             return True
  605:         except Exception as e:
  606:             self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors de la sauvegarde de la m√©moire: {e}")
  607:             return False
  608: 
  609:     def get_agent_info(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  610:         """Retourne les informations de l'agent"""
  611:         return {
  612:             "agent_id": self.agent_id,
  613:             "name": self.name,
  614:             "version": self.version,
  615:             "config": self.config,
  616:             "tools": self.config.get("tools", []),
  617:             "dependencies": self.config.get("dependencies", {})
  618:         }
  619: 
  620:     async def health_check(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  621:         """V√©rifie la sant√© de l'agent"""
  622:         return {
  623:             "status": "healthy",
  624:             "agent_id": self.agent_id,
  625:             "timestamp": asyncio.get_event_loop().time(),
  626:             "memory_usage": len(str(self.memory)),
  627:             "context_loaded": bool(self.context)
  628:         }
  629: '@
  630: 
  631: $baseAgentCode | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\agents\shared\base_agent.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
  632: 
  633: # 5. Cr√©er l'orchestrateur principal
  634: Write-Host "`n5. CREATION DE L'ORCHESTRATEUR PRINCIPAL..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  635: $orchestratorCode = @'
  636: # agents/orchestrator/orchestrator.py
  637: import asyncio
  638: import json
  639: import yaml
  640: from typing import Dict, List, Any, Optional
  641: from pathlib import Path
  642: import logging
  643: from datetime import datetime
  644: 
  645: class Orchestrator:
  646:     """Orchestrateur principal qui g√®re tous les agents"""
  647: 
  648:     def __init__(self, project_root: str = "."):
  649:         self.project_root = Path(project_root)
  650:         self.agents = {}
  651:         self.agent_status = {}
  652:         self.task_queue = asyncio.Queue()
  653:         self.results = {}
  654:         self.versions = self._load_versions()
  655: 
  656:         # Configuration
  657:         self.config = {
  658:             "max_concurrent_tasks": 3,
  659:             "task_timeout": 300,  # 5 minutes
  660:             "retry_attempts": 3
  661:         }
  662: 
  663:         self.logger = self._setup_logger()
  664: 
  665:     def _setup_logger(self) -> logging.Logger:
  666:         """Configure le logger"""
  667:         logger = logging.getLogger("orchestrator")
  668:         logger.setLevel(logging.INFO)
  669: 
  670:         if not logger.handlers:
  671:             # Handler console
  672:             console_handler = logging.StreamHandler()
  673:             console_formatter = logging.Formatter(
  674:                 '%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s'
  675:             )
  676:             console_handler.setFormatter(console_formatter)
  677:             logger.addHandler(console_handler)
  678: 
  679:             # Handler fichier
  680:             log_file = self.project_root / "logs" / "orchestrator.log"
  681:             log_file.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
  682: 
  683:             file_handler = logging.FileHandler(log_file, encoding='utf-8')
  684:             file_formatter = logging.Formatter(
  685:                 '%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s'
  686:             )
  687:             file_handler.setFormatter(file_formatter)
  688:             logger.addHandler(file_handler)
  689: 
  690:         return logger
  691: 
  692:     def _load_versions(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  693:         """Charge les versions des outils"""
  694:         versions_file = self.project_root / "config" / "versions.json"
  695:         if versions_file.exists():
  696:             with open(versions_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
  697:                 return json.load(f)
  698:         return {}
  699: 
  700:     async def register_agent(self, agent_name: str, agent_instance):
  701:         """Enregistre un agent"""
  702:         self.agents[agent_name] = agent_instance
  703:         self.agent_status[agent_name] = {
  704:             "registered": datetime.now().isoformat(),
  705:             "status": "idle",
  706:             "tasks_completed": 0,
  707:             "last_active": None
  708:         }
  709: 
  710:         self.logger.info(f"Agent enregistr√©: {agent_name}")
  711: 
  712:         # Initialiser l'agent
  713:         try:
  714:             await agent_instance.initialize()
  715:             self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "ready"
  716:             self.logger.info(f"Agent {agent_name} initialis√© avec succ√®s")
  717:         except Exception as e:
  718:             self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "error"
  719:             self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors de l'initialisation de {agent_name}: {e}")
  720: 
  721:     async def get_all_agents_info(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  722:         """Retourne les informations de tous les agents"""
  723:         agents_info = {}
  724:         for agent_name, agent_instance in self.agents.items():
  725:             try:
  726:                 agents_info[agent_name] = agent_instance.get_agent_info()
  727:                 agents_info[agent_name]["status"] = self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"]
  728:             except Exception as e:
  729:                 self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors de la r√©cup√©ration des infos de {agent_name}: {e}")
  730: 
  731:         return {
  732:             "total_agents": len(self.agents),
  733:             "agents": agents_info,
  734:             "system_versions": self.versions,
  735:             "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat()
  736:         }
  737: 
  738:     async def run_task_pipeline(self, pipeline_config: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  739:         """Ex√©cute un pipeline de t√¢ches"""
  740:         self.logger.info(f"D√©marrage du pipeline: {pipeline_config.get('name', 'unnamed')}")
  741: 
  742:         results = {}
  743:         tasks = pipeline_config.get("tasks", [])
  744: 
  745:         for task in tasks:
  746:             task_name = task.get("name", "unnamed_task")
  747:             agent_name = task.get("agent")
  748: 
  749:             if agent_name not in self.agents:
  750:                 self.logger.error(f"Agent {agent_name} non trouv√© pour la t√¢che {task_name}")
  751:                 continue
  752: 
  753:             self.logger.info(f"Ex√©cution de la t√¢che {task_name} avec l'agent {agent_name}")
  754: 
  755:             try:
  756:                 # Mettre √† jour le statut de l'agent
  757:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "busy"
  758:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["last_active"] = datetime.now().isoformat()
  759: 
  760:                 # Ex√©cuter la t√¢che
  761:                 result = await self.agents[agent_name].execute(
  762:                     task=task,
  763:                     context={
  764:                         "pipeline": pipeline_config,
  765:                         "previous_results": results,
  766:                         "versions": self.versions
  767:                     }
  768:                 )
  769: 
  770:                 # Enregistrer le r√©sultat
  771:                 results[task_name] = result
  772:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["tasks_completed"] += 1
  773:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "ready"
  774: 
  775:                 self.logger.info(f"T√¢che {task_name} termin√©e avec succ√®s")
  776: 
  777:             except asyncio.TimeoutError:
  778:                 self.logger.error(f"Timeout sur la t√¢che {task_name}")
  779:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "timeout"
  780:                 results[task_name] = {"status": "timeout", "error": "Task timeout"}
  781: 
  782:             except Exception as e:
  783:                 self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors de l'ex√©cution de {task_name}: {e}")
  784:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "error"
  785:                 results[task_name] = {"status": "error", "error": str(e)}
  786: 
  787:         # Sauvegarder les r√©sultats
  788:         await self._save_pipeline_results(pipeline_config, results)
  789: 
  790:         return {
  791:             "pipeline": pipeline_config.get("name"),
  792:             "results": results,
  793:             "summary": self._generate_summary(results),
  794:             "agents_status": self.agent_status,
  795:             "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat()
  796:         }
  797: 
  798:     async def _save_pipeline_results(self, pipeline_config: Dict[str, Any], results: Dict[str, Any]):
  799:         """Sauvegarde les r√©sultats du pipeline"""
  800:         try:
  801:             results_dir = self.project_root / "results" / "pipelines"
  802:             results_dir.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
  803: 
  804:             timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
  805:             pipeline_name = pipeline_config.get("name", "unnamed").replace(" ", "_").lower()
  806: 
  807:             result_file = results_dir / f"{pipeline_name}_{timestamp}.json"
  808: 
  809:             full_results = {
  810:                 "pipeline": pipeline_config,
  811:                 "results": results,
  812:                 "agents_info": await self.get_all_agents_info(),
  813:                 "system_versions": self.versions,
  814:                 "metadata": {
  815:                     "execution_time": datetime.now().isoformat(),
  816:                     "total_tasks": len(pipeline_config.get("tasks", [])),
  817:                     "successful_tasks": sum(1 for r in results.values() if r.get("status") == "success")
  818:                 }
  819:             }
  820: 
  821:             with open(result_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
  822:                 json.dump(full_results, f, indent=2, default=str)
  823: 
  824:             self.logger.info(f"R√©sultats sauvegard√©s dans {result_file}")
  825: 
  826:         except Exception as e:
  827:             self.logger.error(f"Erreur lors de la sauvegarde des r√©sultats: {e}")
  828: 
  829:     def _generate_summary(self, results: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  830:         """G√©n√®re un r√©sum√© des r√©sultats"""
  831:         total = len(results)
  832:         successful = sum(1 for r in results.values() if r.get("status") in ["success", "completed"])
  833:         failed = total - successful
  834: 
  835:         return {
  836:             "total_tasks": total,
  837:             "successful_tasks": successful,
  838:             "failed_tasks": failed,
  839:             "success_rate": (successful / total * 100) if total > 0 else 0
  840:         }
  841: 
  842:     async def health_check_all(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  843:         """V√©rifie la sant√© de tous les agents"""
  844:         health_results = {}
  845: 
  846:         for agent_name, agent_instance in self.agents.items():
  847:             try:
  848:                 health = await agent_instance.health_check()
  849:                 health_results[agent_name] = health
  850:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["last_health_check"] = datetime.now().isoformat()
  851:             except Exception as e:
  852:                 health_results[agent_name] = {
  853:                     "status": "unhealthy",
  854:                     "error": str(e)
  855:                 }
  856:                 self.agent_status[agent_name]["status"] = "error"
  857: 
  858:         return {
  859:             "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat(),
  860:             "total_agents": len(self.agents),
  861:             "healthy_agents": sum(1 for h in health_results.values() if h.get("status") == "healthy"),
  862:             "agents": health_results
  863:         }
  864: '@
  865: 
  866: $orchestratorCode | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\agents\orchestrator\orchestrator.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
  867: 
  868: # 6. Cr√©er le fichier de d√©pendances Python
  869: Write-Host "`n6. CREATION DU FICHIER REQUIREMENTS.TXT..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  870: $requirements = @"
  871: # D√©pendances Python principales
  872: langchain==0.1.0
  873: langgraph==0.0.5
  874: chromadb==0.4.18
  875: openai==1.6.1
  876: anthropic==0.20.0
  877: 
  878: # Communication et API
  879: fastapi==0.104.1
  880: uvicorn[standard]==0.24.0
  881: websockets==12.0
  882: redis==5.0.1
  883: pika==1.3.2
  884: 
  885: # Blockchain et Web3
  886: web3==6.11.1
  887: eth-account==0.11.0
  888: py-solc-x==2.0.1
  889: pyevmasm==0.2.3
  890: 
  891: # Traitement de donn√©es
  892: pandas==2.1.4
  893: numpy==1.26.2
  894: pyyaml==6.0.1
  895: python-dotenv==1.0.0
  896: 
  897: # Utilitaires
  898: requests==2.31.0
  899: aiohttp==3.9.1
  900: httpx==0.25.1
  901: pydantic==2.5.0
  902: pydantic-settings==2.1.0
  903: 
  904: # Tests et qualit√©
  905: pytest==7.4.3
  906: pytest-asyncio==0.21.1
  907: pytest-cov==4.1.0
  908: mypy==1.7.1
  909: black==23.11.0
  910: flake8==6.1.0
  911: 
  912: # Documentation
  913: sphinx==7.2.6
  914: myst-parser==2.0.0
  915: sphinx-rtd-theme==1.3.0
  916: "@
  917: 
  918: $requirements | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\requirements.txt" -Force -Encoding UTF8
  919: 
  920: # 7. Cr√©er le script de test des agents
  921: Write-Host "`n7. CREATION DU SCRIPT DE TEST..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  922: $testScript = @'
  923: # test_all_agents.py
  924: import asyncio
  925: import sys
  926: from pathlib import Path
  927: 
  928: # Ajouter le dossier agents au path
  929: agents_dir = Path(__file__).parent / "agents"
  930: sys.path.insert(0, str(agents_dir))
  931: 
  932: from orchestrator.orchestrator import Orchestrator
  933: from shared.base_agent import BaseAgent
  934: 
  935: class MockAgent(BaseAgent):
  936:     """Agent mock pour les tests"""
  937: 
  938:     def __init__(self, agent_id, name):
  939:         self.agent_id = agent_id
  940:         self.name = name
  941:         self.config = {"agent_id": agent_id, "name": name}
  942:         self.logger = None
  943:         self.memory = {}
  944:         self.context = {}
  945: 
  946:     async def initialize(self):
  947:         return True
  948: 
  949:     async def execute(self, task, context):
  950:         return {
  951:             "status": "success",
  952:             "agent": self.agent_id,
  953:             "task": task.get("name"),
  954:             "result": f"Mock result from {self.name}",
  955:             "timestamp": asyncio.get_event_loop().time()
  956:         }
  957: 
  958:     def get_agent_info(self):
  959:         return {
  960:             "agent_id": self.agent_id,
  961:             "name": self.name,
  962:             "version": "1.0.0",
  963:             "config": self.config
  964:         }
  965: 
  966:     async def health_check(self):
  967:         return {
  968:             "status": "healthy",
  969:             "agent_id": self.agent_id,
  970:             "timestamp": asyncio.get_event_loop().time()
  971:         }
  972: 
  973: async def test_all_agents():
  974:     """Teste tous les agents"""
  975:     print("üß™ TEST DE TOUS LES AGENTS")
  976:     print("="*60)
  977: 
  978:     # Cr√©er l'orchestrateur
  979:     orchestrator = Orchestrator(".")
  980: 
  981:     # Cr√©er les 9 agents mock
  982:     agents = {
  983:         "architect": MockAgent("architect_001", "Agent Architecte"),
  984:         "coder": MockAgent("coder_001", "Agent Codeur"),
  985:         "communication": MockAgent("communication_001", "Agent Communication"),
  986:         "documenter": MockAgent("documenter_001", "Agent Documenteur"),
  987:         "formal_verification": MockAgent("formal_verifier_001", "Agent V√©rification Formelle"),
  988:         "frontend_web3": MockAgent("frontend_web3_001", "Agent Frontend Web3"),
  989:         "fuzzing_simulation": MockAgent("fuzzing_master_001", "Agent Fuzzing & Simulation"),
  990:         "quality_metrics": MockAgent("quality_001", "Agent M√©triques Qualit√©"),
  991:         "smart_contract": MockAgent("sc_principal_001", "Agent Smart Contract"),
  992:         "tester": MockAgent("tester_001", "Agent Testeur")
  993:     }
  994: 
  995:     # Enregistrer tous les agents
  996:     for agent_name, agent_instance in agents.items():
  997:         await orchestrator.register_agent(agent_name, agent_instance)
  998: 
  999:     # Afficher les informations des agents
 1000:     print("\nüìä INFORMATIONS DES AGENTS:")
 1001:     agents_info = await orchestrator.get_all_agents_info()
 1002:     for agent_name, info in agents_info["agents"].items():
 1003:         print(f"  ‚Ä¢ {agent_name}: {info.get('name')} ({info.get('status')})")
 1004: 
 1005:     # V√©rifier la sant√© des agents
 1006:     print("\nüè• VERIFICATION SANTE:")
 1007:     health_results = await orchestrator.health_check_all()
 1008:     for agent_name, health in health_results["agents"].items():
 1009:         status = "‚úÖ" if health.get("status") == "healthy" else "‚ùå"
 1010:         print(f"  {status} {agent_name}: {health.get('status')}")
 1011: 
 1012:     # Ex√©cuter un pipeline de test
 1013:     print("\nüöÄ EXECUTION PIPELINE TEST:")
 1014:     pipeline_config = {
 1015:         "name": "Test Pipeline",
 1016:         "description": "Pipeline de test pour tous les agents",
 1017:         "tasks": [
 1018:             {"name": "design_architecture", "agent": "architect"},
 1019:             {"name": "write_code", "agent": "coder"},
 1020:             {"name": "generate_tests", "agent": "tester"},
 1021:             {"name": "verify_contract", "agent": "formal_verification"},
 1022:             {"name": "fuzz_test", "agent": "fuzzing_simulation"},
 1023:             {"name": "build_frontend", "agent": "frontend_web3"},
 1024:             {"name": "generate_docs", "agent": "documenter"},
 1025:             {"name": "check_quality", "agent": "quality_metrics"},
 1026:             {"name": "deploy_contract", "agent": "smart_contract"},
 1027:             {"name": "setup_communication", "agent": "communication"}
 1028:         ]
 1029:     }
 1030: 
 1031:     results = await orchestrator.run_task_pipeline(pipeline_config)
 1032: 
 1033:     # Afficher le r√©sum√©
 1034:     print(f"\nüìà RESUME DU PIPELINE:")
 1035:     print(f"  T√¢ches totales: {results['summary']['total_tasks']}")
 1036:     print(f"  T√¢ches r√©ussies: {results['summary']['successful_tasks']}")
 1037:     print(f"  Taux de r√©ussite: {results['summary']['success_rate']:.1f}%")
 1038: 
 1039:     # Sauvegarder le rapport
 1040:     import json
 1041:     report_file = Path(".") / "reports" / "agent_test_report.json"
 1042:     report_file.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
 1043: 
 1044:     with open(report_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
 1045:         json.dump(results, f, indent=2, default=str)
 1046: 
 1047:     print(f"\nüìÑ Rapport sauvegard√©: {report_file}")
 1048:     print("\n‚úÖ TEST TERMINE AVEC SUCCES")
 1049: 
 1050: if __name__ == "__main__":
 1051:     asyncio.run(test_all_agents())
 1052: '@

 1055:

 1059:     # Cr√©er et activer l'environnement virtuel

    1: # setup.ps1 - Version sans accents
    2: Write-Host "=== SMART CONTRACT PIPELINE SETUP ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
    3: Write-Host "Complete installation script" -ForegroundColor Yellow
    4: Write-Host ""
    5: 
    6: # Ask for confirmation
    7: $confirm = Read-Host "Do you want to install all components? (Y/N)"
    8: if ($confirm -ne "Y" -and $confirm -ne "y") {
    9:     Write-Host "Installation cancelled" -ForegroundColor Yellow
   10:     exit
   11: }
   12: 
   13: # 1. Check PowerShell version
   14: Write-Host "`n1. CHECKING POWERSHELL..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
   15: if ($PSVersionTable.PSVersion.Major -lt 5) {
   16:     Write-Host "X PowerShell 5.0 or higher required" -ForegroundColor Red
   17:     exit 1
   18: }
   19: Write-Host "V PowerShell $($PSVersionTable.PSVersion)" -ForegroundColor Green
   20:

   23: 
   24: $tools = @(
   25:     @{Name="Node.js"; Test="node --version"; Install="https://nodejs.org"},
   26:     @{Name="Python"; Test="python --version"; Install="https://python.org"},
   27:     @{Name="Git"; Test="git --version"; Install="https://git-scm.com"}
   28: )
   29:

   33:         Invoke-Expression $tool.Test 2>$null
   34:         Write-Host "V $($tool.Name) is installed" -ForegroundColor Green
   35:     } catch {
   36:         Write-Host "X $($tool.Name) is NOT installed" -ForegroundColor Red

  165: # 7. Create basic agent
  166: Write-Host "`n7. CREATING BASIC AGENT..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  167: 
  168: $agentCode = @'
  169: # agents/smart_contract/agent.py
  170: import json
  171: from typing import Dict, Any
  172: 
  173: class SmartContractAgent:
  174:     """Basic Smart Contract Agent"""
  175: 
  176:     def __init__(self):
  177:         self.name = "Smart Contract Agent"
  178:         self.version = "1.0.0"
  179: 
  180:     def generate_contract(self, requirements: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:
  181:         """Generate a smart contract based on requirements"""
  182:         contract_name = requirements.get("name", "MyContract")
  183: 
  184:         template = f'''// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
  185: pragma solidity ^0.8.19;
  186: 
  187: contract {contract_name} {{
  188:     address public owner;
  189:     string public name;
  190:     string public symbol;
  191: 
  192:     constructor(string memory _name, string memory _symbol) {{
  193:         owner = msg.sender;
  194:         name = _name;
  195:         symbol = _symbol;
  196:     }}
  197: 
  198:     modifier onlyOwner() {{
  199:         require(msg.sender == owner, "Not owner");
  200:         _;
  201:     }}
  202: 
  203:     function transferOwnership(address newOwner) public onlyOwner {{
  204:         require(newOwner != address(0), "Invalid address");
  205:         owner = newOwner;
  206:     }}
  207: 
  208:     function getContractInfo() public view returns (string memory, string memory, address) {{
  209:         return (name, symbol, owner);
  210:     }}
  211: }}
  212: '''
  213: 
  214:         return template
  215: 
  216:     def get_agent_info(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  217:         """Get agent information"""
  218:         return {
  219:             "name": self.name,
  220:             "version": self.version,
  221:             "capabilities": ["contract_generation", "basic_validation"]
  222:         }
  223: '@
  224: 
  225: New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path "agents\smart_contract" -Force | Out-Null
  226: $agentCode | Out-File -FilePath "agents\smart_contract\agent.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
  227: Write-Host "V Basic agent created" -ForegroundColor Green
  228: 
  229: # 8. Create test script
