  232: $testScript = @'
  233: # test_basic.py
  234: import sys
  235: import os
  236: 
  237: # Add agents directory to path
  238: sys.path.append(os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), "agents"))
  239: 
  240: def test_smart_contract_agent():
  241:     """Test the basic smart contract agent"""
  242:     print("ü§ñ Testing Smart Contract Agent")
  243:     print("=" * 40)
  244: 
  245:     try:
  246:         from smart_contract.agent import SmartContractAgent
  247: 
  248:         # Create agent
  249:         agent = SmartContractAgent()
  250:         print(f"Agent: {agent.name} v{agent.version}")
  251: 
  252:         # Test contract generation
  253:         requirements = {
  254:             "name": "MyToken",
  255:             "symbol": "MTK"
  256:         }
  257: 
  258:         contract = agent.generate_contract(requirements)
  259: 
  260:         print("‚úÖ Contract generated successfully")
  261:         print(f"üìÑ Contract length: {len(contract)} characters")
  262: 
  263:         # Show agent info
  264:         info = agent.get_agent_info()
  265:         print(f"üîß Capabilities: {', '.join(info['capabilities'])}")
  266: 
  267:         return True
  268: 
  269:     except Exception as e:
  270:         print(f"‚ùå Error: {e}")
  271:         import traceback
  272:         traceback.print_exc()
  273:         return False
  274: 
  275: if __name__ == "__main__":
  276:     success = test_smart_contract_agent()
  277:     print("=" * 40)
  278:     if success:
  279:         print("üéâ All tests passed!")
  280:     else:
  281:         print("üí• Some tests failed")
  282:     sys.exit(0 if success else 1)
  283: '@
  284: 
  285: $testScript | Out-File -FilePath "test_basic.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
  286: Write-Host "V Test script created" -ForegroundColor Green
  287: 
  288: # 9. Create main.py
  289: Write-Host "`n9. CREATING MAIN APPLICATION..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  290: 
  291: $mainApp = @'
  292: # main.py
  293: import asyncio
  294: import sys
  295: import os
  296: from typing import Dict, Any
  297: 
  298: class Pipeline:
  299:     """Main pipeline orchestrator"""
  300: 
  301:     def __init__(self):
  302:         self.agents = {}
  303: 
  304:     async def initialize(self):
  305:         """Initialize the pipeline"""
  306:         print("üöÄ Initializing Smart Contract Pipeline...")
  307: 
  308:         # Load agents
  309:         await self._load_agents()
  310: 
  311:         print(f"‚úÖ Pipeline initialized with {len(self.agents)} agents")
  312:         return True
  313: 
  314:     async def _load_agents(self):
  315:         """Load all available agents"""
  316:         agents_dir = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), "agents")
  317: 
  318:         # Load Smart Contract Agent
  319:         try:
  320:             from agents.smart_contract.agent import SmartContractAgent
  321:             self.agents["smart_contract"] = SmartContractAgent()
  322:             print("‚úÖ Smart Contract Agent loaded")
  323:         except ImportError as e:
  324:             print(f"‚ùå Failed to load Smart Contract Agent: {e}")
  325: 
  326:     async def run(self):
  327:         """Run the main pipeline"""
  328:         print("üéØ Smart Contract Pipeline Ready!")
  329:         print("=" * 50)
  330: 
  331:         while True:
  332:             print("`nAvailable commands:")
  333:             print("1. Generate Smart Contract")
  334:             print("2. Test Agent")
  335:             print("3. Exit")
  336: 
  337:             choice = input("Select option (1-3): ").strip()
  338: 
  339:             if choice == "1":
  340:                 await self.generate_contract()
  341:             elif choice == "2":
  342:                 await self.test_agent()
  343:             elif choice == "3":
  344:                 print("üëã Goodbye!")
  345:                 break
  346:             else:
  347:                 print("‚ùå Invalid choice")
  348: 
  349:     async def generate_contract(self):
  350:         """Generate a smart contract"""
  351:         print("`nüìù Smart Contract Generator")
  352:         print("-" * 30)
  353: 
  354:         name = input("Contract name: ").strip() or "MyContract"
  355:         symbol = input("Contract symbol: ").strip() or "MC"
  356: 
  357:         if "smart_contract" in self.agents:
  358:             agent = self.agents["smart_contract"]
  359: 
  360:             requirements = {
  361:                 "name": name,
  362:                 "symbol": symbol
  363:             }
  364: 
  365:             contract = agent.generate_contract(requirements)
  366: 
  367:             print("‚úÖ Contract generated!")
  368:             print("-" * 30)
  369:             print(contract[:500] + "..." if len(contract) > 500 else contract)
  370:             print("-" * 30)
  371: 
  372:             # Save to file
  373:             filename = f"contracts/{name}.sol"
  374:             os.makedirs("contracts", exist_ok=True)
  375:             with open(filename, "w") as f:
  376:                 f.write(contract)
  377: 
  378:             print(f"üìÑ Contract saved to {filename}")
  379:         else:
  380:             print("‚ùå Smart Contract Agent not available")
  381: 
  382:     async def test_agent(self):
  383:         """Test the agent"""
  384:         print("`nüß™ Testing Agent...")
  385: 
  386:         if "smart_contract" in self.agents:
  387:             agent = self.agents["smart_contract"]
  388:             info = agent.get_agent_info()
  389: 
  390:             print(f"Agent: {info['name']}")
  391:             print(f"Version: {info['version']}")
  392:             print(f"Capabilities: {', '.join(info['capabilities'])}")
  393:             print("‚úÖ Agent is working correctly")
  394:         else:
  395:             print("‚ùå No agents available")
  396: 
  397: async def main():
  398:     """Main entry point"""
  399:     pipeline = Pipeline()
  400: 
  401:     if await pipeline.initialize():
  402:         await pipeline.run()
  403:     else:
  404:         print("‚ùå Failed to initialize pipeline")
  405: 
  406: if __name__ == "__main__":
  407:     asyncio.run(main())
  408: '@
  409: 
  410: $mainApp | Out-File -FilePath "main.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
  411: Write-Host "V Main application created" -ForegroundColor Green
  412: 
  413: # 10. Create README
  414: Write-Host "`n10. CREATING DOCUMENTATION..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  415: 
  416: $readme = @'
  417: # Smart Contract Pipeline
  418: 
  419: Automated Smart Contract development pipeline with AI agents.
  420: 
  421: ## Quick Start
  422: 
  423: 1. Run the setup script:
  424: ```powershell
  425: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File .\setup.ps1

   17:     "architect",
   18:     "coder",
   19:     "communication",

   24:     "quality_metrics",
   25:     "smart_contract",
   26:     "tester"
   27: )
   28:

   31:     $agentPath = "$projectPath\agents\$agent"
   32:     if (Test-Path $agentPath) {
   33:         Write-Host "   ‚úÖ $agent" -ForegroundColor Green
   34:     } else {
   35:         Write-Host "   ‚ùå $agent" -ForegroundColor Red
   36:         $missingAgents += $agent
   37:     }
   38: }
   39: 
   40: # 2. V√©rifier les fichiers de configuration
   41: Write-Host "`n2. VERIFICATION CONFIGURATIONS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
   42: foreach ($agent in $expectedAgents) {
   43:     $configFile = "$projectPath\agents\$agent\config.yaml"
   44:     if (Test-Path $configFile) {
   45:         Write-Host "   ‚úÖ $agent/config.yaml" -ForegroundColor Green
   46:     } else {
   47:         Write-Host "   ‚ùå $agent/config.yaml" -ForegroundColor Red
   48:     }
   49: }
   50: 
   51: # 3. V√©rifier les versions
   52: Write-Host "`n3. VERIFICATION VERSIONS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
   53: $versionsFile = "$projectPath\config\versions.json"
   54: if (Test-Path $versionsFile) {
   55:     $versions = Get-Content $versionsFile | ConvertFrom-Json
   56:     Write-Host "   ‚úÖ Fichier de versions trouv√©" -ForegroundColor Green
   57: 
   58:     Write-Host "   üìä Versions syst√®me:" -ForegroundColor Gray
   59:     if ($versions.system) {
   60:         Write-Host "     OS: $($versions.system.os)" -ForegroundColor White
   61:         Write-Host "     PowerShell: $($versions.system.powershell)" -ForegroundColor White
   62:     }
   63: 
   64:     Write-Host "   üìä Versions outils:" -ForegroundColor Gray
   65:     if ($versions.tools) {
   66:         foreach ($tool in $versions.tools.PSObject.Properties) {
   67:             Write-Host "     $($tool.Name): $($tool.Value)" -ForegroundColor White
   68:         }
   69:     }
   70: } else {
   71:     Write-Host "   ‚ùå Fichier de versions non trouv√©" -ForegroundColor Red
   72: }
   73: 
   74: # 4. V√©rifier les d√©pendances Python
   75: Write-Host "`n4. VERIFICATION DEPENDANCES PYTHON..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
   76: try {
   77:     & "$projectPath\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1"
   78: 
   79:     # V√©rifier les packages critiques
   80:     $criticalPackages = @("langchain", "chromadb", "web3", "fastapi", "pydantic")
   81:     foreach ($pkg in $criticalPackages) {
   82:         try {
   83:             $version = python -c "import $pkg; print(getattr($pkg, '__version__', 'N/A'))" 2>$null
   84:             if ($version -and $version -ne "N/A") {
   85:                 Write-Host "   ‚úÖ $pkg: $version" -ForegroundColor Green
   86:             } else {
   87:                 Write-Host "   ‚ö†Ô∏è  $pkg: Version non d√©tect√©e" -ForegroundColor Yellow
   88:             }
   89:         } catch {
   90:             Write-Host "   ‚ùå $pkg: Non install√©" -ForegroundColor Red
   91:         }
   92:     }
   93: } catch {
   94:     Write-Host "   ‚ö†Ô∏è  Impossible d'activer l'environnement virtuel" -ForegroundColor Yellow
   95: }
   96: 
   97: # 5. V√©rifier Ollama
   98: Write-Host "`n5. VERIFICATION OLLAMA..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
   99: try {
  100:     $ollamaStatus = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "http://localhost:11434/api/tags" -TimeoutSec 3
  101:     $modelCount = $ollamaStatus.models.Count
  102:     Write-Host "   ‚úÖ Ollama en ligne: $modelCount mod√®les charg√©s" -ForegroundColor Green
  103: 
  104:     # V√©rifier les mod√®les requis
  105:     $requiredModels = @("deepseek-coder:6.7b", "llama3.2:3b", "mistral:7b")
  106:     foreach ($model in $requiredModels) {
  107:         if ($ollamaStatus.models | Where-Object { $_.name -eq $model }) {
  108:             Write-Host "     ‚úÖ $model" -ForegroundColor Green
  109:         } else {
  110:             Write-Host "     ‚ö†Ô∏è  $model non charg√©" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  111:         }
  112:     }
  113: } catch {
  114:     Write-Host "   ‚ùå Ollama hors ligne" -ForegroundColor Red
  115:     Write-Host "   Lancez 'ollama serve' dans un terminal" -ForegroundColor White
  116: }
  117: 
  118: # 6. G√©n√©rer le rapport final
  119: Write-Host "`n6. RAPPORT FINAL..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  120: $report = @{
  121:     timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
  122:     project_path = $projectPath
  123:     verification = @{
  124:         agents_total = $expectedAgents.Count
  125:         agents_found = $expectedAgents.Count - $missingAgents.Count
  126:         agents_missing = $missingAgents
  127:         structure_ok = ($missingAgents.Count -eq 0)
  128:         versions_ok = (Test-Path $versionsFile)
  129:         python_deps_ok = $true  # √Ä affiner selon les v√©rifications
  130:         ollama_ok = $false
  131:     }
  132:     next_steps = @(
  133:         "1. V√©rifier que tous les agents sont pr√©sents",
  134:         "2. Configurer Ollama avec les mod√®les requis",
  135:         "3. Tester le pipeline avec: python test_all_agents.py",
  136:         "4. Consulter les logs dans: logs\",
  137:         "5. Personnaliser les configurations dans agents\"
  138:     )
  139: }
  140: 
  141: $report | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10 | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\reports\verification_report.json" -Force
  142: 
  143: Write-Host "`n" + "="*60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
  144: Write-Host "üìä RAPPORT DE VERIFICATION" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  145: Write-Host "="*60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
  146: Write-Host ""
  147: Write-Host "Agents trouv√©s: $($report.verification.agents_found)/$($report.verification.agents_total)" -ForegroundColor White
  148: Write-Host "Structure: $(if($report.verification.structure_ok) {'‚úÖ'} else {'‚ùå'})" -ForegroundColor $(if($report.verification.structure_ok) {'Green'} else {'Red'})
  149: Write-Host "Versions: $(if($report.verification.versions_ok) {'‚úÖ'} else {'‚ùå'})" -ForegroundColor $(if($report.verification.versions_ok) {'Green'} else {'Red'})
  150: Write-Host "Ollama: $(if($report.verification.ollama_ok) {'‚úÖ'} else {'‚ùå'})" -ForegroundColor $(if($report.verification.ollama_ok) {'Green'} else {'Red'})
  151: Write-Host ""
  152: Write-Host "üìÅ Rapport d√©taill√©: reports\verification_report.json" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  153: Write-Host ""
  154: Write-Host "üéØ PROCHAINES ETAPES:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  155: foreach ($step in $report.next_steps) {
  156:     Write-Host "  $step" -ForegroundColor White
  157: }
  158: Write-Host ""
  159: Write-Host "‚úÖ VERIFICATION TERMINEE" -ForegroundColor Green

    2: # ============================================================================
    3: # CONFIGURATION
    4: # ============================================================================
    5: # Lecture de la configuration
    6: $configPath = ".\..\project_config.json"
    7: if (Test-Path $configPath) {
    8:     $config = Get-Content $configPath -Raw | ConvertFrom-Json
    9:     $PROJECT_NAME = $config.PROJECT_NAME
   10:     $PROJECT_PATH = $config.PROJECT_PATH
   11:     $GITHUB_TOKEN = $config.GITHUB_TOKEN
   12:     $GITHUB_USERNAME = $config.GITHUB_USERNAME
   13:     $GITHUB_REPO_NAME = $config.GITHUB_REPO_NAME
   14:     $GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE = $config.GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE
   15:     $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION = $config.GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION
   16: } else {
   17:     Write-Host "Fichier de configuration non trouv√©." -ForegroundColor Red
   18:     exit 1
   19: }

   21: # ============================================================================
   22: # FONCTION POUR TROUVER LES FICHIERS SOURCES DU PROJET
   23: # ============================================================================
   24: function Get-SourceFiles {
   25:     param(
   26:         [string]$BasePath = "."
   27:     )
   28: 
   29:     Write-Host "Recherche des fichiers sources du projet..." -NoNewline
   30: 
   31:     # Obtenir le chemin absolu du projet
   32:     $projectRoot = Resolve-Path $BasePath
   33: 
   34:     # D√©finir les extensions de fichiers sources
   35:     $sourceExtensions = @(
   36:         '.ps1', '.psm1', '.psd1',         # PowerShell
   37:         '.py',                            # Python
   38:         '.js', '.jsx', '.ts', '.tsx',     # JavaScript/TypeScript
   39:         '.vue', '.svelte',                # Frameworks JS
   40:         '.html', '.htm', '.css', '.scss', '.sass', '.less', # Web
   41:         '.json', '.xml', '.yaml', '.yml', '.toml', # Configurations
   42:         '.md', '.txt', '.rst',            # Documentation
   43:         '.cs', '.java', '.cpp', '.c', '.h', '.hpp', # Langages compil√©s
   44:         '.go', '.rs', '.rb', '.php',      # Autres langages
   45:         '.sql', '.psql',                  # Bases de donn√©es
   46:         '.dockerfile',                    # Docker
   47:         '.gitignore', '.gitattributes',   # Git
   48:         '.env.example', '.env.sample',    # Environnement (exemples)
   49:         '.config', '.ini', '.cfg',        # Configuration
   50:         '.bat', '.cmd', '.sh', '.bash',   # Scripts shell
   51:         '.csproj', '.sln', '.vcxproj'     # Projets Visual Studio
   52:     )
   53: 
   54:     # Dossiers √† exclure
   55:     $excludeDirs = @(
   56:         '.git',
   57:         'node_modules',
   58:         '.vscode',
   59:         '.idea',
   60:         '__pycache__',
   61:         'bin',
   62:         'obj',
   63:         'Debug',
   64:         'Release',
   65:         'dist',
   66:         'build',
   67:         'out',
   68:         'coverage',
   69:         '.vs',
   70:         '.cache',
   71:         '.next',
   72:         '.angular',
   73:         '.nuget',
   74:         '.sonarlint',
   75:         '.svn',
   76:         '.hg',
   77:         'PROJECT_SHARE_*',
   78:         'GISTS_INDEX_*',
   79:         'GITHUB_PUBLISH_*'
   80:     )
   81: 
   82:     # Fichiers √† exclure
   83:     $excludeFiles = @(
   84:         'project_config.json',
   85:         '.env',
   86:         '.env.local',
   87:         'desktop.ini',
   88:         'Thumbs.db',
   89:         '.DS_Store',
   90:         '*.log',
   91:         '*.tmp',
   92:         '*.temp',
   93:         '*.bak',
   94:         '*.backup',
   95:         '*.exe',
   96:         '*.dll',
   97:         '*.so',
   98:         '*.dylib',
   99:         'package-lock.json',
  100:         'yarn.lock',
  101:         'pnpm-lock.yaml'
  102:     )
  103: 
  104:     # Rechercher tous les fichiers
  105:     $allFiles = Get-ChildItem -Path $projectRoot -File -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
  106: 
  107:     # Filtrer les fichiers sources
  108:     $sourceFiles = @()
  109: 
  110:     foreach ($file in $allFiles) {
  111:         $filePath = $file.FullName
  112:         $relativePath = $filePath.Substring($projectRoot.Path.Length + 1)
  113:         $fileName = $file.Name
  114:         $fileExt = [System.IO.Path]::GetExtension($fileName).ToLower()
  115: 
  116:         # V√©rifier si le fichier est dans un dossier exclu
  117:         $inExcludedDir = $false
  118:         foreach ($excludeDir in $excludeDirs) {
  119:             if ($relativePath -like "*\$excludeDir\*" -or $relativePath.StartsWith("$excludeDir\")) {
  120:                 $inExcludedDir = $true
  121:                 break
  122:             }
  123:         }
  124: 
  125:         if ($inExcludedDir) {
  126:             continue
  127:         }
  128: 
  129:         # V√©rifier si le fichier est exclu par nom
  130:         $isExcludedFile = $false
  131:         foreach ($excludeFile in $excludeFiles) {
  132:             if ($excludeFile.StartsWith('*.')) {
  133:                 if ($fileExt -eq $excludeFile.Substring(1)) {
  134:                     $isExcludedFile = $true
  135:                     break
  136:                 }
  137:             } elseif ($fileName -eq $excludeFile) {
  138:                 $isExcludedFile = $true
  139:                 break
  140:             }
  141:         }
  142: 
  143:         if ($isExcludedFile) {
  144:             continue
  145:         }
  146: 
  147:         # V√©rifier si c'est un fichier source (par extension)
  148:         if ($sourceExtensions -contains $fileExt) {
  149:             $sourceFiles += @{
  150:                 File = $file
  151:                 Path = $relativePath
  152:                 FullPath = $filePath
  153:                 Extension = $fileExt
  154:             }
  155:         }
  156:     }
  157: 
  158:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  159:     Write-Host "  Fichiers sources trouv√©s: $($sourceFiles.Count)" -ForegroundColor Green
  160: 
  161:     return $sourceFiles
  162: }
  163: 
  164: # ============================================================================
  165: # FONCTION POUR LIRE UN FICHIER AVEC NUM√âROS DE LIGNE (pour le fichier unique)
  166: # ============================================================================
  167: function Get-FileContentForSingleFile {
  168:     param(
  169:         [string]$FilePath,
  170:         [string]$RelativePath
  171:     )
  172: 
  173:     try {
  174:         # Lire le contenu du fichier
  175:         $content = Get-Content -Path $FilePath -Raw -Encoding UTF8 -ErrorAction Stop
  176: 
  177:         # Ajouter les num√©ros de ligne
  178:         $lines = $content -split "`n"
  179:         $numberedContent = ""
  180: 
  181:         for ($i = 0; $i -lt $lines.Count; $i++) {
  182:             $lineNum = $i + 1
  183:             $numberedContent += "${lineNum}: $($lines[$i])`n"
  184:         }
  185: 
  186:         return $numberedContent
  187: 
  188:     } catch {
  189:         return "ERREUR: Impossible de lire le fichier $RelativePath`n$($_.Exception.Message)"
  190:     }
  191: }
  192: 
  193: # ============================================================================
  194: # FONCTION POUR G√âN√âRER UN SEUL FICHIER LOCAL AVEC TOUS LES SOURCES
  195: # ============================================================================
  196: function Generate-LocalSingleFile {
  197:     param(
  198:         [string]$Description = ""
  199:     )
  200: 
  201:     Write-Host "`n=== G√âN√âRATION D'UN FICHIER UNIQUE AVEC TOUS LES SOURCES ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  202: 
  203:     # S'assurer d'√™tre dans le bon r√©pertoire
  204:     $currentDir = Get-Location
  205:     $projectDir = Resolve-Path $PROJECT_PATH -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
  206: 
  207:     if ($currentDir.Path -ne $projectDir.Path) {
  208:         Write-Host "ERREUR: Vous devez √™tre dans le dossier du projet!" -ForegroundColor Red
  209:         Write-Host "Ex√©cutez: cd '$PROJECT_PATH'" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  210:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Mauvais r√©pertoire" }
  211:     }
  212: 
  213:     # Obtenir les fichiers sources
  214:     $sourceFiles = Get-SourceFiles -BasePath $currentDir
  215: 
  216:     if ($sourceFiles.Count -eq 0) {
  217:         Write-Host "‚ùå Aucun fichier source trouv√©" -ForegroundColor Red
  218:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Aucun fichier source" }
  219:     }
  220: 
  221:     # Utiliser la description du projet si aucune fournie
  222:     if (-not $Description) {
  223:         $Description = $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION
  224:     }
  225: 
  226:     # Cr√©er un seul fichier de sortie
  227:     $timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyyMMdd_HHmmss"
  228:     $outputFile = "PROJECT_SOURCES_$timestamp.txt"
  229: 
  230:     Write-Host "Cr√©ation du fichier unique: $outputFile" -ForegroundColor Green
  231:     Write-Host "Lecture de $($sourceFiles.Count) fichiers sources..." -NoNewline
  232: 
  233:     # Cr√©er le contenu du fichier unique
  234:     $fileContent = "=" * 100 + "`n"
  235:     $fileContent += "PROJET: $PROJECT_NAME`n"
  236:     $fileContent += "DESCRIPTION: $Description`n"
  237:     $fileContent += "DATE: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')`n"
  238:     $fileContent += "FICHIERS SOURCES: $($sourceFiles.Count)`n"
  239:     $fileContent += "=" * 100 + "`n`n"
  240: 
  241:     $processedFiles = 0
  242:     $totalLines = 0
  243: 
  244:     # Parcourir tous les fichiers sources
  245:     foreach ($sourceFile in $sourceFiles | Sort-Object { $_.Path }) {
  246:         $relativePath = $sourceFile.Path
  247:         $fileName = $sourceFile.File.Name
  248: 
  249:         # Ajouter l'en-t√™te du fichier
  250:         $fileContent += "=" * 80 + "`n"
  251:         $fileContent += "FICHIER: $fileName`n"
  252:         $fileContent += "CHEMIN: $relativePath`n"
  253:         $fileContent += "TAILLE: $([math]::Round($sourceFile.File.Length/1024, 2)) KB`n"
  254:         $fileContent += "=" * 80 + "`n`n"
  255: 
  256:         # Lire le contenu du fichier avec num√©ros de ligne
  257:         $fileLines = Get-FileContentForSingleFile -FilePath $sourceFile.FullPath -RelativePath $relativePath
  258: 
  259:         # Compter les lignes
  260:         $lineCount = ($fileLines -split "`n").Count
  261:         $totalLines += $lineCount
  262: 
  263:         # Ajouter le contenu au fichier unique
  264:         $fileContent += $fileLines
  265:         $fileContent += "`n"  # Espace entre les fichiers
  266: 
  267:         $processedFiles++
  268: 
  269:         # Afficher la progression
  270:         if ($processedFiles % 10 -eq 0) {
  271:             Write-Host " ($processedFiles/$($sourceFiles.Count))..." -NoNewline
  272:         }
  273:     }
  274: 
  275:     # Ajouter les statistiques √† la fin
  276:     $fileContent += "`n" + "=" * 100 + "`n"
  277:     $fileContent += "STATISTIQUES FINALES`n"
  278:     $fileContent += "=" * 100 + "`n"
  279:     $fileContent += "Fichiers trait√©s: $processedFiles`n"
  280:     $fileContent += "Lignes totales: $totalLines`n"
  281:     $fileContent += "Date de g√©n√©ration: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')`n"
  282: 
  283:     # Statistiques par extension
  284:     $extStats = $sourceFiles | Group-Object Extension | Sort-Object Count -Descending
  285:     $fileContent += "`nR√âPARTITION PAR EXTENSION:`n"
  286:     foreach ($stat in $extStats) {
  287:         $extName = if ($stat.Name) { $stat.Name } else { "(sans extension)" }
  288:         $fileContent += "  - $extName: $($stat.Count) fichiers`n"
  289:     }
  290: 
  291:     $fileContent += "=" * 100 + "`n"
  292: 
  293:     # √âcrire le fichier unique
  294:     $fileContent | Out-File $outputFile -Encoding UTF8
  295: 
  296:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  297:     Write-Host "`n‚úÖ FICHIER UNIQUE CR√â√â AVEC SUCC√àS !" -ForegroundColor Green
  298: 
  299:     # Afficher les informations du fichier
  300:     $fileInfo = Get-Item $outputFile
  301:     $fileSize = if ($fileInfo.Length -lt 1024) { "$($fileInfo.Length) B" }
  302:                 elseif ($fileInfo.Length -lt 1048576) { "$([math]::Round($fileInfo.Length/1KB, 2)) KB" }
  303:                 else { "$([math]::Round($fileInfo.Length/1MB, 2)) MB" }
  304: 
  305:     Write-Host "üìÑ Fichier cr√©√©: $outputFile" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  306:     Write-Host "üìä Taille: $fileSize" -ForegroundColor Gray
  307:     Write-Host "üìÅ Fichiers sources inclus: $processedFiles" -ForegroundColor Gray
  308:     Write-Host "üìà Lignes totales: $totalLines" -ForegroundColor Gray
  309: 
  310:     # Aper√ßu du contenu (premi√®res 10 lignes)
  311:     Write-Host "`nüìã APER√áU DU CONTENU (premi√®res 10 lignes):" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  312:     Get-Content $outputFile -TotalCount 10 | ForEach-Object { Write-Host "  $_" -ForegroundColor Gray }
  313: 
  314:     if ($totalLines > 10) {
  315:         Write-Host "  ... ($($totalLines - 10) lignes suppl√©mentaires)" -ForegroundColor Gray
  316:     }
  317: 
  318:     return @{
  319:         success = $true
  320:         output_file = $outputFile
  321:         file_size = $fileInfo.Length
  322:         file_size_human = $fileSize
  323:         source_files = $sourceFiles
  324:         files_count = $processedFiles
  325:         total_lines = $totalLines
  326:     }
  327: }
  328: 
  329: # ============================================================================
  330: # FONCTION POUR LIRE UN FICHIER AVEC NUM√âROS DE LIGNE (pour Gists)
  331: # ============================================================================
  332: function Get-FileContentWithLineNumbers {
  333:     param(
  334:         [string]$FilePath,
  335:         [string]$RelativePath
  336:     )
  337: 
  338:     try {
  339:         # Lire le contenu du fichier
  340:         $content = Get-Content -Path $FilePath -Raw -Encoding UTF8 -ErrorAction Stop
  341: 
  342:         # Ajouter les num√©ros de ligne
  343:         $lines = $content -split "`n"
  344:         $numberedContent = ""
  345: 
  346:         for ($i = 0; $i -lt $lines.Count; $i++) {
  347:             $lineNum = $i + 1
  348:             $numberedContent += "${lineNum}: $($lines[$i])`n"
  349:         }
  350: 
  351:         # Ajouter l'en-t√™te avec le chemin du fichier
  352:         $header = "=" * 80 + "`n"
  353:         $header += "FICHIER: $RelativePath`n"
  354:         $header += "=" * 80 + "`n`n"
  355: 
  356:         return $header + $numberedContent
  357: 
  358:     } catch {
  359:         return "ERREUR: Impossible de lire le fichier $RelativePath`n$($_.Exception.Message)"
  360:     }
  361: }
  362: 
  363: # ============================================================================
  364: # FONCTION POUR CR√âER DES GISTS AVEC CONTENU DES FICHIERS
  365: # ============================================================================
  366: function Create-SourceGists {
  367:     param(
  368:         [string]$Token,
  369:         [string]$Username,
  370:         [string]$Description,
  371:         [array]$SourceFiles
  372:     )
  373: 
  374:     Write-Host "`n=== CR√âATION DES GISTS ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  375: 
  376:     if ($SourceFiles.Count -eq 0) {
  377:         Write-Host "‚ùå Aucun fichier source √† publier" -ForegroundColor Red
  378:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Aucun fichier source" }
  379:     }
  380: 
  381:     # Trier les fichiers par taille (du plus gros au plus petit)
  382:     $sortedFiles = $SourceFiles | Sort-Object { $_.File.Length } -Descending
  383: 
  384:     # Limite de taille par Gist : 1 Go
  385:     $maxGistSize = 1GB
  386: 
  387:     Write-Host "Organisation des fichiers dans les Gists..." -NoNewline
  388: 
  389:     # Algorithme de bin packing
  390:     $gistBuckets = @()
  391: 
  392:     foreach ($sourceFile in $sortedFiles) {
  393:         $fileSize = $sourceFile.File.Length
  394: 
  395:         # Ajouter une estimation pour les num√©ros de ligne (environ 10% suppl√©mentaire)
  396:         $estimatedSize = [math]::Round($fileSize * 1.1)
  397: 
  398:         # Trouver un Gist existant o√π ce fichier peut rentrer
  399:         $placed = $false
  400:         for ($i = 0; $i -lt $gistBuckets.Count; $i++) {
  401:             $currentBucketSize = $gistBuckets[$i].size
  402:             if (($currentBucketSize + $estimatedSize) -le $maxGistSize) {
  403:                 $gistBuckets[$i].files += $sourceFile
  404:                 $gistBuckets[$i].size += $estimatedSize
  405:                 $placed = $true
  406:                 break
  407:             }
  408:         }
  409: 
  410:         # Si le fichier n'a pas pu √™tre plac√©, cr√©er un nouveau Gist
  411:         if (-not $placed) {
  412:             $gistBuckets += @{
  413:                 files = @($sourceFile)
  414:                 size = $estimatedSize
  415:             }
  416:         }
  417:     }
  418: 
  419:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  420:     Write-Host "  Nombre de Gists n√©cessaires: $($gistBuckets.Count)" -ForegroundColor Gray
  421: 
  422:     # Cr√©er les Gists
  423:     $createdGists = @()
  424:     for ($i = 0; $i -lt $gistBuckets.Count; $i++) {
  425:         $bucket = $gistBuckets[$i]
  426:         $gistNumber = $i + 1
  427: 
  428:         Write-Host "Cr√©ation Gist $gistNumber/$($gistBuckets.Count)..." -NoNewline
  429:         $gistResult = Create-GistFromSourceFiles -Token $Token -Username $Username `
  430:             -Description $Description -SourceFiles $bucket.files -GistNumber $gistNumber
  431: 
  432:         if ($gistResult.success) {
  433:             Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  434:             $createdGists += $gistResult
  435:         } else {
  436:             Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
  437:             Write-Host "  Erreur: $($gistResult.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
  438:         }
  439:     }
  440: 
  441:     # Filtrer les Gists r√©ussis
  442:     $successfulGists = $createdGists | Where-Object { $_.success }
  443: 
  444:     # Afficher les r√©sultats
  445:     if ($successfulGists.Count -gt 0) {
  446:         Write-Host "`n‚úÖ GISTS CR√â√âS AVEC SUCC√àS !" -ForegroundColor Green
  447: 
  448:         $gistUrls = @()
  449:         $totalFiles = 0
  450: 
  451:         foreach ($gist in $successfulGists) {
  452:             Write-Host "üîó Gist $($gist.gist_number): $($gist.gist_url)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  453:             Write-Host "   Fichiers: $($gist.files_published)" -ForegroundColor Gray
  454:             $gistUrls += $gist.gist_url
  455:             $totalFiles += $gist.files_published
  456:         }
  457: 
  458:         # Cr√©er un fichier d'index avec tous les liens
  459:         $timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyyMMdd_HHmmss"
  460:         $indexFile = "GISTS_INDEX_$timestamp.txt"
  461: 
  462:         $indexContent = "=" * 80 + "`n"
  463:         $indexContent += "INDEX DES GISTS - $PROJECT_NAME`n"
  464:         $indexContent += "=" * 80 + "`n"
  465:         $indexContent += "Date: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')`n"
  466:         $indexContent += "Projet: $PROJECT_NAME`n"
  467:         $indexContent += "Description: $Description`n"
  468:         $indexContent += "Total Gists: $($successfulGists.Count)`n"
  469:         $indexContent += "Total fichiers sources: $totalFiles`n"
  470:         $indexContent += "`n" + "=" * 80 + "`n"
  471:         $indexContent += "LIENS DES GISTS:`n"
  472:         $indexContent += "=" * 80 + "`n`n"
  473: 
  474:         foreach ($gist in $successfulGists) {
  475:             $indexContent += "GIST #$($gist.gist_number):`n"
  476:             $indexContent += "URL: $($gist.gist_url)`n"
  477:             $indexContent += "Fichiers inclus ($($gist.files_published)):`n"
  478: 
  479:             foreach ($fileInfo in $gist.file_list) {
  480:                 $indexContent += "  - $($fileInfo.path)`n"
  481:             }
  482: 
  483:             $indexContent += "`n"
  484:         }
  485: 
  486:         $indexContent += "=" * 80 + "`n"
  487:         $indexContent += "STATISTIQUES:`n"
  488:         $indexContent += "=" * 80 + "`n"
  489:         $indexContent += "- Fichiers sources totaux: $($SourceFiles.Count)`n"
  490:         $indexContent += "- Gists cr√©√©s: $($successfulGists.Count)`n"
  491:         $indexContent += "- Fichiers publi√©s: $totalFiles`n"
  492: 
  493:         # Statistiques par extension
  494:         $extStats = $SourceFiles | Group-Object Extension | Sort-Object Count -Descending
  495:         $indexContent += "`nR√©partition par extension:`n"
  496:         foreach ($stat in $extStats) {
  497:             $indexContent += "  - $($stat.Name): $($stat.Count) fichiers`n"
  498:         }
  499: 
  500:         $indexContent += "=" * 80 + "`n"
  501: 
  502:         $indexContent | Out-File $indexFile -Encoding UTF8
  503:         Write-Host "`nüìÑ Fichier d'index cr√©√©: $indexFile" -ForegroundColor Green
  504: 
  505:         return @{
  506:             success = $true
  507:             gist_urls = $gistUrls
  508:             total_gists = $successfulGists.Count
  509:             index_file = $indexFile
  510:             total_files = $totalFiles
  511:             gist_details = $successfulGists
  512:         }
  513: 
  514:     } else {
  515:         Write-Host "‚ùå Aucun Gist cr√©√©" -ForegroundColor Red
  516:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Aucun Gist cr√©√©" }
  517:     }
  518: }
  519: 
  520: # ============================================================================
  521: # FONCTION POUR CR√âER UN GIST √Ä PARTIR DE FICHIERS SOURCES
  522: # ============================================================================
  523: function Create-GistFromSourceFiles {
  524:     param(
  525:         [string]$Token,
  526:         [string]$Username,
  527:         [string]$Description,
  528:         [array]$SourceFiles,
  529:         [int]$GistNumber
  530:     )
  531: 
  532:     # Pr√©parer les fichiers pour l'API GitHub
  533:     $filesObject = @{}
  534:     $fileList = @()
  535: 
  536:     foreach ($sourceFile in $SourceFiles) {
  537:         $fileName = $sourceFile.File.Name
  538:         $relativePath = $sourceFile.Path
  539: 
  540:         # Lire le contenu avec num√©ros de ligne
  541:         $contentWithLines = Get-FileContentWithLineNumbers -FilePath $sourceFile.FullPath -RelativePath $relativePath
  542: 
  543:         # Cr√©er un nom de fichier pour le Gist (incluant le chemin)
  544:         $gistFileName = $relativePath -replace '[\\/]', '_'
  545:         $gistFileName = $gistFileName -replace '[^\w\.\-]', '_'
  546: 
  547:         $filesObject[$gistFileName] = @{ content = $contentWithLines }
  548:         $fileList += @{ name = $fileName; path = $relativePath; gist_name = $gistFileName }
  549:     }
  550: 
  551:     if ($filesObject.Count -eq 0) {
  552:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Aucun fichier √† publier" }
  553:     }
  554: 
  555:     # Description du Gist
  556:     $gistDescription = "$Description - $PROJECT_NAME - Part $GistNumber ($($SourceFiles.Count) fichiers)"
  557: 
  558:     # Pr√©parer le corps de la requ√™te
  559:     $body = @{
  560:         description = $gistDescription
  561:         public = $false
  562:         files = $filesObject
  563:     } | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10
  564: 
  565:     try {
  566:         $headers = @{
  567:             "Authorization" = "token $Token"
  568:             "Accept" = "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
  569:             "Content-Type" = "application/json"
  570:         }
  571: 
  572:         $response = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://api.github.com/gists" `
  573:             -Method Post `
  574:             -Headers $headers `
  575:             -Body $body `
  576:             -TimeoutSec 30
  577: 
  578:         # Cr√©er un fichier d'index local pour ce Gist
  579:         $timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyyMMdd_HHmmss"
  580:         $gistIndexFile = "GIST_${GistNumber}_${timestamp}.txt"
  581: 
  582:         $gistIndexContent = "=" * 80 + "`n"
  583:         $gistIndexContent += "GIST #$GistNumber - $PROJECT_NAME`n"
  584:         $gistIndexContent += "=" * 80 + "`n"
  585:         $gistIndexContent += "URL: $($response.html_url)`n"
  586:         $gistIndexContent += "ID: $($response.id)`n"
  587:         $gistIndexContent += "Description: $gistDescription`n"
  588:         $gistIndexContent += "Fichiers: $($SourceFiles.Count)`n"
  589:         $gistIndexContent += "`n" + "=" * 80 + "`n"
  590:         $gistIndexContent += "LISTE DES FICHIERS:`n"
  591:         $gistIndexContent += "=" * 80 + "`n`n"
  592: 
  593:         foreach ($fileInfo in $fileList) {
  594:             $gistIndexContent += "Fichier: $($fileInfo.path)`n"
  595:             $gistIndexContent += "Nom dans Gist: $($fileInfo.gist_name)`n"
  596:             $gistIndexContent += "-" * 40 + "`n"
  597:         }
  598: 
  599:         $gistIndexContent | Out-File $gistIndexFile -Encoding UTF8
  600: 
  601:         return @{
  602:             success = $true
  603:             gist_url = $response.html_url
  604:             gist_id = $response.id
  605:             files_published = $SourceFiles.Count
  606:             gist_number = $GistNumber
  607:             file_list = $fileList
  608:             index_file = $gistIndexFile
  609:         }
  610: 
  611:     } catch {
  612:         $errorMsg = "Erreur API GitHub"
  613:         if ($_.Exception.Response) {
  614:             $stream = $_.Exception.Response.GetResponseStream()
  615:             $reader = New-Object System.IO.StreamReader($stream)
  616:             $responseBody = $reader.ReadToEnd()
  617:             $reader.Close()
  618: 
  619:             try {
  620:                 $errorDetails = $responseBody | ConvertFrom-Json
  621:                 $errorMsg = "GitHub: $($errorDetails.message)"
  622:             } catch {
  623:                 $errorMsg = "Erreur HTTP: $($_.Exception.Message)"
  624:             }
  625:         }
  626: 
  627:         return @{
  628:             success = $false
  629:             error = $errorMsg
  630:             gist_number = $GistNumber
  631:         }
  632:     }
  633: }
  634: 
  635: # ============================================================================
  636: # FONCTION POUR PUBLIER SUR GITHUB REPOSITORY
  637: # ============================================================================
  638: function Publish-ToGitHubRepo {
  639:     param(
  640:         [string]$Token,
  641:         [string]$Username,
  642:         [string]$RepoName,
  643:         [string]$Description,
  644:         [bool]$IsPrivate
  645:     )
  646: 
  647:     Write-Host "`n=== PUBLICATION SUR GITHUB REPOSITORY ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  648: 
  649:     # V√©rifier que nous sommes dans le bon r√©pertoire
  650:     Write-Host "V√©rification du r√©pertoire..." -NoNewline
  651:     $currentDir = Get-Location
  652:     $projectDir = Resolve-Path $PROJECT_PATH -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
  653: 
  654:     if ($currentDir.Path -ne $projectDir.Path) {
  655:         Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
  656:         Write-Host "ERREUR: Vous devez √™tre dans le dossier du projet!" -ForegroundColor Red
  657:         Write-Host "Actuel: $currentDir" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  658:         Write-Host "Projet: $projectDir" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  659:         Write-Host "Ex√©cutez: cd '$PROJECT_PATH'" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  660:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Mauvais r√©pertoire" }
  661:     }
  662:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  663: 
  664:     # V√©rifier le token
  665:     if ([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($Token) -or $Token -notmatch "^ghp_[a-zA-Z0-9]{36,}$") {
  666:         Write-Host "‚ùå Token invalide ou manquant" -ForegroundColor Red
  667:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Token GitHub invalide" }
  668:     }
  669: 
  670:     # V√©rifier que Git est install√©
  671:     try {
  672:         git --version | Out-Null
  673:     } catch {
  674:         Write-Host "‚ùå Git non install√©" -ForegroundColor Red
  675:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Git non install√©" }
  676:     }
  677: 
  678:     # Obtenir les fichiers sources
  679:     $sourceFiles = Get-SourceFiles -BasePath $currentDir
  680:     if ($sourceFiles.Count -eq 0) {
  681:         Write-Host "‚ùå Aucun fichier source trouv√©" -ForegroundColor Red
  682:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Aucun fichier source" }
  683:     }
  684: 
  685:     Write-Host "Fichiers √† publier: $($sourceFiles.Count)" -ForegroundColor Gray
  686: 
  687:     # Nettoyer la configuration Git
  688:     Write-Host "Nettoyage Git..." -NoNewline
  689:     git config --global --unset credential.helper 2>$null
  690:     git config --global credential.helper "" 2>$null
  691:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  692: 
  693:     try {
  694:         # Initialiser Git si n√©cessaire
  695:         if (-not (Test-Path ".git")) {
  696:             Write-Host "Initialisation Git..." -NoNewline
  697:             git init
  698:             Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  699:         } else {
  700:             Write-Host "‚úì Git d√©j√† initialis√©" -ForegroundColor Gray
  701:         }
  702: 
  703:         # Configurer Git
  704:         Write-Host "Configuration Git..." -NoNewline
  705:         git config user.name "$Username"
  706:         git config user.email "$Username@users.noreply.github.com"
  707:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  708: 
  709:         # Cr√©er .gitignore si n√©cessaire
  710:         if (-not (Test-Path ".gitignore")) {
  711:             $gitignoreContent = @"
  712: # Fichiers g√©n√©r√©s
  713: PROJECT_SHARE_*
  714: GISTS_INDEX_*
  715: GITHUB_PUBLISH_*
  716: 
  717: # Fichiers sensibles
  718: project_config.json
  719: .env
  720: .env.local
  721: 
  722: # Dossiers syst√®me
  723: node_modules/
  724: .vscode/
  725: .idea/
  726: __pycache__/
  727: bin/
  728: obj/
  729: dist/
  730: build/
  731: out/
  732: coverage/
  733: "@
  734:             $gitignoreContent | Out-File ".gitignore" -Encoding UTF8
  735:         }
  736: 
  737:         # Pr√©parer l'URL avec le token
  738:         $remoteUrl = "https://x-access-token:${Token}@github.com/${Username}/${RepoName}.git"
  739:         Write-Host "Remote: https://github.com/${Username}/${RepoName}" -ForegroundColor Gray
  740: 
  741:         # G√©rer le remote
  742:         git remote remove origin 2>$null
  743:         git remote add origin $remoteUrl
  744: 
  745:         # Ajouter tous les fichiers
  746:         Write-Host "Ajout fichiers..." -NoNewline
  747:         git add .
  748:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  749: 
  750:         # Commit
  751:         Write-Host "Commit..." -NoNewline
  752:         $commitMsg = "$Description - $PROJECT_NAME - Publication: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')"
  753:         git commit -m $commitMsg --quiet
  754:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  755: 
  756:         # Cr√©er la branche main
  757:         Write-Host "Branche..." -NoNewline
  758:         git branch -M main
  759:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  760: 
  761:         # Push vers GitHub
  762:         Write-Host "Push vers GitHub..." -NoNewline
  763:         $env:GIT_TERMINAL_PROMPT = "0"
  764: 
  765:         $pushOutput = git push -u origin main 2>&1
  766: 
  767:         if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) {
  768:             if ($pushOutput -match "failed to push some refs" -or $pushOutput -match "unrelated histories" -or $pushOutput -match "non-fast-forward") {
  769:                 Write-Host " (tentative avec --force)..." -NoNewline -ForegroundColor Yellow
  770:                 $pushOutput = git push -u origin main --force 2>&1
  771:             }
  772:         }
  773: 
  774:         if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
  775:             Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
  776:             Write-Host "‚úÖ PUBLICATION R√âUSSIE !" -ForegroundColor Green
  777:             Write-Host "üîó https://github.com/$Username/$RepoName" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  778: 
  779:             # Cr√©er un fichier d'index local
  780:             $timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyyMMdd_HHmmss"
  781:             $indexFile = "GITHUB_PUBLISH_$timestamp.txt"
  782: 
  783:             $indexContent = @"
  784: ==========================================
  785: GITHUB REPOSITORY PUBLICATION
  786: ==========================================
  787: Date: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
  788: Projet: $PROJECT_NAME
  789: Repository: https://github.com/$Username/$RepoName
  790: Description: $Description
  791: Fichiers publi√©s: $($sourceFiles.Count)
  792: 
  793: D√âTAILS:
  794: - Description: $Description - $PROJECT_NAME
  795: - Date: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
  796: - Nombre de fichiers: $($sourceFiles.Count)
  797: ==========================================
  798: "@
  799: 
  800:             $indexContent | Out-File $indexFile -Encoding UTF8
  801:             Write-Host "üìÑ Fichier cr√©√©: $indexFile" -ForegroundColor Green
  802: 
  803:             return @{
  804:                 success = $true
  805:                 repo_url = "https://github.com/$Username/$RepoName"
  806:                 index_file = $indexFile
  807:                 message = "Publication r√©ussie"
  808:                 files_count = $sourceFiles.Count
  809:             }
  810:         } else {
  811:             Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
  812:             $errorMsg = "Erreur Git"
  813:             if ($pushOutput -match "Authentication failed") {
  814:                 $errorMsg = "Token invalide - Reg√©n√©rez-le sur GitHub"
  815:             } elseif ($pushOutput -match "Repository not found") {
  816:                 $errorMsg = "Repository non trouv√© - Cr√©ez-le d'abord sur GitHub"
  817:             } elseif ($pushOutput -match "GH013" -or $pushOutput -match "secret") {
  818:                 $errorMsg = "GitHub a bloqu√© le push (secret d√©tect√©) - Autorisez-le sur GitHub"
  819:             } else {
  820:                 $errorMsg = "Erreur: $($pushOutput | Select-Object -First 2)"
  821:             }
  822:             Write-Host "‚ùå $errorMsg" -ForegroundColor Red
  823:             return @{
  824:                 success = $false
  825:                 error = $errorMsg
  826:                 git_output = $pushOutput
  827:             }
  828:         }
  829:     } catch {
  830:         Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
  831:         Write-Host "‚ùå Erreur inattendue: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
  832:         return @{
  833:             success = $false
  834:             error = $_.Exception.Message
  835:         }
  836:     }
  837: }
  838: 
  839: # ============================================================================
  840: # MENU PRINCIPAL
  841: # ============================================================================
  842: function Show-MainMenu {
  843:     Clear-Host
  844:     Write-Host ""
  845:     Write-Host "=" * 60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
  846:     Write-Host "SHARE SPLIT 1M - $PROJECT_NAME" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  847:     Write-Host "=" * 60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
  848:     Write-Host ""
  849:     Write-Host "=== MENU PRINCIPAL ===" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  850:     Write-Host "1. Publier sur GitHub Repository" -ForegroundColor Green
  851:     Write-Host "2. Cr√©er des Gists avec fichiers sources (lignes num√©rot√©es)" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  852:     Write-Host "3. G√©n√©rer un fichier unique avec tous les sources (lignes num√©rot√©es)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  853:     Write-Host "4. Quitter" -ForegroundColor Red
  854:     Write-Host ""
  855:     $choice = Read-Host "Votre choix [1-4]"
  856: 
  857:     switch ($choice) {
  858:         '1' {
  859:             Write-Host "`n=== PUBLICATION GITHUB REPOSITORY ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  860: 
  861:             # V√©rifier le token
  862:             if (-not $GITHUB_TOKEN -or $GITHUB_TOKEN -eq "*** REMOVED FOR SECURITY ***") {
  863:                 Write-Host "üîë TOKEN GITHUB REQUIS" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  864:                 Write-Host "Collez votre token GitHub (commence par 'ghp_'):"
  865:                 $GITHUB_TOKEN = Read-Host
  866:             }
  867: 
  868:             # V√©rifier les autres informations
  869:             $githubUsername = $GITHUB_USERNAME
  870:             if (-not $githubUsername) {
  871:                 $githubUsername = Read-Host "Nom d'utilisateur GitHub"
  872:             }
  873: 
  874:             $repoName = Read-Host "Nom du repository"
  875: 
  876:             # S'assurer d'√™tre dans le bon r√©pertoire
  877:             Write-Host "`nV√©rification du r√©pertoire..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  878:             if ((Get-Location).Path -ne (Resolve-Path $PROJECT_PATH).Path) {
  879:                 Write-Host "ATTENTION: Vous devez √™tre dans: $PROJECT_PATH" -ForegroundColor Red
  880:                 Write-Host "Ex√©cutez d'abord: cd '$PROJECT_PATH'" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  881:                 Read-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
  882:                 return
  883:             }
  884: 
  885:             # Ex√©cuter la publication
  886:             $result = Publish-ToGitHubRepo -Token $GITHUB_TOKEN `
  887:                 -Username $githubUsername `
  888:                 -RepoName $repoName `
  889:                 -Description $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION `
  890:                 -IsPrivate $false
  891: 
  892:             if ($result.success) {
  893:                 Write-Host ""
  894:                 Write-Host "‚úÖ Publication r√©ussie sur GitHub!" -ForegroundColor Green
  895:                 Write-Host "Repository: $($result.repo_url)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  896:                 Write-Host "Fichiers trait√©s: $($result.files_count)" -ForegroundColor Gray
  897:                 Write-Host "Fichier cr√©√©: $($result.index_file)" -ForegroundColor Gray
  898:             } else {
  899:                 Write-Host ""
  900:                 Write-Host "‚ùå √âchec de la publication" -ForegroundColor Red
  901:                 Write-Host "Erreur: $($result.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
  902:             }
  903:             Write-Host ""
  904:             Read-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
  905:         }
  906:         '2' {
  907:             Write-Host "`n=== CR√âATION DE GISTS AVEC FICHIERS SOURCES ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  908: 
  909:             # V√©rifier le token
  910:             if (-not $GITHUB_TOKEN -or $GITHUB_TOKEN -eq "*** REMOVED FOR SECURITY ***") {
  911:                 Write-Host "üîë TOKEN GITHUB REQUIS" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  912:                 Write-Host "Collez votre token GitHub (commence par 'ghp_'):"
  913:                 $GITHUB_TOKEN = Read-Host
  914:             }
  915: 
  916:             $githubUsername = $GITHUB_USERNAME
  917:             if (-not $githubUsername) {
  918:                 $githubUsername = Read-Host "Nom d'utilisateur GitHub"
  919:             }
  920: 
  921:             # V√©rifier le r√©pertoire
  922:             Write-Host "`nV√©rification du r√©pertoire..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  923:             if ((Get-Location).Path -ne (Resolve-Path $PROJECT_PATH).Path) {
  924:                 Write-Host "ATTENTION: Vous devez √™tre dans: $PROJECT_PATH" -ForegroundColor Red
  925:                 Write-Host "Ex√©cutez d'abord: cd '$PROJECT_PATH'" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  926:                 Read-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
  927:                 return
  928:             }
  929: 
  930:             # Obtenir les fichiers sources
  931:             Write-Host "`nRecherche des fichiers sources..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  932:             $sourceFiles = Get-SourceFiles -BasePath (Get-Location)
  933: 
  934:             if ($sourceFiles.Count -eq 0) {
  935:                 Write-Host "‚ùå Aucun fichier source trouv√©" -ForegroundColor Red
  936:                 Read-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
  937:                 return
  938:             }
  939: 
  940:             Write-Host "`nFichiers sources trouv√©s: $($sourceFiles.Count)" -ForegroundColor Green
  941: 
  942:             # Afficher un aper√ßu des fichiers
  943:             Write-Host "`nAper√ßu des fichiers (premiers 10):" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  944:             $sourceFiles | Select-Object -First 10 | ForEach-Object {
  945:                 Write-Host "  - $($_.Path) ($([math]::Round($_.File.Length/1024, 2)) KB)" -ForegroundColor Gray
  946:             }
  947: 
  948:             if ($sourceFiles.Count -gt 10) {
  949:                 Write-Host "  ... et $($sourceFiles.Count - 10) autres fichiers" -ForegroundColor Gray
  950:             }
  951: 
  952:             # Demander confirmation
  953:             Write-Host "`nConfirmez-vous la cr√©ation des Gists avec ces $($sourceFiles.Count) fichiers ?" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  954:             $confirm = Read-Host "[O]ui ou [N]on"
  955: 
  956:             if ($confirm -notmatch '^[OoYy]') {
  957:                 Write-Host "Op√©ration annul√©e." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  958:                 Read-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
  959:                 return
  960:             }
  961: 
  962:             # Cr√©er les Gists
  963:             $result = Create-SourceGists -Token $GITHUB_TOKEN `
  964:                 -Username $githubUsername `
  965:                 -Description $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION `
  966:                 -SourceFiles $sourceFiles
  967: 
  968:             if ($result.success) {
  969:                 Write-Host ""
  970:                 Write-Host "‚úÖ Gists cr√©√©s avec succ√®s!" -ForegroundColor Green
  971:                 Write-Host "Nombre de Gists: $($result.total_gists)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  972:                 Write-Host "Total fichiers: $($result.total_files)" -ForegroundColor Gray
  973:                 Write-Host "Fichier d'index: $($result.index_file)" -ForegroundColor Gray
  974: 
  975:                 Write-Host "`nüîó Liens des Gists:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  976:                 foreach ($url in $result.gist_urls) {
  977:                     Write-Host "  $url" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  978:                 }
  979:             } else {
  980:                 Write-Host ""
  981:                 Write-Host "‚ùå √âchec de la cr√©ation des Gists" -ForegroundColor Red
  982:                 Write-Host "Erreur: $($result.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
  983:             }
  984:             Write-Host ""
  985:             Read-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
  986:         }
  987:         '3' {
  988:             Write-Host "`n=== G√âN√âRATION FICHIER UNIQUE AVEC TOUS LES SOURCES ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  989: 
  990:             # V√©rifier le r√©pertoire
  991:             Write-Host "V√©rification du r√©pertoire..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  992:             if ((Get-Location).Path -ne (Resolve-Path $PROJECT_PATH).Path) {
  993:                 Write-Host "ATTENTION: Vous devez √™tre dans: $PROJECT_PATH" -ForegroundColor Red
  994:                 Write-Host "Ex√©cutez d'abord: cd '$PROJECT_PATH'" -ForegroundColor Cyan
  995:                 Read-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
  996:                 return
  997:             }
  998: 
  999:             # Utiliser directement la description du projet
 1000:             $result = Generate-LocalSingleFile -Description $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION
 1001: 
 1002:             if ($result.success) {
 1003:                 Write-Host ""
 1004:                 Write-Host "‚úÖ Fichier unique cr√©√© avec succ√®s!" -ForegroundColor Green
 1005:                 Write-Host "üìÑ Fichier: $($result.output_file)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 1006:                 Write-Host "üìä Taille: $($result.file_size_human)" -ForegroundColor Gray
 1007:                 Write-Host "üìÅ Fichiers sources inclus: $($result.files_count)" -ForegroundColor Gray
 1008:                 Write-Host "üìà Lignes totales: $($result.total_lines)" -ForegroundColor Gray
 1009:             } else {
 1010:                 Write-Host ""
 1011:                 Write-Host "‚ùå √âchec de la g√©n√©ration" -ForegroundColor Red
 1012:                 Write-Host "Erreur: $($result.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
 1013:             }
 1014:             Write-Host ""
 1015:             Read-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
 1016:         }
 1017:         '4' {
 1018:             Write-Host "Au revoir!" -ForegroundColor Green
 1019:             exit 0
 1020:         }
 1021:         default {
 1022:             Write-Host "Choix invalide!" -ForegroundColor Red
 1023:             Start-Sleep -Seconds 1
 1024:         }
 1025:     }
 1026: }
 1027: 
 1028: # ============================================================================
 1029: # POINT D'ENTR√âE
 1030: # ============================================================================
 1031: # Boucle principale
 1032: do {
 1033:     try {
 1034:         Show-MainMenu
 1035:     } catch {
 1036:         Write-Host "‚ùå Erreur: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
 1037:         Write-Host "Red√©marrage dans 3 secondes..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
 1038:         Start-Sleep -Seconds 3
 1039:     }
 1040: } while ($true)

    1: # agents/architect/sous_agents/cloud_architect.ps1
    2: Write-Host "Cr√©ation du Sous-Agent Architecture Cloud..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
    3: 
    4: $cloudAgentConfig = @'
    5: # agents/architect/sous_agents/cloud_config.yaml
    6: sous_agent_id: "cloud_architect_001"
    7: parent_agent: "architect"
    8: specialization: "Architecture Cloud Native"
    9: model: "ollama:llama3.2:3b"
   10: temperature: 0.3
   11: 
   12: capabilities:
   13:   - cloud_providers: ["AWS", "Azure", "GCP", "OVH Cloud"]
   14:   - containerization: ["Docker", "Kubernetes", "Podman"]
   15:   - orchestration: ["K8s", "Docker Swarm", "Nomad"]
   16:   - serverless: ["AWS Lambda", "Azure Functions", "GCP Cloud Functions"]
   17:   - networking: ["VPC", "Subnets", "Load Balancers", "CDN"]
   18: 
   19: tools:
   20:   - name: "terraform_generator"
   21:     type: "iac_generator"
   22:     version: "1.0.0"
   23: 
   24:   - name: "cost_calculator"
   25:     type: "cloud_cost_estimator"
   26:     version: "1.0.0"
   27: 
   28:   - name: "diagram_generator"
   29:     type: "cloud_architecture_diagram"
   30:     version: "1.0.0"
   31: 
   32: context_requirements:
   33:   expected_traffic: "Nombre d'utilisateurs estim√©s"
   34:   data_storage: "Volume et type de donn√©es"
   35:   compliance: "RGPD, HIPAA, etc."
   36:   budget: "Budget mensuel estim√©"
   37: 
   38: outputs:
   39:   required:
   40:     - cloud_architecture_diagram.mmd
   41:     - terraform_configurations/
   42:     - cost_estimation_report.md
   43:     - security_groups_config.json
   44:   optional:
   45:     - kubernetes_manifests/
   46:     - monitoring_setup/
   47:     - disaster_recovery_plan.md
   48: 
   49: learning_objectives:
   50:   - "Optimiser les co√ªts cloud"
   51:   - "Am√©liorer la scalabilit√©"
   52:   - "Renforcer la s√©curit√©"
   53:   - "Automatiser les d√©ploiements"
   54: '@
   55: 
   56: $cloudAgentConfig | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\agents\architect\sous_agents\cloud_config.yaml" -Force -Encoding UTF8
   57: 
   58: # Code du sous-agent
   59: $cloudAgentCode = @'
   60: # agents/architect/sous_agents/cloud_architect.py
   61: import asyncio
   62: import yaml
   63: import json
   64: from typing import Dict, Any, List
   65: from pathlib import Path
   66: from ..shared.base_agent import BaseAgent
   67: 
   68: class CloudArchitectSubAgent(BaseAgent):
   69:     """Sous-agent sp√©cialis√© en architecture cloud"""
   70: 
   71:     def __init__(self, config_path: str):
   72:         super().__init__(config_path)
   73:         self.cloud_providers = self.config.get("capabilities", {}).get("cloud_providers", [])
   74:         self.specializations = self.config.get("capabilities", {})
   75: 
   76:     async def initialize(self) -> bool:
   77:         """Initialise le sous-agent"""
   78:         self.logger.info(f"Initialisation du sous-agent Cloud Architect")
   79:         self.logger.info(f"Sp√©cialisations: {list(self.specializations.keys())}")
   80:         return True
   81: 
   82:     async def design_cloud_architecture(self, requirements: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   83:         """Con√ßoit une architecture cloud"""
   84:         self.logger.info("Conception de l'architecture cloud...")
   85: 
   86:         # Analyse des besoins
   87:         analysis = await self._analyze_requirements(requirements)
   88: 
   89:         # S√©lection du provider
   90:         provider = await self._select_cloud_provider(requirements)
   91: 
   92:         # Conception de l'architecture
   93:         architecture = await self._design_architecture(analysis, provider)
   94: 
   95:         # Estimation des co√ªts
   96:         cost_estimation = await self._estimate_costs(architecture, provider)
   97: 
   98:         # G√©n√©ration de la documentation
   99:         documentation = await self._generate_documentation(architecture, cost_estimation)
  100: 
  101:         return {
  102:             "provider": provider,
  103:             "architecture": architecture,
  104:             "cost_estimation": cost_estimation,
  105:             "documentation": documentation,
  106:             "terraform_configs": await self._generate_terraform_configs(architecture)
  107:         }
  108: 
  109:     async def _analyze_requirements(self, requirements: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  110:         """Analyse les besoins techniques"""
  111:         analysis = {
  112:             "compute_needs": self._calculate_compute_needs(requirements),
  113:             "storage_needs": self._calculate_storage_needs(requirements),
  114:             "network_needs": self._calculate_network_needs(requirements),
  115:             "security_requirements": requirements.get("security", {}),
  116:             "compliance_requirements": requirements.get("compliance", [])
  117:         }
  118:         return analysis
  119: 
  120:     async def _select_cloud_provider(self, requirements: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:
  121:         """S√©lectionne le meilleur fournisseur cloud"""
  122:         # Logique de s√©lection bas√©e sur les besoins
  123:         provider_scores = {}
  124: 
  125:         for provider in self.cloud_providers:
  126:             score = 0
  127: 
  128:             # Score bas√© sur les besoins
  129:             if requirements.get("budget_constrained"):
  130:                 if provider in ["OVH Cloud", "Scaleway"]:
  131:                     score += 3
  132: 
  133:             if requirements.get("needs_global_presence"):
  134:                 if provider in ["AWS", "GCP", "Azure"]:
  135:                     score += 2
  136: 
  137:             if requirements.get("blockchain_integration"):
  138:                 if provider in ["AWS", "Azure"]:  # AWS Managed Blockchain, Azure Blockchain Service
  139:                     score += 2
  140: 
  141:             provider_scores[provider] = score
  142: 
  143:         # Retourne le provider avec le meilleur score
  144:         return max(provider_scores, key=provider_scores.get)
  145: 
  146:     async def _design_architecture(self, analysis: Dict[str, Any], provider: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  147:         """Con√ßoit l'architecture d√©taill√©e"""
  148:         architecture = {
  149:             "provider": provider,
  150:             "compute": await self._design_compute_layer(analysis["compute_needs"], provider),
  151:             "storage": await self._design_storage_layer(analysis["storage_needs"], provider),
  152:             "network": await self._design_network_layer(analysis["network_needs"], provider),
  153:             "security": await self._design_security_layer(analysis["security_requirements"], provider),
  154:             "monitoring": await self._design_monitoring_layer(provider)
  155:         }
  156:         return architecture
  157: 
  158:     async def _generate_terraform_configs(self, architecture: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  159:         """G√©n√®re les configurations Terraform"""
  160:         terraform_configs = {
  161:             "main.tf": await self._generate_main_tf(architecture),
  162:             "variables.tf": await self._generate_variables_tf(architecture),
  163:             "outputs.tf": await self._generate_outputs_tf(architecture),
  164:             "providers.tf": await self._generate_providers_tf(architecture["provider"])
  165:         }
  166:         return terraform_configs
  167: 
  168:     async def execute(self, task: Dict[str, Any], context: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  169:         """Ex√©cute une t√¢che d'architecture cloud"""
  170:         task_type = task.get("type", "design_architecture")
  171: 
  172:         if task_type == "design_architecture":
  173:             return await self.design_cloud_architecture(task.get("requirements", {}))
  174:         elif task_type == "cost_optimization":
  175:             return await self.optimize_costs(task.get("current_architecture", {}))
  176:         elif task_type == "security_review":
  177:             return await self.review_security(task.get("architecture", {}))
  178:         else:
  179:             return {"error": f"Type de t√¢che non support√©: {task_type}"}
  180: 
  181:     async def optimize_costs(self, architecture: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  182:         """Optimise les co√ªts cloud"""
  183:         optimizations = []
  184: 
  185:         # Analyse des ressources surdimensionn√©es
  186:         if architecture.get("compute", {}).get("instance_type"):
  187:             current_instance = architecture["compute"]["instance_type"]
  188:             optimized_instance = await self._suggest_optimized_instance(current_instance)
  189:             if optimized_instance != current_instance:
  190:                 optimizations.append({
  191:                     "type": "compute_optimization",
  192:                     "current": current_instance,
  193:                     "optimized": optimized_instance,
  194:                     "savings_estimate": "~30%"
  195:                 })
  196: 
  197:         # Analyse du stockage
  198:         if architecture.get("storage", {}).get("type"):
  199:             storage_type = architecture["storage"]["type"]
  200:             optimized_storage = await self._suggest_optimized_storage(storage_type)
  201:             if optimized_storage != storage_type:
  202:                 optimizations.append({
  203:                     "type": "storage_optimization",
  204:                     "current": storage_type,
  205:                     "optimized": optimized_storage,
  206:                     "savings_estimate": "~40%"
  207:                 })
  208: 
  209:         return {
  210:             "optimizations": optimizations,
  211:             "total_savings_estimate": await self._calculate_total_savings(optimizations)
  212:         }
  213: '@
  214: 
  215: $cloudAgentCode | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\agents\architect\sous_agents\cloud_architect.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

   20:     - "SQLAlchemy (Python)"
   21:     - "Prisma (Node.js)"
   22:     - "GORM (Go)"

   24:     - "Diesel (Rust)"
   25:   api_standards:
   26:     - "RESTful API Design"
   27:     - "GraphQL"
   28:     - "gRPC"
   29:     - "OpenAPI Specification"
   30:   caching_strategies:
   31:     - "Redis"
   32:     - "Memcached"
   33:     - "In-memory caching"
   34:     - "CDN caching"
   35: 
   36: tools:
   37:   - name: "api_generator"
   38:     type: "openapi_generator"
   39:     version: "1.0.0"
   40: 
   41:   - name: "database_designer"
   42:     type: "schema_designer"
   43:     version: "1.0.0"
   44: 
   45:   - name: "performance_optimizer"
   46:     type: "backend_performance"
   47:     version: "1.0.0"
   48: 
   49: context_requirements:
   50:   api_complexity: "Complexit√© des endpoints"
   51:   data_models: "Mod√®les de donn√©es"
   52:   authentication: "M√©canismes d'authentification"
   53:   rate_limiting: "Politiques de rate limiting"
   54: 
   55: outputs:
   56:   required:

   59:     - service_implementations/

   61:   optional:
   62:     - integration_tests/
   63:     - performance_tests/
   64:     - api_documentation/
   65: 
   66: learning_objectives:
   67:   - "Optimiser les performances des API"
   68:   - "Design des sch√©mas de base de donn√©es"
   69:   - "Impl√©menter l'authentification s√©curis√©e"
   70:   - "G√©rer les migrations de donn√©es"
   71: '@
   72: 
   73: $backendAgentConfig | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\agents\coder\sous_agents\backend_config.yaml" -Force -Encoding UTF8
   74: 
   75: # Code du sous-agent Backend
   76: $backendAgentCode = @'
   77: # agents/coder/sous_agents/backend_coder.py
   78: import asyncio
   79: from typing import Dict, Any, List
   80: from pathlib import Path
   81: import yaml
   82: import json
   83: from ...shared.base_agent import BaseAgent
   84: 
   85: class BackendCoderSubAgent(BaseAgent):
   86:     """Sous-agent sp√©cialis√© en d√©veloppement backend"""
   87: 
   88:     def __init__(self, config_path: str):
   89:         super().__init__(config_path)
   90:         self.languages = self.config.get("capabilities", {}).get("languages", [])
   91:         self.frameworks = self._extract_frameworks()
   92: 
   93:     def _extract_frameworks(self) -> Dict[str, List[str]]:
   94:         """Extrait les frameworks par langage"""
   95:         frameworks = {}
   96:         for lang_cap in self.languages:
   97:             if '(' in lang_cap:
   98:                 lang = lang_cap.split('(')[0].strip()
   99:                 framework_str = lang_cap.split('(')[1].rstrip(')')
  100:                 frameworks[lang] = [f.strip() for f in framework_str.split(',')]
  101:         return frameworks
  102: 
  103:     async def initialize(self) -> bool:
  104:         """Initialise le sous-agent"""
  105:         self.logger.info(f"Initialisation du Backend Coder")
  106:         self.logger.info(f"Langages support√©s: {list(self.frameworks.keys())}")
  107:         return True
  108: 
  109:     async def develop_api(self, api_spec: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  110:         """D√©veloppe une API compl√®te"""
  111:         self.logger.info(f"D√©veloppement de l'API: {api_spec.get('name', 'Unnamed API')}")
  112: 
  113:         # S√©lection du stack technologique
  114:         stack = await self._select_technology_stack(api_spec)
  115: 
  116:         # G√©n√©ration du code
  117:         generated_code = await self._generate_backend_code(api_spec, stack)
  118: 
  119:         # Cr√©ation des tests
  120:         tests = await self._generate_tests(api_spec, stack)
  121: 
  122:         # Documentation
  123:         documentation = await self._generate_documentation(api_spec, stack)
  124: 
  125:         return {
  126:             "technology_stack": stack,
  127:             "generated_code": generated_code,
  128:             "tests": tests,
  129:             "documentation": documentation,
  130:             "deployment_config": await self._generate_deployment_config(stack)
  131:         }
  132: 
  133:     async def _select_technology_stack(self, api_spec: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  134:         """S√©lectionne le stack technologique optimal"""
  135:         requirements = api_spec.get("requirements", {})
  136: 
  137:         # Crit√®res de s√©lection
  138:         if requirements.get("high_performance"):
  139:             # Go ou Rust pour haute performance
  140:             if "Go" in self.frameworks:
  141:                 return {
  142:                     "language": "Go",
  143:                     "framework": self.frameworks["Go"][0] if self.frameworks["Go"] else "Gin",
  144:                     "database": "PostgreSQL",
  145:                     "cache": "Redis"
  146:                 }
  147: 
  148:         if requirements.get("rapid_development"):
  149:             # Python ou Node.js pour d√©veloppement rapide
  150:             if "Python" in self.frameworks:
  151:                 return {
  152:                     "language": "Python",
  153:                     "framework": self.frameworks["Python"][0] if self.frameworks["Python"] else "FastAPI",
  154:                     "database": "PostgreSQL",
  155:                     "cache": "Redis"
  156:                 }
  157: 
  158:         # Par d√©faut, utiliser Python
  159:         return {
  160:             "language": "Python",
  161:             "framework": "FastAPI",
  162:             "database": "PostgreSQL",
  163:             "cache": "Redis"
  164:         }
  165: 
  166:     async def _generate_backend_code(self, api_spec: Dict[str, Any], stack: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  167:         """G√©n√®re le code backend"""
  168:         language = stack["language"]
  169:         framework = stack["framework"]
  170: 
  171:         code_structure = {
  172:             "main_file": await self._generate_main_file(api_spec, language, framework),
  173:             "models": await self._generate_models(api_spec, language),
  174:             "routes": await self._generate_routes(api_spec, language, framework),
  175:             "services": await self._generate_services(api_spec, language),
  176:             "database": await self._generate_database_code(api_spec, stack["database"], language),
  177:             "middleware": await self._generate_middleware(api_spec, language, framework),
  178:             "config": await self._generate_config_files(language, framework)
  179:         }
  180: 
  181:         return code_structure
  182: 
  183:     async def _generate_tests(self, api_spec: Dict[str, Any], stack: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  184:         """G√©n√®re les tests"""
  185:         language = stack["language"]
  186: 
  187:         tests = {
  188:             "unit_tests": await self._generate_unit_tests(api_spec, language),
  189:             "integration_tests": await self._generate_integration_tests(api_spec, language),
  190:             "api_tests": await self._generate_api_tests(api_spec),
  191:             "performance_tests": await self._generate_performance_tests(api_spec)
  192:         }
  193: 
  194:         return tests
  195: 
  196:     async def execute(self, task: Dict[str, Any], context: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  197:         """Ex√©cute une t√¢che de d√©veloppement backend"""
  198:         task_type = task.get("type", "develop_api")
  199: 
  200:         if task_type == "develop_api":
  201:             return await self.develop_api(task.get("specification", {}))
  202:         elif task_type == "optimize_performance":
  203:             return await self.optimize_performance(task.get("codebase", {}))
  204:         elif task_type == "refactor_code":
  205:             return await self.refactor_code(task.get("codebase", {}))
  206:         elif task_type == "add_feature":
  207:             return await self.add_feature(task.get("feature", {}), task.get("codebase", {}))
  208:         else:
  209:             return {"error": f"Type de t√¢che non support√©: {task_type}"}
  210: 
  211:     async def optimize_performance(self, codebase: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  212:         """Optimise les performances du code backend"""
  213:         optimizations = []
  214: 
  215:         # Analyse des bottlenecks
  216:         bottlenecks = await self._analyze_bottlenecks(codebase)
  217: 
  218:         for bottleneck in bottlenecks:
  219:             optimization = await self._generate_optimization(bottleneck)
  220:             optimizations.append(optimization)
  221: 
  222:         # G√©n√©ration du code optimis√©
  223:         optimized_code = await self._apply_optimizations(codebase, optimizations)
  224: 
  225:         return {
  226:             "bottlenecks_found": bottlenecks,
  227:             "optimizations_applied": optimizations,
  228:             "optimized_code": optimized_code,
  229:             "performance_gain_estimate": await self._estimate_performance_gain(optimizations)
  230:         }
  231: 
  232:     async def refactor_code(self, codebase: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  233:         """Refactorise le code pour am√©liorer la qualit√©"""
  234:         refactoring_actions = []
  235: 
  236:         # D√©tection des code smells
  237:         code_smells = await self._detect_code_smells(codebase)
  238: 
  239:         for smell in code_smells:
  240:             refactoring = await self._generate_refactoring(smell)
  241:             refactoring_actions.append(refactoring)
  242: 
  243:         # Application des refactorings
  244:         refactored_code = await self._apply_refactorings(codebase, refactoring_actions)
  245: 
  246:         return {
  247:             "code_smells_found": code_smells,
  248:             "refactoring_actions": refactoring_actions,
  249:             "refactored_code": refactored_code,
  250:             "quality_metrics": await self._calculate_quality_metrics(refactored_code)
  251:         }
  252: '@
  253: 
  254: $backendAgentCode | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\agents\coder\sous_agents\backend_coder.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
