 3564:   609:     }
 3565:   610:
 3566:   611:     return $groups
 3567:   612: }
 3568:   613:
 3569:   614: # Fonction pour ajouter des num√©ros de ligne
 3570:   615: function Add-LineNumbers {
 3571:   616:     param([string]$Content)
 3572:   617:
 3573:   618:     if (-not $SHOW_LINE_NUMBERS) { return $Content }
 3574:   619:
 3575:   620:     $lines = $Content -split "`n"
 3576:   621:     $result = @()
 3577:   622:     $i = 1
 3578:   623:
 3579:   624:     foreach ($line in $lines) {
 3580:   625:         $result += "{0:D5}: {1}" -f $i, $line
 3581:   626:         $i++
 3582:   627:     }
 3583:   628:
 3584:   629:     return $result -join "`n"
 3585:   630: }
 3586:   631:
 3587:   632: # Fonction pour v√©rifier les exclusions
 3588:   633: function Should-ExcludePath {
 3589:   634:     param([string]$Path)
 3590:   635:
 3591:   636:     if ($Path -like "*${SHARE_FILENAME_PREFIX}_*" -or $Path -like "*GISTS_INDEX*" -or $Path -like "*GITHUB_PUBLISH_*") {
 3592:   637:         return $true
 3593:   638:     }
 3594:   639:
 3595:   640:     foreach ($pattern in $EXCLUDE_PATTERNS) {
 3596:   641:         if ($pattern -match "^\*\.") {
 3597:   642:             $ext = $pattern.Substring(1)
 3598:   643:             if ($Path -like "*$ext") { return $true }
 3599:   644:         }
 3600:   645:         elseif ($Path -like "*$pattern*") {
 3601:   646:             return $true
 3602:   647:         }
 3603:   648:     }
 3604:   649:     return $false
 3605:   650: }
 3606:   651:
 3607:   652: # ============================================================================
 3608:   653: # SCRIPT PRINCIPAL
 3609:   654: # ============================================================================
 3610:   655:
 3611:   656: Clear-Host
 3612:   657: Write-Host ""
 3613:   658: Write-Host ("=" * 60) -ForegroundColor Cyan
 3614:   659: Write-Host "SHARE SPLIT 1M - $PROJECT_NAME" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 3615:   660: Write-Host ("=" * 60) -ForegroundColor Cyan
 3616:   661: Write-Host ""
 3617:   662:
 3618:   663: # V√©rifier le dossier
 3619:   664: if (-not (Test-Path $PROJECT_PATH)) {
 3620:   665:     Write-Host "ERREUR: Chemin introuvable: $PROJECT_PATH" -ForegroundColor Red
 3621:   666:     exit 1
 3622:   667: }
 3623:   668:
 3624:   669: Write-Host "Chemin: $PROJECT_PATH" -ForegroundColor Green
 3625:   670: Write-Host ""
 3626:   671:
 3627:   672: # ============================================================================
 3628:   673: # CONNEXION AUTOMATIQUE √Ä GITHUB (NON INTERACTIVE)
 3629:   674: # ============================================================================
 3630:   675:
 3631:   676: $autoConnectSuccess = $false
 3632:   677: $showMenu = $true
 3633:   678:
 3634:   679: # Correction du pattern regex pour √©viter l'erreur
 3635:   680: $validTokenPattern = "ghp_[a-zA-Z0-9]{36,}"
 3636:   681:
 3637:   682: # V√©rifier si la configuration GitHub est compl√®te
 3638:   683: if ($GITHUB_TOKEN -and $GITHUB_TOKEN -match $validTokenPattern -and
 3639:   684:     $GITHUB_USERNAME -and $GITHUB_REPO_NAME -and
 3640:   685:     $GITHUB_TOKEN -notmatch "^\*+$" -and $GITHUB_TOKEN -ne "ghp_********") {
 3641:   686:
 3642:   687:     Write-Host "=== CONNEXION AUTOMATIQUE GITHUB ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 3643:   688:     Write-Host "Configuration GitHub d√©tect√©e" -ForegroundColor Green
 3644:   689:     Write-Host "Utilisateur: $GITHUB_USERNAME" -ForegroundColor Gray
 3645:   690:     Write-Host "Repository: $GITHUB_REPO_NAME" -ForegroundColor Gray
 3646:   691:     Write-Host ""
 3647:   692:
 3648:   693:     # Tester le token d'abord
 3649:   694:     Write-Host "V√©rification du token GitHub..." -NoNewline
 3650:   695:     $tokenTest = Test-GitHubToken -Token $GITHUB_TOKEN
 3651:   696:
 3652:   697:     if ($tokenTest.valid) {
 3653:   698:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 3654:   699:         Write-Host "Token valide pour: $($tokenTest.username)" -ForegroundColor Green
 3655:   700:
 3656:   701:         # V√©rifier si le repository existe
 3657:   702:         Write-Host "V√©rification du repository..." -NoNewline
 3658:   703:         $headers = @{
 3659:   704:             Authorization = "token $GITHUB_TOKEN"
 3660:   705:             Accept = "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
 3661:   706:         }
 3662:   707:
 3663:   708:         try {
 3664:   709:             $repoCheck = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://api.github.com/repos/$GITHUB_USERNAME/$GITHUB_REPO_NAME" `
 3665:   710:                                           -Headers $headers `
 3666:   711:                                           -ErrorAction Stop
 3667:   712:             Write-Host " ‚úì (existe d√©j√†)" -ForegroundColor Green
 3668:   713:             $repoExists = $true
 3669:   714:         } catch {
 3670:   715:             # Le repository n'existe pas, le cr√©er automatiquement
 3671:   716:             Write-Host " ‚úó (n'existe pas)" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 3672:   717:             Write-Host "Cr√©ation automatique du repository..." -NoNewline
 3673:   718:
 3674:   719:             $body = @{
 3675:   720:                 name = $GITHUB_REPO_NAME
 3676:   721:                 description = $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION
 3677:   722:                 private = $GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE
 3678:   723:             } | ConvertTo-Json
 3679:   724:
 3680:   725:             try {
 3681:   726:                 $newRepo = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://api.github.com/user/repos" `
 3682:   727:                                              -Method POST `
 3683:   728:                                              -Headers $headers `
 3684:   729:                                              -Body $body `
 3685:   730:                                              -ContentType "application/json"
 3686:   731:                 Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 3687:   732:                 $repoExists = $true
 3688:   733:             } catch {
 3689:   734:                 Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
 3690:   735:                 Write-Host "Erreur cr√©ation: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
 3691:   736:                 $repoExists = $false
 3692:   737:             }
 3693:   738:         }
 3694:   739:
 3695:   740:         if ($repoExists) {
 3696:   741:             # Publier sur GitHub automatiquement
 3697:   742:             Write-Host "Publication automatique sur GitHub..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
 3698:   743:
 3699:   744:             $result = Publish-ToGitHubRepo -Token $GITHUB_TOKEN `
 3700:   745:                                           -Username $GITHUB_USERNAME `
 3701:   746:                                           -RepoName $GITHUB_REPO_NAME `
 3702:   747:                                           -Description $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION `
 3703:   748:                                           -IsPrivate $GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE
 3704:   749:
 3705:   750:             if ($result.success) {
 3706:   751:                 $autoConnectSuccess = $true
 3707:   752:                 Write-Host ""
 3708:   753:                 Write-Host "‚úÖ CONNEXION AUTOMATIQUE R√âUSSIE !" -ForegroundColor Green
 3709:   754:                 Write-Host "Repository: $($result.repo_url)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 3710:   755:                 Write-Host "Commit: $($result.commit)" -ForegroundColor Gray
 3711:   756:                 Write-Host ""
 3712:   757:
 3713:   758:                 # Demander si on veut voir le menu
 3714:   759:                 $showMenuAnswer = Read-Host "Voulez-vous voir le menu principal ? (O/N)"
 3715:   760:                 if ($showMenuAnswer -eq 'O' -or $showMenuAnswer -eq 'o') {
 3716:   761:                     $showMenu = $true
 3717:   762:                 } else {
 3718:   763:                     Write-Host "Au revoir!" -ForegroundColor Green
 3719:   764:                     exit 0
 3720:   765:                 }
 3721:   766:             } else {
 3722:   767:                 Write-Host ""
 3723:   768:                 Write-Host "‚ùå Connexion automatique √©chou√©e" -ForegroundColor Red
 3724:   769:                 if ($result.error) {
 3725:   770:                     Write-Host "Erreur: $($result.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
 3726:   771:                 }
 3727:   772:                 Write-Host ""
 3728:   773:                 $showMenu = $true
 3729:   774:             }
 3730:   775:         } else {
 3731:   776:             Write-Host "‚ùå Impossible de cr√©er le repository" -ForegroundColor Red
 3732:   777:             $showMenu = $true
 3733:   778:         }
 3734:   779:     } else {
 3735:   780:         Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
 3736:   781:         Write-Host "‚ùå Token GitHub invalide" -ForegroundColor Red
 3737:   782:         Write-Host "Erreur: $($tokenTest.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
 3738:   783:         Write-Host ""
 3739:   784:         $showMenu = $true
 3740:   785:     }
 3741:   786: } else {
 3742:   787:     Write-Host "‚ö† Configuration GitHub incompl√®te ou token masqu√©" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 3743:   788:     Write-Host "   Impossible de se connecter automatiquement √† GitHub" -ForegroundColor Gray
 3744:   789:     Write-Host ""
 3745:   790:     $showMenu = $true
 3746:   791: }
 3747:   792:
 3748:   793: # ============================================================================
 3749:   794: # MENU PRINCIPAL
 3750:   795: # ============================================================================
 3751:   796:
 3752:   797: if ($showMenu) {
 3753:   798:     do {
 3754:   799:         Clear-Host
 3755:   800:         Write-Host ""
 3756:   801:         Write-Host ("=" * 60) -ForegroundColor Cyan
 3757:   802:         Write-Host "SHARE SPLIT 1M - $PROJECT_NAME" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 3758:   803:         Write-Host ("=" * 60) -ForegroundColor Cyan
 3759:   804:         Write-Host ""
 3760:   805:
 3761:   806:         if ($autoConnectSuccess) {
 3762:   807:             Write-Host "‚úÖ Publication GitHub d√©j√† effectu√©e" -ForegroundColor Green
 3763:   808:             Write-Host ""
 3764:   809:         }
 3765:   810:
 3766:   811:         Write-Host "=== MENU PRINCIPAL ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 3767:   812:         Write-Host "1. Publier sur GitHub Repository" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 3768:   813:         Write-Host "2. Partager sur GitHub Gists" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 3769:   814:         Write-Host "3. G√©n√©rer seulement les fichiers locaux" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 3770:   815:         Write-Host "4. Quitter" -ForegroundColor Red
 3771:   816:         Write-Host ""
 3772:   817:
 3773:   818:         $choice = Read-Host "Votre choix [1-4]"
 3774:   819:
 3775:   820:         switch ($choice) {
 3776:   821:             '1' {
 3777:   822:                 # OPTION 1: GitHub Repository
 3778:   823:                 Write-Host "`n=== PUBLICATION GITHUB REPOSITORY ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 3779:   824:
 3780:   825:                 # Demander les informations manquantes
 3781:   826:                 if (-not $GITHUB_TOKEN -or $GITHUB_TOKEN -match "^\*+$" -or $GITHUB_TOKEN -eq "ghp_********") {
 3782:   827:                     Write-Host ""
 3783:   828:                     Write-Host "üîë TOKEN GITHUB REQUIS" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 3784:   829:                     Write-Host "Pour cr√©er un token:" -ForegroundColor Gray
 3785:   830:                     Write-Host "1. https://github.com/settings/tokens" -ForegroundColor Gray
 3786:   831:                     Write-Host "2. 'Generate new token (classic)'" -ForegroundColor Gray
 3787:   832:                     Write-Host "3. Donnez un nom" -ForegroundColor Gray
 3788:   833:                     Write-Host "4. S√©lectionnez 'repo' (TOUTE la section)" -ForegroundColor Green
 3789:   834:                     Write-Host "5. 'Generate token'" -ForegroundColor Gray
 3790:   835:                     Write-Host "6. Copiez le token (commence par 'ghp_')" -ForegroundColor Gray
 3791:   836:                     Write-Host ""
 3792:   837:
 3793:   838:                     $GITHUB_TOKEN = Read-Host "Collez votre token GitHub"
 3794:   839:                 }
 3795:   840:
 3796:   841:                 if (-not $GITHUB_USERNAME) {
 3797:   842:                     $GITHUB_USERNAME = Read-Host "Nom d'utilisateur GitHub"
 3798:   843:                 }
 3799:   844:
 3800:   845:                 if (-not $GITHUB_REPO_NAME) {
 3801:   846:                     $GITHUB_REPO_NAME = Read-Host "Nom du repository"
 3802:   847:                 }
 3803:   848:
 3804:   849:                 # Publier sur GitHub
 3805:   850:                 $result = Publish-ToGitHubRepo -Token $GITHUB_TOKEN `
 3806:   851:                                               -Username $GITHUB_USERNAME `
 3807:   852:                                               -RepoName $GITHUB_REPO_NAME `
 3808:   853:                                               -Description $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION `
 3809:   854:                                               -IsPrivate $GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE
 3810:   855:
 3811:   856:                 if ($result.success) {
 3812:   857:                     Write-Host ""
 3813:   858:                     Write-Host "‚úÖ Publication r√©ussie sur GitHub!" -ForegroundColor Green
 3814:   859:                     Write-Host "Repository: $($result.repo_url)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 3815:   860:                     Write-Host "Commit: $($result.commit)" -ForegroundColor Gray
 3816:   861:                     $autoConnectSuccess = $true
 3817:   862:                 } else {
 3818:   863:                     Write-Host ""
 3819:   864:                     Write-Host "‚ùå √âchec de la publication" -ForegroundColor Red
 3820:   865:                     Write-Host "Erreur: $($result.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
 3821:   866:                 }
 3822:   867:
 3823:   868:                 Write-Host ""
 3824:   869:                 Write-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
 3825:   870:                 Read-Host
 3826:   871:             }
 3827:   872:
 3828:   873:             '2' {
 3829:   874:                 # OPTION 2: GitHub Gists
 3830:   875:                 $result = Share-ToGitHubGists
 3831:   876:                 if ($result.success) {
 3832:   877:                     Write-Host ""
 3833:   878:                     Write-Host "‚úÖ Partage Gists r√©ussi!" -ForegroundColor Green
 3834:   879:                     Write-Host "Nombre de Gists cr√©√©s: $($result.gists_count)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 3835:   880:                     Write-Host "Index local cr√©√©: $($result.index_file)" -ForegroundColor Gray
 3836:   881:                 } else {
 3837:   882:                     Write-Host ""
 3838:   883:                     Write-Host "‚ùå √âchec du partage Gists" -ForegroundColor Red
 3839:   884:                     Write-Host "Erreur: $($result.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
 3840:   885:                 }
 3841:   886:
 3842:   887:                 Write-Host ""
 3843:   888:                 Write-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
 3844:   889:                 Read-Host
 3845:   890:             }
 3846:   891:
 3847:   892:             '3' {
 3848:   893:                 # OPTION 3: Fichiers locaux seulement
 3849:   894:                 $result = Generate-LocalFiles
 3850:   895:                 if ($result.success) {
 3851:   896:                     Write-Host ""
 3852:   897:                     Write-Host "‚úÖ G√©n√©ration locale r√©ussie!" -ForegroundColor Green
 3853:   898:                     Write-Host "Fichier d'index: $($result.index_file)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 3854:   899:                     if ($result.share_files) {
 3855:   900:                         Write-Host "Fichiers partag√©s: $($result.share_files.Count)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 3856:   901:                         foreach ($file in $result.share_files) {
 3857:   902:                             Write-Host "  - $file" -ForegroundColor Gray
 3858:   903:                         }
 3859:   904:                     }
 3860:   905:                     Write-Host "Nombre total de fichiers: $($result.file_count)" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 3861:   906:                 } else {
 3862:   907:                     Write-Host ""
 3863:   908:                     Write-Host "‚ùå √âchec de la g√©n√©ration locale" -ForegroundColor Red
 3864:   909:                     Write-Host "Erreur: $($result.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
 3865:   910:                 }
 3866:   911:
 3867:   912:                 Write-Host ""
 3868:   913:                 Write-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
 3869:   914:                 Read-Host
 3870:   915:             }
 3871:   916:
 3872:   917:             '4' {
 3873:   918:                 Write-Host "Au revoir!" -ForegroundColor Green
 3874:   919:                 exit 0
 3875:   920:             }
 3876:   921:
 3877:   922:             default {
 3878:   923:                 Write-Host "Choix invalide!" -ForegroundColor Red
 3879:   924:                 Start-Sleep -Seconds 1
 3880:   925:             }
 3881:   926:         }
 3882:   927:     } while ($true)
 3883:   928: }
 3884: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 3885: 
 3886: SCRIPT 9 | share_github_v7.py
 3887: Size: 38002 bytes | Type: .py | Modified: 2026-01-29 21:12:21.247821
 3888: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 3889:     1: #!/usr/bin/env python3
 3890:     2: """
 3891:     3: Share GitHub V7 - Python Version
 3892:     4: Lit la configuration depuis project_config.json
 3893:     5: """
 3894:     6:
 3895:     7: import json
 3896:     8: import os
 3897:     9: import sys
 3898:    10: import subprocess
 3899:    11: import datetime
 3900:    12: from pathlib import Path
 3901:    13: import requests
 3902:    14: import re
 3903:    15: import fnmatch
 3904:    16:
 3905:    17: # ============================================================================
 3906:    18: # CONFIGURATION
 3907:    19: # ============================================================================
 3908:    20:
 3909:    21: class Config:
 3910:    22:     """Charge et g√®re la configuration depuis JSON"""
 3911:    23:
 3912:    24:     def __init__(self, config_path="../project_config.json"):
 3913:    25:         self.config_path = Path(config_path)
 3914:    26:         self.default_config = {
 3915:    27:             "PROJECT_NAME": "Structured Lending Protocol",
 3916:    28:             "PROJECT_PATH": ".",
 3917:    29:             "GITHUB_USERNAME": "poolsyncdefi-ui",
 3918:    30:             "GITHUB_REPO_NAME": "structured-lending-protocol-clean",
 3919:    31:             "GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION": "Structured Lending Protocol Clean Version",
 3920:    32:             "GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE": False,
 3921:    33:             "GITHUB_TOKEN": "",
 3922:    34:             "EXCLUDE_PATTERNS": [],
 3923:    35:             "EXCLUDE_DIRS": [],
 3924:    36:             "INCLUDE_PATTERNS": []
 3925:    37:         }
 3926:    38:         self.config = self.load_config()
 3927:    39:
 3928:    40:     def load_config(self):
 3929:    41:         """Charge la configuration depuis le fichier JSON"""
 3930:    42:         if self.config_path.exists():
 3931:    43:             try:
 3932:    44:                 with open(self.config_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
 3933:    45:                     config = json.load(f)
 3934:    46:                 print(f"‚úì Configuration charg√©e depuis: {self.config_path}")
 3935:    47:                 return {**self.default_config, **config}  # Merge avec defaults
 3936:    48:             except Exception as e:
 3937:    49:                 print(f"‚ö† Erreur lecture config: {e}")
 3938:    50:                 return self.default_config
 3939:    51:         else:
 3940:    52:             print(f"‚ö† Fichier config non trouv√©: {self.config_path}")
 3941:    53:             print("Utilisation des valeurs par d√©faut")
 3942:    54:             return self.default_config
 3943:    55:
 3944:    56:     def get(self, key, default=None):
 3945:    57:         """R√©cup√®re une valeur de configuration"""
 3946:    58:         return self.config.get(key, default)
 3947:    59:
 3948:    60:     def save_token(self, token):
 3949:    61:         """Sauvegarde le token dans la config"""
 3950:    62:         self.config["GITHUB_TOKEN"] = token
 3951:    63:         try:
 3952:    64:             with open(self.config_path, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
 3953:    65:                 json.dump(self.config, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False)
 3954:    66:             print(f"‚úì Token sauvegard√© dans: {self.config_path}")
 3955:    67:             return True
 3956:    68:         except Exception as e:
 3957:    69:             print(f"‚úó Erreur sauvegarde token: {e}")
 3958:    70:             return False
 3959:    71:
 3960:    72: # ============================================================================
 3961:    73: # FONCTIONS UTILITAIRES
 3962:    74: # ============================================================================
 3963:    75:
 3964:    76: def run_command(cmd, cwd=None, capture_output=True):
 3965:    77:     """Ex√©cute une commande shell"""
 3966:    78:     try:
 3967:    79:         if capture_output:
 3968:    80:             result = subprocess.run(cmd, shell=True, cwd=cwd,
 3969:    81:                                   capture_output=True, text=True, encoding='utf-8')
 3970:    82:             return result.returncode, result.stdout, result.stderr
 3971:    83:         else:
 3972:    84:             result = subprocess.run(cmd, shell=True, cwd=cwd)
 3973:    85:             return result.returncode, "", ""
 3974:    86:     except Exception as e:
 3975:    87:         return -1, "", str(e)
 3976:    88:
 3977:    89: def get_git_info():
 3978:    90:     """R√©cup√®re les informations Git"""
 3979:    91:     info = {}
 3980:    92:
 3981:    93:     # Branche actuelle
 3982:    94:     code, stdout, _ = run_command("git branch --show-current")
 3983:    95:     if code == 0:
 3984:    96:         info['branch'] = stdout.strip()
 3985:    97:
 3986:    98:     # Dernier commit
 3987:    99:     code, stdout, _ = run_command("git rev-parse --short HEAD")
 3988:   100:     if code == 0:
 3989:   101:         info['commit'] = stdout.strip()
 3990:   102:
 3991:   103:     # Message du dernier commit
 3992:   104:     code, stdout, _ = run_command('git log --oneline -1 --pretty=format:"%s"')
 3993:   105:     if code == 0:
 3994:   106:         info['last_commit_msg'] = stdout.strip()
 3995:   107:
 3996:   108:     return info
 3997:   109:
 3998:   110: def should_exclude(path, config):
 3999:   111:     """V√©rifie si un chemin doit √™tre exclu"""
 4000:   112:     path_str = str(path).replace('\\', '/')  # Normaliser les s√©parateurs
 4001:   113:     path_name = path.name
 4002:   114:
 4003:   115:     # V√©rifier d'abord les dossiers complets (EXCLUDE_DIRS)
 4004:   116:     exclude_dirs = config.get("EXCLUDE_DIRS", [])
 4005:   117:     path_parts = path_str.split('/')  # Utiliser '/' normalis√©
 4006:   118:
 4007:   119:     for dir_name in exclude_dirs:
 4008:   120:         if dir_name in path_parts:
 4009:   121:             return True
 4010:   122:
 4011:   123:     # V√©rifier les patterns avec wildcards (EXCLUDE_PATTERNS)
 4012:   124:     exclude_patterns = config.get("EXCLUDE_PATTERNS", [])
 4013:   125:
 4014:   126:     for pattern in exclude_patterns:
 4015:   127:         # G√©rer les patterns de dossier avec /*
 4016:   128:         if pattern.endswith('/*'):
 4017:   129:             dir_pattern = pattern[:-2]
 4018:   130:             if dir_pattern in path_parts:
 4019:   131:                 return True
 4020:   132:             continue  # Ne pas v√©rifier plus loin pour les patterns de dossier
 4021:   133:
 4022:   134:         # Pour les fichiers, utiliser fnmatch directement
 4023:   135:         if fnmatch.fnmatch(path_name, pattern) or fnmatch.fnmatch(path_str, pattern):
 4024:   136:             return True
 4025:   137:
 4026:   138:     return False
 4027:   139:
 4028:   140: def should_include(path, config):
 4029:   141:     """V√©rifie si un chemin doit √™tre inclus (prioritaire sur exclude)"""
 4030:   142:     path_str = str(path).replace('\\', '/')  # Normaliser les s√©parateurs
 4031:   143:     path_name = path.name
 4032:   144:
 4033:   145:     include_patterns = config.get("INCLUDE_PATTERNS", [])
 4034:   146:
 4035:   147:     # Si pas de patterns d'inclusion d√©finis, tout est inclus
 4036:   148:     if not include_patterns:
 4037:   149:         return True
 4038:   150:
 4039:   151:     # V√©rifier chaque pattern d'inclusion
 4040:   152:     for pattern in include_patterns:
 4041:   153:         if fnmatch.fnmatch(path_name, pattern) or fnmatch.fnmatch(path_str, pattern):
 4042:   154:             return True
 4043:   155:
 4044:   156:     # Si aucun pattern ne correspond, le fichier n'est pas inclus
 4045:   157:     return False
 4046:   158:
 4047:   159: # ============================================================================
 4048:   160: # FONCTIONS DE PARTAGE
 4049:   161: # ============================================================================
 4050:   162:
 4051:   163: def create_full_share(config):
 4052:   164:     """Cr√©e un fichier de partage complet avec num√©ros de ligne"""
 4053:   165:     print("\n" + "="*60)
 4054:   166:     print("CREATE FULL SHARE")
 4055:   167:     print("="*60)
 4056:   168:
 4057:   169:     project_path = Path(config.get("PROJECT_PATH", "."))
 4058:   170:
 4059:   171:     if not project_path.exists():
 4060:   172:         print(f"‚úó Chemin introuvable: {project_path}")
 4061:   173:         return False
 4062:   174:
 4063:   175:     print(f"Chemin du projet: {project_path}")
 4064:   176:     print(f"Patterns d'inclusion: {len(config.get('INCLUDE_PATTERNS', []))}")
 4065:   177:     print(f"Dossiers exclus: {len(config.get('EXCLUDE_DIRS', []))}")
 4066:   178:     print(f"Patterns exclus: {len(config.get('EXCLUDE_PATTERNS', []))}")
 4067:   179:
 4068:   180:     # Scanner les fichiers
 4069:   181:     print("\nScanning des fichiers...")
 4070:   182:     all_files = []
 4071:   183:     scanned = 0
 4072:   184:     excluded = 0
 4073:   185:
 4074:   186:     for item in project_path.rglob("*"):
 4075:   187:         if item.is_file():
 4076:   188:             scanned += 1
 4077:   189:
 4078:   190:             # V√©rifier d'abord si le fichier doit √™tre inclus
 4079:   191:             if not should_include(item, config):
 4080:   192:                 excluded += 1
 4081:   193:                 continue
 4082:   194:
 4083:   195:             # V√©rifier ensuite si le fichier doit √™tre exclu
 4084:   196:             if should_exclude(item, config):
 4085:   197:                 excluded += 1
 4086:   198:                 continue
 4087:   199:
 4088:   200:             all_files.append(item)
 4089:   201:
 4090:   202:     print(f"\nR√©sultats du scan:")
 4091:   203:     print(f"  Fichiers scann√©s: {scanned}")
 4092:   204:     print(f"  Fichiers exclus: {excluded}")
 4093:   205:     print(f"  Fichiers inclus: {len(all_files)}")
 4094:   206:
 4095:   207:     if len(all_files) == 0:
 4096:   208:         print("\n‚ö† Aucun fichier √† inclure!")
 4097:   209:         print("V√©rifiez vos patterns d'inclusion/exclusion dans project_config.json")
 4098:   210:         return False
 4099:   211:
 4100:   212:     with open("PROJECT_SHARE.txt", "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
 4101:   213:         # En-t√™te
 4102:   214:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 4103:   215:         f.write(f"STRUCTURED LENDING PROTOCOL - FULL PROJECT SHARE\n")
 4104:   216:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 4105:   217:         f.write(f"GitHub: {config.get('GITHUB_USERNAME')}/{config.get('GITHUB_REPO_NAME')}\n")
 4106:   218:         f.write(f"Repo URL: https://github.com/{config.get('GITHUB_USERNAME')}/{config.get('GITHUB_REPO_NAME')}\n")
 4107:   219:         f.write(f"Date: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
 4108:   220:         f.write("\n")
 4109:   221:
 4110:   222:         # Informations Git
 4111:   223:         git_info = get_git_info()
 4112:   224:         f.write("[GIT INFORMATION]\n")
 4113:   225:         f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 4114:   226:         if git_info.get('branch'):
 4115:   227:             f.write(f"Branch: {git_info['branch']}\n")
 4116:   228:         if git_info.get('commit'):
 4117:   229:             f.write(f"Commit: {git_info['commit']}\n")
 4118:   230:         if git_info.get('last_commit_msg'):
 4119:   231:             f.write(f"Last commit: {git_info['last_commit_msg']}\n")
 4120:   232:         f.write("\n")
 4121:   233:
 4122:   234:         # Parcourir les fichiers AVEC FILTRAGE
 4123:   235:         file_counters = {
 4124:   236:             'contracts': 0,
 4125:   237:             'scripts': 0,
 4126:   238:             'tests': 0,
 4127:   239:             'other': 0
 4128:   240:         }
 4129:   241:
 4130:   242:         # Grouper les fichiers par type pour un affichage organis√©
 4131:   243:         solidity_files = [f for f in all_files if f.suffix == '.sol']
 4132:   244:         script_files = [f for f in all_files if f.suffix in ['.js', '.py', '.sh', '.bat', '.ps1', '.ts']]
 4133:   245:         test_files = [f for f in all_files if any(test_dir in str(f) for test_dir in ['test', 'tests', '__tests__'])]
 4134:   246:         other_files = [f for f in all_files if f not in solidity_files + script_files + test_files]
 4135:   247:
 4136:   248:         # Fichiers Solidity (contrats)
 4137:   249:         if solidity_files:
 4138:   250:             f.write("[CONTRACTS DIRECTORY - *.sol files]\n")
 4139:   251:             f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 4140:   252:
 4141:   253:             for sol_file in solidity_files:
 4142:   254:                 file_counters['contracts'] += 1
 4143:   255:                 relative_path = sol_file.relative_to(project_path)
 4144:   256:
 4145:   257:                 f.write(f"\nFILE {file_counters['contracts']} | {relative_path}\n")
 4146:   258:                 f.write(f"Size: {sol_file.stat().st_size} bytes | Modified: {datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(sol_file.stat().st_mtime)}\n")
 4147:   259:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 4148:   260:
 4149:   261:                 try:
 4150:   262:                     with open(sol_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as sf:
 4151:   263:                         lines = sf.readlines()
 4152:   264:                         for i, line in enumerate(lines, 1):
 4153:   265:                             f.write(f"{i:5d}: {line.rstrip()}\n")
 4154:   266:                 except Exception as e:
 4155:   267:                     f.write(f"[ERROR READING FILE: {e}]\n")
 4156:   268:
 4157:   269:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 4158:   270:
 4159:   271:         # Fichiers de scripts
 4160:   272:         if script_files:
 4161:   273:             f.write(f"\n[SCRIPTS DIRECTORY]\n")
 4162:   274:             f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 4163:   275:
 4164:   276:             for script_file in script_files:
 4165:   277:                 file_counters['scripts'] += 1
 4166:   278:                 relative_path = script_file.relative_to(project_path)
 4167:   279:
 4168:   280:                 f.write(f"\nSCRIPT {file_counters['scripts']} | {relative_path}\n")
 4169:   281:                 f.write(f"Size: {script_file.stat().st_size} bytes | Type: {script_file.suffix} | ")
 4170:   282:                 f.write(f"Modified: {datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(script_file.stat().st_mtime)}\n")
 4171:   283:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 4172:   284:
 4173:   285:                 try:
 4174:   286:                     with open(script_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as sf:
 4175:   287:                         lines = sf.readlines()
 4176:   288:                         for i, line in enumerate(lines, 1):
 4177:   289:                             f.write(f"{i:5d}: {line.rstrip()}\n")
 4178:   290:                 except Exception as e:
 4179:   291:                     f.write(f"[ERROR READING FILE: {e}]\n")
 4180:   292:
 4181:   293:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 4182:   294:
 4183:   295:         # Fichiers de test
 4184:   296:         if test_files:
 4185:   297:             f.write("\n[TESTS DIRECTORY]\n")
 4186:   298:             f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 4187:   299:
 4188:   300:             for test_file in test_files:
 4189:   301:                 file_counters['tests'] += 1
 4190:   302:                 relative_path = test_file.relative_to(project_path)
 4191:   303:
 4192:   304:                 f.write(f"\nTEST {file_counters['tests']} | {relative_path}\n")
 4193:   305:                 f.write(f"Size: {test_file.stat().st_size} bytes | Type: {test_file.suffix} | ")
 4194:   306:                 f.write(f"Modified: {datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(test_file.stat().st_mtime)}\n")
 4195:   307:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 4196:   308:
 4197:   309:                 try:
 4198:   310:                     with open(test_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as tf:
 4199:   311:                         lines = tf.readlines()
 4200:   312:                         for i, line in enumerate(lines, 1):
 4201:   313:                             f.write(f"{i:5d}: {line.rstrip()}\n")
 4202:   314:                 except Exception as e:
 4203:   315:                     f.write(f"[ERROR READING FILE: {e}]\n")
 4204:   316:
 4205:   317:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 4206:   318:
 4207:   319:         # Autres fichiers (selon les patterns d'inclusion)
 4208:   320:         if other_files:
 4209:   321:             f.write("\n[OTHER FILES]\n")
 4210:   322:             f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 4211:   323:
 4212:   324:             for other_file in other_files:
 4213:   325:                 file_counters['other'] += 1
 4214:   326:                 relative_path = other_file.relative_to(project_path)
 4215:   327:
 4216:   328:                 f.write(f"\nFILE {file_counters['other']} | {relative_path}\n")
 4217:   329:                 f.write(f"Size: {other_file.stat().st_size} bytes | Type: {other_file.suffix} | ")
 4218:   330:                 f.write(f"Modified: {datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(other_file.stat().st_mtime)}\n")
 4219:   331:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 4220:   332:
 4221:   333:                 try:
 4222:   334:                     with open(other_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as of:
 4223:   335:                         lines = of.readlines()
 4224:   336:                         for i, line in enumerate(lines, 1):
 4225:   337:                             f.write(f"{i:5d}: {line.rstrip()}\n")
 4226:   338:                 except Exception as e:
 4227:   339:                     f.write(f"[ERROR READING FILE: {e}]\n")
 4228:   340:
 4229:   341:                 f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 4230:   342:
 4231:   343:         # Structure du projet (version filtr√©e)
 4232:   344:         f.write("\n[PROJECT FILE STRUCTURE - FILTERED]\n")
 4233:   345:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 4234:   346:         f.write("Listing filtered project files...\n\n")
 4235:   347:
 4236:   348:         for item in all_files:
 4237:   349:             relative_path = item.relative_to(project_path)
 4238:   350:             f.write(f"{relative_path}\n")
 4239:   351:
 4240:   352:         # R√©sum√©
 4241:   353:         total_files = sum(file_counters.values())
 4242:   354:         f.write("\n" + "="*80 + "\n")
 4243:   355:         f.write("[SUMMARY]\n")
 4244:   356:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 4245:   357:         f.write(f"Total contract files: {file_counters['contracts']}\n")
 4246:   358:         f.write(f"Total script files: {file_counters['scripts']}\n")
 4247:   359:         f.write(f"Total test files: {file_counters['tests']}\n")
 4248:   360:         f.write(f"Total other files: {file_counters['other']}\n")
 4249:   361:         f.write(f"Total code files: {total_files}\n")
 4250:   362:         f.write(f"\nGenerated: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
 4251:   363:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 4252:   364:
 4253:   365:     print(f"\n‚úì Fichier cr√©√©: PROJECT_SHARE.txt")
 4254:   366:     print(f"‚úì Fichiers inclus: {total_files}")
 4255:   367:     print(f"  - Contrats: {file_counters['contracts']}")
 4256:   368:     print(f"  - Scripts: {file_counters['scripts']}")
 4257:   369:     print(f"  - Tests: {file_counters['tests']}")
 4258:   370:     print(f"  - Autres: {file_counters['other']}")
 4259:   371:     return True
 4260:   372:
 4261:   373: def create_diff_share():
 4262:   374:     """Cr√©e un rapport des changements"""
 4263:   375:     print("\n" + "="*60)
 4264:   376:     print("CREATE DIFF SHARE")
 4265:   377:     print("="*60)
 4266:   378:
 4267:   379:     # V√©rifier si on est dans un repo Git
 4268:   380:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git status")
 4269:   381:     if code != 0:
 4270:   382:         print("‚úó Pas dans un repository Git ou Git non install√©")
 4271:   383:         return False
 4272:   384:
 4273:   385:     with open("DIFF_REPORT.txt", "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
 4274:   386:         # En-t√™te
 4275:   387:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 4276:   388:         f.write("STRUCTURED LENDING PROTOCOL - DIFF REPORT\n")
 4277:   389:         f.write("="*80 + "\n")
 4278:   390:         f.write(f"Date: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
 4279:   391:         f.write("\n")
 4280:   392:
 4281:   393:         # Status Git
 4282:   394:         f.write("[GIT STATUS]\n")
 4283:   395:         f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 4284:   396:         code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git status --porcelain")
 4285:   397:         if code == 0 and stdout.strip():
 4286:   398:             changed_files = stdout.strip().split('\n')
 4287:   399:             f.write(f"Changed files: {len(changed_files)}\n\n")
 4288:   400:
 4289:   401:             for file_status in changed_files:
 4290:   402:                 if file_status.strip():
 4291:   403:                     status = file_status[:2].strip()
 4292:   404:                     filename = file_status[3:].strip()
 4293:   405:                     f.write(f"{status}: {filename}\n")
 4294:   406:
 4295:   407:                     # Afficher les diff√©rences
 4296:   408:                     if status in ['M', 'A', '??']:
 4297:   409:                         f.write("-"*40 + "\n")
 4298:   410:                         if status == '??':  # Nouveau fichier
 4299:   411:                             if os.path.exists(filename):
 4300:   412:                                 with open(filename, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as nf:
 4301:   413:                                     lines = nf.readlines()
 4302:   414:                                     for i, line in enumerate(lines, 1):
 4303:   415:                                         f.write(f"{i:4d}: {line.rstrip()}\n")
 4304:   416:                         else:  # Fichier modifi√©
 4305:   417:                             code, diff_output, _ = run_command(f"git diff {filename}")
 4306:   418:                             if code == 0 and diff_output:
 4307:   419:                                 f.write("Changes:\n")
 4308:   420:                                 f.write(diff_output)
 4309:   421:                         f.write("-"*40 + "\n")
 4310:   422:         else:
 4311:   423:             f.write("No changes detected in the working directory.\n")
 4312:   424:
 4313:   425:         f.write("\n" + "="*80 + "\n")
 4314:   426:         f.write("[GIT DIFF SUMMARY]\n")
 4315:   427:         f.write("-"*79 + "\n")
 4316:   428:         code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git diff --stat")
 4317:   429:         if code == 0 and stdout:
 4318:   430:             f.write(stdout)
 4319:   431:         else:
 4320:   432:             f.write("No staged changes.\n")
 4321:   433:
 4322:   434:     print("‚úì Fichier cr√©√©: DIFF_REPORT.txt")
 4323:   435:     return True
 4324:   436:
 4325:   437: def git_commit_push_publish(config):
 4326:   438:     """Commit, push et publication sur GitHub"""
 4327:   439:     print("\n" + "="*60)
 4328:   440:     print("GIT COMMIT + PUSH + PUBLISH TO GITHUB")
 4329:   441:     print("="*60)
 4330:   442:
 4331:   443:     github_token = config.get("GITHUB_TOKEN")
 4332:   444:     username = config.get("GITHUB_USERNAME")
 4333:   445:     repo_name = config.get("GITHUB_REPO_NAME")
 4334:   446:
 4335:   447:     # V√©rifier le token
 4336:   448:     if not github_token or github_token.strip() == "":
 4337:   449:         print("\nüîë TOKEN GITHUB REQUIS")
 4338:   450:         print("Pour cr√©er un token:")
 4339:   451:         print("1. https://github.com/settings/tokens")
 4340:   452:         print("2. 'Generate new token (classic)'")
 4341:   453:         print("3. Donnez un nom")
 4342:   454:         print("4. S√©lectionnez 'repo' (TOUTE la section)")
 4343:   455:         print("5. 'Generate token'")
 4344:   456:         print("6. Copiez le token (commence par 'ghp_')\n")
 4345:   457:
 4346:   458:         github_token = input("Collez votre token GitHub: ").strip()
 4347:   459:         if github_token:
 4348:   460:             if config.save_token(github_token):
 4349:   461:                 print("‚úì Token sauvegard√©")
 4350:   462:             else:
 4351:   463:                 print("‚ö† Token non sauvegard√© dans la config")
 4352:   464:         else:
 4353:   465:             print("‚úó Aucun token fourni")
 4354:   466:             return False
 4355:   467:
 4356:   468:     # Demander le message de commit
 4357:   469:     commit_msg = input("\nMessage de commit (ENTER pour d√©faut): ").strip()
 4358:   470:     if not commit_msg:
 4359:   471:         commit_msg = f"üöÄ Automated commit: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}"
 4360:   472:
 4361:   473:     # √âtape 1: V√©rifier Git
 4362:   474:     print("\n1. V√©rification Git...")
 4363:   475:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git --version")
 4364:   476:     if code != 0:
 4365:   477:         print("‚úó Git non install√©")
 4366:   478:         print("T√©l√©chargez depuis: https://git-scm.com/downloads")
 4367:   479:         return False
 4368:   480:     print("‚úì Git install√©")
 4369:   481:
 4370:   482:     # √âtape 2: Ajouter les fichiers
 4371:   483:     print("2. Ajout des fichiers...")
 4372:   484:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git add .")
 4373:   485:     if code != 0:
 4374:   486:         print(f"‚úó Erreur git add: {stderr}")
 4375:   487:         return False
 4376:   488:     print("‚úì Fichiers ajout√©s")
 4377:   489:
 4378:   490:     # √âtape 3: Commit
 4379:   491:     print("3. Commit...")
 4380:   492:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command(f'git commit -m "{commit_msg}"')
 4381:   493:     if code != 0:
 4382:   494:         print(f"‚ö† Erreur commit (peut √™tre normal si pas de changements): {stderr}")
 4383:   495:
 4384:   496:     # √âtape 4: Configurer remote
 4385:   497:     print("4. Configuration remote GitHub...")
 4386:   498:     remote_url = f"https://x-access-token:{github_token}@github.com/{username}/{repo_name}.git"
 4387:   499:
 4388:   500:     # Supprimer et recr√©er le remote
 4389:   501:     run_command("git remote remove origin")
 4390:   502:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command(f'git remote add origin "{remote_url}"')
 4391:   503:     if code != 0:
 4392:   504:         print(f"‚úó Erreur configuration remote: {stderr}")
 4393:   505:         return False
 4394:   506:     print("‚úì Remote configur√©")
 4395:   507:
 4396:   508:     # √âtape 5: Push
 4397:   509:     print("5. Push vers GitHub...")
 4398:   510:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git branch -M main")
 4399:   511:     code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git push -u origin main --force")
 4400:   512:
 4401:   513:     if code == 0:
 4402:   514:         print("\n" + "="*60)
 4403:   515:         print("‚úÖ PUBLICATION R√âUSSIE !")
 4404:   516:         print("="*60)
 4405:   517:         print(f"Repository: https://github.com/{username}/{repo_name}")
 4406:   518:         print(f"Commit: {commit_msg}")
 4407:   519:
 4408:   520:         # Afficher le dernier commit
 4409:   521:         code, last_commit, _ = run_command('git log --oneline -1')
 4410:   522:         if code == 0:
 4411:   523:             print(f"Dernier commit: {last_commit.strip()}")
 4412:   524:
 4413:   525:         return True
 4414:   526:     else:
 4415:   527:         print(f"\n‚úó ERREUR PUSH: {stderr}")
 4416:   528:
 4417:   529:         # Essayer m√©thode alternative
 4418:   530:         print("\nEssai m√©thode alternative...")
 4419:   531:         alt_remote_url = f"https://{username}:{github_token}@github.com/{username}/{repo_name}.git"
 4420:   532:         run_command("git remote remove origin")
 4421:   533:         run_command(f'git remote add origin "{alt_remote_url}"')
 4422:   534:
 4423:   535:         code, stdout, stderr = run_command("git push -u origin main --force")
 4424:   536:         if code == 0:
 4425:   537:             print("‚úÖ Publication r√©ussie avec m√©thode alternative!")
 4426:   538:             print(f"Repository: https://github.com/{username}/{repo_name}")
 4427:   539:             return True
 4428:   540:         else:
 4429:   541:             print(f"‚úó √âchec m√©thode alternative: {stderr}")
 4430:   542:             return False
 4431:   543:
 4432:   544: def share_to_github_gists(config):
 4433:   545:     """Partage sur GitHub Gists"""
 4434:   546:     print("\n" + "="*60)
 4435:   547:     print("SHARE TO GITHUB GISTS")
 4436:   548:     print("="*60)
 4437:   549:
 4438:   550:     github_token = config.get("GITHUB_TOKEN")
 4439:   551:
 4440:   552:     # V√©rifier le token
 4441:   553:     if not github_token or github_token.strip() == "":
 4442:   554:         print("\nüîë TOKEN GITHUB REQUIS")
 4443:   555:         print("Pour cr√©er un token:")
 4444:   556:         print("1. https://github.com/settings/tokens")
 4445:   557:         print("2. 'Generate new token (classic)'")
 4446:   558:         print("3. Donnez un nom")
 4447:   559:         print("4. S√©lectionnez 'gist' permission")
 4448:   560:         print("5. 'Generate token'")
 4449:   561:         print("6. Copiez le token (commence par 'ghp_')\n")
 4450:   562:
 4451:   563:         github_token = input("Collez votre token GitHub (avec permission gist): ").strip()
 4452:   564:         if github_token:
 4453:   565:             if config.save_token(github_token):
 4454:   566:                 print("‚úì Token sauvegard√©")
 4455:   567:             else:
 4456:   568:                 print("‚ö† Token non sauvegard√© dans la config")
 4457:   569:         else:
 4458:   570:             print("‚úó Aucun token fourni")
 4459:   571:             return False
 4460:   572:
 4461:   573:     # V√©rifier si le fichier de partage existe
 4462:   574:     if not os.path.exists("PROJECT_SHARE.txt"):
 4463:   575:         print("\n‚ö† PROJECT_SHARE.txt non trouv√©")
 4464:   576:         create = input("Cr√©er le fichier de partage d'abord? (o/n): ").lower()
 4465:   577:         if create == 'o':
 4466:   578:             create_full_share(config)
 4467:   579:         else:
 4468:   580:             print("‚úó Op√©ration annul√©e")
 4469:   581:             return False
 4470:   582:
 4471:   583:     # V√©rifier la taille du fichier
 4472:   584:     file_size = os.path.getsize("PROJECT_SHARE.txt")
 4473:   585:     file_size_mb = file_size / (1024 * 1024)
 4474:   586:
 4475:   587:     print(f"\nFichier: PROJECT_SHARE.txt")
 4476:   588:     print(f"Taille: {file_size} bytes ({file_size_mb:.2f} MB)")
 4477:   589:     print(f"Limite Gist: 1 MB")
 4478:   590:
 4479:   591:     if file_size_mb > 1:
 4480:   592:         print("\n‚ö† Le fichier d√©passe la limite de 1 MB pour les Gists")
 4481:   593:         print("Options:")
 4482:   594:         print("1. Diviser en plusieurs Gists")
 4483:   595:         print("2. Essayer quand m√™me (peut √©chouer)")
 4484:   596:         print("3. Annuler")
 4485:   597:
 4486:   598:         choice = input("\nVotre choix (1-3): ").strip()
 4487:   599:         if choice == '3':
 4488:   600:             return False
 4489:   601:         elif choice == '1':
 4490:   602:             return split_and_upload_gists(config, github_token)
 4491:   603:
 4492:   604:     # Lire le contenu du fichier
 4493:   605:     try:
 4494:   606:         with open("PROJECT_SHARE.txt", 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
 4495:   607:             content = f.read()
 4496:   608:     except Exception as e:
 4497:   609:         print(f"‚úó Erreur lecture fichier: {e}")
 4498:   610:         return False
 4499:   611:
 4500:   612:     # Pr√©parer la requ√™te API
 4501:   613:     headers = {
 4502:   614:         "Authorization": f"token {github_token}",
 4503:   615:         "Accept": "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
 4504:   616:     }
 4505:   617:
 4506:   618:     data = {
 4507:   619:         "description": f"{config.get('PROJECT_NAME')} - Full Project Share {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}",
 4508:   620:         "public": False,
 4509:   621:         "files": {
 4510:   622:             "PROJECT_SHARE.txt": {
 4511:   623:                 "content": content
 4512:   624:             }
 4513:   625:         }
 4514:   626:     }
 4515:   627:
 4516:   628:     print("\nEnvoi vers GitHub Gists...")
 4517:   629:     try:
 4518:   630:         response = requests.post("https://api.github.com/gists",
 4519:   631:                                 headers=headers,
 4520:   632:                                 json=data)
 4521:   633:
 4522:   634:         if response.status_code == 201:
 4523:   635:             gist_data = response.json()
 4524:   636:             gist_url = gist_data["html_url"]
 4525:   637:             gist_id = gist_data["id"]
 4526:   638:
 4527:   639:             print("\n" + "="*60)
 4528:   640:             print("‚úÖ GIST CR√â√â AVEC SUCC√àS !")
 4529:   641:             print("="*60)
 4530:   642:             print(f"URL: {gist_url}")
 4531:   643:             print(f"ID: {gist_id}")
 4532:   644:
 4533:   645:             # Sauvegarder l'info du Gist
 4534:   646:             with open("GIST_INFO.txt", "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
 4535:   647:                 f.write(f"Gist URL: {gist_url}\n")
 4536:   648:                 f.write(f"Gist ID: {gist_id}\n")
 4537:   649:                 f.write(f"Created: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
 4538:   650:                 f.write(f"Description: {data['description']}\n")
 4539:   651:                 f.write(f"File: PROJECT_SHARE.txt\n")
 4540:   652:                 f.write(f"Size: {file_size} bytes\n")
 4541:   653:
 4542:   654:             print(f"\n‚úì Informations sauvegard√©es dans: GIST_INFO.txt")
 4543:   655:             return True
 4544:   656:         else:
 4545:   657:             print(f"‚úó Erreur API GitHub: {response.status_code}")
 4546:   658:             print(f"Message: {response.text}")
 4547:   659:             return False
 4548:   660:
 4549:   661:     except Exception as e:
 4550:   662:         print(f"‚úó Erreur connexion: {e}")
 4551:   663:         return False
 4552:   664:
 4553:   665: def split_and_upload_gists(config, github_token):
 4554:   666:     """Divise et upload sur plusieurs Gists"""
 4555:   667:     print("\n" + "="*60)
 4556:   668:     print("SPLIT AND UPLOAD TO MULTIPLE GISTS")
 4557:   669:     print("="*60)
 4558:   670:
 4559:   671:     # Lire le fichier
 4560:   672:     try:
 4561:   673:         with open("PROJECT_SHARE.txt", 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
 4562:   674:             lines = f.readlines()
 4563:   675:     except Exception as e:
 4564:   676:         print(f"‚úó Erreur lecture fichier: {e}")
 4565:   677:         return False
 4566:   678:
 4567:   679:     total_lines = len(lines)
 4568:   680:     max_lines_per_gist = 10000  # Environ 500KB-1MB selon la taille des lignes
 4569:   681:     num_parts = (total_lines // max_lines_per_gist) + 1
 4570:   682:
 4571:   683:     print(f"Lignes totales: {total_lines}")
 4572:   684:     print(f"Lignes par Gist: {max_lines_per_gist}")
 4573:   685:     print(f"Nombre de parties: {num_parts}")
 4574:   686:
 4575:   687:     gist_urls = []
 4576:   688:
 4577:   689:     for part_num in range(1, num_parts + 1):
 4578:   690:         start_idx = (part_num - 1) * max_lines_per_gist
 4579:   691:         end_idx = min(part_num * max_lines_per_gist, total_lines)
 4580:   692:
 4581:   693:         print(f"\nPartie {part_num}/{num_parts} (lignes {start_idx+1}-{end_idx})")
 4582:   694:
 4583:   695:         # Extraire les lignes pour cette partie
 4584:   696:         part_lines = lines[start_idx:end_idx]
 4585:   697:         part_content = "".join(part_lines)
 4586:   698:
 4587:   699:         # Pr√©parer la requ√™te API
 4588:   700:         headers = {
 4589:   701:             "Authorization": f"token {github_token}",
 4590:   702:             "Accept": "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
 4591:   703:         }
 4592:   704:
 4593:   705:         data = {
 4594:   706:             "description": f"{config.get('PROJECT_NAME')} - Part {part_num}/{num_parts} {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}",
 4595:   707:             "public": False,
 4596:   708:             "files": {
 4597:   709:                 f"PROJECT_SHARE_PART{part_num}.txt": {
 4598:   710:                     "content": part_content
 4599:   711:                 }
 4600:   712:             }
 4601:   713:         }
 4602:   714:
 4603:   715:         try:
 4604:   716:             response = requests.post("https://api.github.com/gists",
 4605:   717:                                     headers=headers,
 4606:   718:                                     json=data)
 4607:   719:
 4608:   720:             if response.status_code == 201:
 4609:   721:                 gist_data = response.json()
 4610:   722:                 gist_url = gist_data["html_url"]
 4611:   723:                 gist_urls.append(gist_url)
 4612:   724:                 print(f"‚úì Partie {part_num} cr√©√©e: {gist_url}")
 4613:   725:             else:
 4614:   726:                 print(f"‚úó Erreur partie {part_num}: {response.status_code}")
 4615:   727:
 4616:   728:         except Exception as e:
 4617:   729:             print(f"‚úó Erreur partie {part_num}: {e}")
 4618:   730:
 4619:   731:     # Cr√©er un index des Gists
 4620:   732:     if gist_urls:
 4621:   733:         with open("GISTS_INDEX.txt", "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
 4622:   734:             f.write("="*60 + "\n")
 4623:   735:             f.write("GITHUB GISTS INDEX\n")
 4624:   736:             f.write("="*60 + "\n")
 4625:   737:             f.write(f"Project: {config.get('PROJECT_NAME')}\n")
 4626:   738:             f.write(f"Split into: {len(gist_urls)} parts\n")
 4627:   739:             f.write(f"Date: {datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
 4628:   740:             f.write("\nGIST URLs:\n\n")
 4629:   741:
 4630:   742:             for i, url in enumerate(gist_urls, 1):
 4631:   743:                 f.write(f"Part {i}: {url}\n")
 4632:   744:
 4633:   745:         print("\n" + "="*60)
 4634:   746:         print("‚úÖ TOUS LES GISTS CR√â√âS !")
 4635:   747:         print("="*60)
 4636:   748:         print(f"Nombre de Gists: {len(gist_urls)}")
 4637:   749:         print(f"Index sauvegard√© dans: GISTS_INDEX.txt")
 4638:   750:
 4639:   751:         # Afficher les URLs
 4640:   752:         print("\nURLs des Gists:")
 4641:   753:         for i, url in enumerate(gist_urls, 1):
 4642:   754:             print(f"  Part {i}: {url}")
 4643:   755:
 4644:   756:         return True
 4645:   757:
 4646:   758:     return False
 4647:   759:
 4648:   760: # ============================================================================
 4649:   761: # MENU PRINCIPAL
 4650:   762: # ============================================================================
 4651:   763:
 4652:   764: def clear_screen():
 4653:   765:     """Efface l'√©cran"""
 4654:   766:     os.system('cls' if os.name == 'nt' else 'clear')
 4655:   767:
 4656:   768: def main_menu(config):
 4657:   769:     """Affiche le menu principal"""
 4658:   770:     while True:
 4659:   771:         clear_screen()
 4660:   772:         print("\n" + "="*60)
 4661:   773:         print(f"SHARE GITHUB V7 - {config.get('PROJECT_NAME')}")
 4662:   774:         print("="*60)
 4663:   775:         print(f"Repo: {config.get('GITHUB_USERNAME')}/{config.get('GITHUB_REPO_NAME')}")
 4664:   776:         print(f"Path: {config.get('PROJECT_PATH')}")
 4665:   777:
 4666:   778:         # Afficher le statut du token
 4667:   779:         token = config.get("GITHUB_TOKEN")
 4668:   780:         if token and token.strip() != "":
 4669:   781:             print(f"GitHub: CONFIGUR√â {'*' * min(len(token), 10)}...")
 4670:   782:         else:
 4671:   783:             print("GitHub: NON CONFIGUR√â")
 4672:   784:
 4673:   785:         print("\n" + "="*60)
 4674:   786:         print("MENU PRINCIPAL")
 4675:   787:         print("="*60)
 4676:   788:         print("1. CREATE FULL SHARE (all files with line numbers)")
 4677:   789:         print("2. CREATE DIFF SHARE (changed files only)")
 4678:   790:         print("3. GIT COMMIT + PUSH + PUBLISH TO GITHUB")
 4679:   791:         print("4. SHARE TO GITHUB GISTS")
 4680:   792:         print("5. CONFIGURATION")
 4681:   793:         print("6. EXIT")
 4682:   794:         print("="*60)
 4683:   795:
 4684:   796:         choice = input("\nVotre choix (1-6): ").strip()
 4685:   797:
 4686:   798:         if choice == "1":
 4687:   799:             create_full_share(config)
 4688:   800:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 4689:   801:
 4690:   802:         elif choice == "2":
 4691:   803:             create_diff_share()
 4692:   804:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 4693:   805:
 4694:   806:         elif choice == "3":
 4695:   807:             git_commit_push_publish(config)
 4696:   808:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 4697:   809:
 4698:   810:         elif choice == "4":
 4699:   811:             share_to_github_gists(config)
 4700:   812:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 4701:   813:
 4702:   814:         elif choice == "5":
 4703:   815:             configuration_menu(config)
 4704:   816:
 4705:   817:         elif choice == "6":
 4706:   818:             print("\nAu revoir!")
 4707:   819:             break
 4708:   820:
 4709:   821:         else:
 4710:   822:             print("Choix invalide!")
 4711:   823:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 4712:   824:
 4713:   825: def configuration_menu(config):
 4714:   826:     """Menu de configuration"""
 4715:   827:     while True:
 4716:   828:         clear_screen()
 4717:   829:         print("\n" + "="*60)
 4718:   830:         print("CONFIGURATION")
 4719:   831:         print("="*60)
 4720:   832:
 4721:   833:         print("\nConfiguration actuelle:")
 4722:   834:         print(f"1. PROJECT_NAME: {config.get('PROJECT_NAME')}")
 4723:   835:         print(f"2. PROJECT_PATH: {config.get('PROJECT_PATH')}")
 4724:   836:         print(f"3. GITHUB_USERNAME: {config.get('GITHUB_USERNAME')}")
 4725:   837:         print(f"4. GITHUB_REPO_NAME: {config.get('GITHUB_REPO_NAME')}")
 4726:   838:
 4727:   839:         token = config.get("GITHUB_TOKEN")
 4728:   840:         if token and token.strip() != "":
 4729:   841:             masked_token = token[:4] + "*" * (len(token) - 8) + token[-4:] if len(token) > 8 else "***"
 4730:   842:             print(f"5. GITHUB_TOKEN: {masked_token}")
 4731:   843:         else:
 4732:   844:             print("5. GITHUB_TOKEN: NON CONFIGUR√â")
 4733:   845:
 4734:   846:         print(f"6. EXCLUDE_PATTERNS: {len(config.get('EXCLUDE_PATTERNS', []))} patterns")
 4735:   847:         print(f"7. EXCLUDE_DIRS: {len(config.get('EXCLUDE_DIRS', []))} dossiers")
 4736:   848:         print(f"8. INCLUDE_PATTERNS: {len(config.get('INCLUDE_PATTERNS', []))} patterns")
 4737:   849:
 4738:   850:         print("\n9. Tester la connexion GitHub")
 4739:   851:         print("10. Sauvegarder la configuration")
 4740:   852:         print("11. Retour au menu principal")
 4741:   853:         print("="*60)
 4742:   854:
 4743:   855:         choice = input("\nVotre choix (1-11): ").strip()
 4744:   856:
 4745:   857:         if choice == "1":
 4746:   858:             new_name = input(f"Nouveau PROJECT_NAME [{config.get('PROJECT_NAME')}]: ").strip()
 4747:   859:             if new_name:
 4748:   860:                 config.config["PROJECT_NAME"] = new_name
 4749:   861:
 4750:   862:         elif choice == "2":
 4751:   863:             new_path = input(f"Nouveau PROJECT_PATH [{config.get('PROJECT_PATH')}]: ").strip()
 4752:   864:             if new_path:
 4753:   865:                 config.config["PROJECT_PATH"] = new_path
 4754:   866:
 4755:   867:         elif choice == "3":
 4756:   868:             new_user = input(f"Nouveau GITHUB_USERNAME [{config.get('GITHUB_USERNAME')}]: ").strip()
 4757:   869:             if new_user:
 4758:   870:                 config.config["GITHUB_USERNAME"] = new_user
 4759:   871:
 4760:   872:         elif choice == "4":
 4761:   873:             new_repo = input(f"Nouveau GITHUB_REPO_NAME [{config.get('GITHUB_REPO_NAME')}]: ").strip()
 4762:   874:             if new_repo:
 4763:   875:                 config.config["GITHUB_REPO_NAME"] = new_repo
 4764:   876:

 4766:   878:             new_token = input("Nouveau GITHUB_TOKEN (ENTER pour effacer): ").strip()
 4767:   879:             config.config["GITHUB_TOKEN"] = new_token
 4768:   880:
 4769:   881:         elif choice == "6":
 4770:   882:             print(f"\nEXCLUDE_PATTERNS actuel:")
 4771:   883:             for i, pattern in enumerate(config.get('EXCLUDE_PATTERNS', [])[:10], 1):
 4772:   884:                 print(f"  {i}. {pattern}")
 4773:   885:             if len(config.get('EXCLUDE_PATTERNS', [])) > 10:
 4774:   886:                 print(f"  ... et {len(config.get('EXCLUDE_PATTERNS', [])) - 10} autres")
 4775:   887:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 4776:   888:
 4777:   889:         elif choice == "7":
 4778:   890:             print(f"\nEXCLUDE_DIRS actuel:")
 4779:   891:             for i, dir_name in enumerate(config.get('EXCLUDE_DIRS', [])[:10], 1):
 4780:   892:                 print(f"  {i}. {dir_name}")
 4781:   893:             if len(config.get('EXCLUDE_DIRS', [])) > 10:
 4782:   894:                 print(f"  ... et {len(config.get('EXCLUDE_DIRS', [])) - 10} autres")
 4783:   895:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 4784:   896:
 4785:   897:         elif choice == "8":
 4786:   898:             print(f"\nINCLUDE_PATTERNS actuel:")
 4787:   899:             for i, pattern in enumerate(config.get('INCLUDE_PATTERNS', [])[:10], 1):
 4788:   900:                 print(f"  {i}. {pattern}")
 4789:   901:             if len(config.get('INCLUDE_PATTERNS', [])) > 10:
 4790:   902:                 print(f"  ... et {len(config.get('INCLUDE_PATTERNS', [])) - 10} autres")
 4791:   903:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 4792:   904:
 4793:   905:         elif choice == "9":
 4794:   906:             test_github_connection(config)
 4795:   907:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 4796:   908:
 4797:   909:         elif choice == "10":
 4798:   910:             try:
 4799:   911:                 with open(config.config_path, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
 4800:   912:                     json.dump(config.config, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False)
 4801:   913:                 print("‚úì Configuration sauvegard√©e!")
 4802:   914:             except Exception as e:
 4803:   915:                 print(f"‚úó Erreur sauvegarde: {e}")
 4804:   916:             input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour continuer...")
 4805:   917:
 4806:   918:         elif choice == "11":
 4807:   919:             break
 4808:   920:
 4809:   921: def test_github_connection(config):
 4810:   922:     """Teste la connexion √† l'API GitHub"""
 4811:   923:     print("\n" + "="*60)
 4812:   924:     print("TEST CONNEXION GITHUB")
 4813:   925:     print("="*60)
 4814:   926:
 4815:   927:     token = config.get("GITHUB_TOKEN")
 4816:   928:     if not token or token.strip() == "":
 4817:   929:         print("‚úó Token GitHub non configur√©")
 4818:   930:         return
 4819:   931:
 4820:   932:     headers = {
 4821:   933:         "Authorization": f"token {token}",
 4822:   934:         "Accept": "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
 4823:   935:     }
 4824:   936:
 4825:   937:     try:
 4826:   938:         response = requests.get("https://api.github.com/user", headers=headers)
 4827:   939:
 4828:   940:         if response.status_code == 200:
 4829:   941:             user_data = response.json()
 4830:   942:             print(f"‚úÖ Connexion r√©ussie!")
 4831:   943:             print(f"   Utilisateur: {user_data.get('login')}")
 4832:   944:             print(f"   Nom: {user_data.get('name', 'Non d√©fini')}")
 4833:   945:             print(f"   Email: {user_data.get('email', 'Non d√©fini')}")
 4834:   946:
 4835:   947:             # Tester les permissions
 4836:   948:             print("\nüîç Test des permissions...")
 4837:   949:
 4838:   950:             # Tester permission gist
 4839:   951:             try:
 4840:   952:                 gist_response = requests.post("https://api.github.com/gists",
 4841:   953:                                             headers=headers,
 4842:   954:                                             json={"description": "Test", "public": False, "files": {"test.txt": {"content": "test"}}})
 4843:   955:                 if gist_response.status_code in [201, 401, 403]:
 4844:   956:                     print(f"   Permission gist: {'‚úÖ' if gist_response.status_code == 201 else '‚úó'}")
 4845:   957:             except:
 4846:   958:                 print("   Permission gist: ‚úó")
 4847:   959:
 4848:   960:         else:
 4849:   961:             print(f"‚úó Erreur connexion: {response.status_code}")
 4850:   962:             print(f"   Message: {response.text}")
 4851:   963:
 4852:   964:     except Exception as e:
 4853:   965:         print(f"‚úó Erreur r√©seau: {e}")
 4854:   966:
 4855:   967: # ============================================================================
 4856:   968: # POINT D'ENTR√âE
 4857:   969: # ============================================================================
 4858:   970:
 4859:   971: if __name__ == "__main__":
 4860:   972:     print("\n" + "="*60)
 4861:   973:     print("SHARE GITHUB V7 - Python Version")
 4862:   974:     print("="*60)
 4863:   975:
 4864:   976:     # Charger la configuration
 4865:   977:     config = Config()

 4868:   980:         main_menu(config)
 4869:   981:     except KeyboardInterrupt:

 4873:   985:         import traceback
 4874:   986:         traceback.print_exc()
 4875:   987:         input("\nAppuyez sur ENTER pour quitter...")

 4951:    44: # 2. Cr√©er le fichier de versions
 4952:    45: Write-Host "`n2. CREATION DU FICHIER DE VERSIONS..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
 4953:    46: $versions = @{
 4954:    47:     timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
 4955:    48:     system = @{
 4956:    49:         os = "Windows $( [System.Environment]::OSVersion.Version.ToString())"
 4957:    50:         powershell = $PSVersionTable.PSVersion.ToString()
 4958:    51:     }
 4959:    52:     tools = @{}
 4960:    53:     python = @{}
 4961:    54:     node = @{}
 4962:    55:     blockchain = @{}
 4963:    56:     agents = @{}
 4964:    57: }
 4965:    58:
 4966:    59: # R√©cup√©rer les versions des outils
 4967:    60: try { $versions.tools.git = (git --version 2>&1).ToString().Replace('git version ', '').Trim() } catch { $versions.tools.git = "N/A" }
 4968:    61: try { $versions.tools.docker = (docker --version 2>&1).ToString().Replace('Docker version ', '').Split(',')[0].Trim() } catch { $versions.tools.docker = "N/A" }
 4969:    62:
 4970:    63: # R√©cup√©rer les versions Python
 4971:    64: try {
 4972:    65:     $pythonVersion = (python --version 2>&1).ToString().Replace('Python ', '').Trim()
 4973:    66:     $versions.python.version = $pythonVersion
 4974:    67:
 4975:    68:     # Packages Python
 4976:    69:     $pythonPackages = @("langchain", "chromadb", "requests", "web3", "aiohttp")
 4977:    70:     foreach ($pkg in $pythonPackages) {
 4978:    71:         try {
 4979:    72:             $version = python -c "import $pkg; print(getattr($pkg, '__version__', 'N/A'))" 2>$null
 4980:    73:             if (-not $version -or $version -eq "N/A") {
 4981:    74:                 $version = pip show $pkg 2>$null | Select-String "Version:" | ForEach-Object { $_.ToString().Replace('Version: ', '').Trim() }
 4982:    75:             }
 4983:    76:             $versions.python.$pkg = $version
 4984:    77:         } catch {
 4985:    78:             $versions.python.$pkg = "N/A"
 4986:    79:         }
 4987:    80:     }
 4988:    81: } catch { $versions.python.version = "N/A" }
 4989:    82:
 4990:    83: # R√©cup√©rer les versions Node.js
 4991:    84: try {
 4992:    85:     $nodeVersion = (node --version 2>&1).ToString().Replace('v', '').Trim()
 4993:    86:     $versions.node.version = $nodeVersion
 4994:    87:
 4995:    88:     # Packages Node.js globaux
 4996:    89:     $nodePackages = @("npm", "yarn", "hardhat", "typescript", "next")
 4997:    90:     foreach ($pkg in $nodePackages) {
 4998:    91:         try {
 4999:    92:             if ($pkg -eq "npm") {
 5000:    93:                 $version = (npm --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim()
 5001:    94:             } elseif ($pkg -eq "next") {
 5002:    95:                 $version = (npx next --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim()
 5003:    96:             } else {
 5004:    97:                 $version = (npx $pkg --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim()
 5005:    98:             }
 5006:    99:             $versions.node.$pkg = $version
 5007:   100:         } catch {
 5008:   101:             $versions.node.$pkg = "N/A"
 5009:   102:         }
 5010:   103:     }
 5011:   104: } catch { $versions.node.version = "N/A" }
 5012:   105:
 5013:   106: # R√©cup√©rer les versions blockchain
 5014:   107: try { $versions.blockchain.foundry = (forge --version 2>&1 | Select-String "forge").ToString().Split(' ')[1].Trim() } catch { $versions.blockchain.foundry = "N/A" }
 5015:   108: try { $versions.blockchain.slither = (slither --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim() } catch { $versions.blockchain.slither = "N/A" }
 5016:   109: try { $versions.blockchain.anvil = (anvil --version 2>&1).ToString().Trim() } catch { $versions.blockchain.anvil = "N/A" }
 5017:   110:

 5417:   510:
