 6544:    59:     if ($versions.system) {
 6545:    60:         Write-Host "     OS: $($versions.system.os)" -ForegroundColor White
 6546:    61:         Write-Host "     PowerShell: $($versions.system.powershell)" -ForegroundColor White
 6547:    62:     }
 6548:    63:
 6549:    64:     Write-Host "   üìä Versions outils:" -ForegroundColor Gray
 6550:    65:     if ($versions.tools) {
 6551:    66:         foreach ($tool in $versions.tools.PSObject.Properties) {
 6552:    67:             Write-Host "     $($tool.Name): $($tool.Value)" -ForegroundColor White
 6553:    68:         }
 6554:    69:     }
 6555:    70: } else {
 6556:    71:     Write-Host "   ‚ùå Fichier de versions non trouv√©" -ForegroundColor Red
 6557:    72: }
 6558:    73:
 6559:    74: # 4. V√©rifier les d√©pendances Python
 6560:    75: Write-Host "`n4. VERIFICATION DEPENDANCES PYTHON..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
 6561:    76: try {
 6562:    77:     & "$projectPath\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1"
 6563:    78:
 6564:    79:     # V√©rifier les packages critiques
 6565:    80:     $criticalPackages = @("langchain", "chromadb", "web3", "fastapi", "pydantic")
 6566:    81:     foreach ($pkg in $criticalPackages) {
 6567:    82:         try {
 6568:    83:             $version = python -c "import $pkg; print(getattr($pkg, '__version__', 'N/A'))" 2>$null
 6569:    84:             if ($version -and $version -ne "N/A") {
 6570:    85:                 Write-Host "   ‚úÖ $pkg: $version" -ForegroundColor Green
 6571:    86:             } else {
 6572:    87:                 Write-Host "   ‚ö†Ô∏è  $pkg: Version non d√©tect√©e" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 6573:    88:             }
 6574:    89:         } catch {
 6575:    90:             Write-Host "   ‚ùå $pkg: Non install√©" -ForegroundColor Red
 6576:    91:         }
 6577:    92:     }
 6578:    93: } catch {
 6579:    94:     Write-Host "   ‚ö†Ô∏è  Impossible d'activer l'environnement virtuel" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 6580:    95: }
 6581:    96:
 6582:    97: # 5. V√©rifier Ollama
 6583:    98: Write-Host "`n5. VERIFICATION OLLAMA..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
 6584:    99: try {
 6585:   100:     $ollamaStatus = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "http://localhost:11434/api/tags" -TimeoutSec 3
 6586:   101:     $modelCount = $ollamaStatus.models.Count
 6587:   102:     Write-Host "   ‚úÖ Ollama en ligne: $modelCount mod√®les charg√©s" -ForegroundColor Green
 6588:   103:
 6589:   104:     # V√©rifier les mod√®les requis
 6590:   105:     $requiredModels = @("deepseek-coder:6.7b", "llama3.2:3b", "mistral:7b")
 6591:   106:     foreach ($model in $requiredModels) {
 6592:   107:         if ($ollamaStatus.models | Where-Object { $_.name -eq $model }) {
 6593:   108:             Write-Host "     ‚úÖ $model" -ForegroundColor Green
 6594:   109:         } else {
 6595:   110:             Write-Host "     ‚ö†Ô∏è  $model non charg√©" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 6596:   111:         }
 6597:   112:     }
 6598:   113: } catch {
 6599:   114:     Write-Host "   ‚ùå Ollama hors ligne" -ForegroundColor Red
 6600:   115:     Write-Host "   Lancez 'ollama serve' dans un terminal" -ForegroundColor White
 6601:   116: }
 6602:   117:
 6603:   118: # 6. G√©n√©rer le rapport final
 6604:   119: Write-Host "`n6. RAPPORT FINAL..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
 6605:   120: $report = @{
 6606:   121:     timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
 6607:   122:     project_path = $projectPath
 6608:   123:     verification = @{
 6609:   124:         agents_total = $expectedAgents.Count
 6610:   125:         agents_found = $expectedAgents.Count - $missingAgents.Count
 6611:   126:         agents_missing = $missingAgents
 6612:   127:         structure_ok = ($missingAgents.Count -eq 0)
 6613:   128:         versions_ok = (Test-Path $versionsFile)
 6614:   129:         python_deps_ok = $true  # √Ä affiner selon les v√©rifications
 6615:   130:         ollama_ok = $false
 6616:   131:     }
 6617:   132:     next_steps = @(
 6618:   133:         "1. V√©rifier que tous les agents sont pr√©sents",
 6619:   134:         "2. Configurer Ollama avec les mod√®les requis",
 6620:   135:         "3. Tester le pipeline avec: python test_all_agents.py",
 6621:   136:         "4. Consulter les logs dans: logs\",
 6622:   137:         "5. Personnaliser les configurations dans agents\"
 6623:   138:     )
 6624:   139: }
 6625:   140:
 6626:   141: $report | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10 | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\reports\verification_report.json" -Force
 6627:   142:
 6628:   143: Write-Host "`n" + "="*60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
 6629:   144: Write-Host "üìä RAPPORT DE VERIFICATION" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 6630:   145: Write-Host "="*60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
 6631:   146: Write-Host ""
 6632:   147: Write-Host "Agents trouv√©s: $($report.verification.agents_found)/$($report.verification.agents_total)" -ForegroundColor White
 6633:   148: Write-Host "Structure: $(if($report.verification.structure_ok) {'‚úÖ'} else {'‚ùå'})" -ForegroundColor $(if($report.verification.structure_ok) {'Green'} else {'Red'})
 6634:   149: Write-Host "Versions: $(if($report.verification.versions_ok) {'‚úÖ'} else {'‚ùå'})" -ForegroundColor $(if($report.verification.versions_ok) {'Green'} else {'Red'})
 6635:   150: Write-Host "Ollama: $(if($report.verification.ollama_ok) {'‚úÖ'} else {'‚ùå'})" -ForegroundColor $(if($report.verification.ollama_ok) {'Green'} else {'Red'})
 6636:   151: Write-Host ""
 6637:   152: Write-Host "üìÅ Rapport d√©taill√©: reports\verification_report.json" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 6638:   153: Write-Host ""
 6639:   154: Write-Host "üéØ PROCHAINES ETAPES:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 6640:   155: foreach ($step in $report.next_steps) {
 6641:   156:     Write-Host "  $step" -ForegroundColor White
 6642:   157: }
 6643:   158: Write-Host ""
 6644:   159: Write-Host "‚úÖ VERIFICATION TERMINEE" -ForegroundColor Green
 6645: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 6646: 
 6647: SCRIPT 14 | _NxShareSplit1M.ps1
 6648: Size: 40749 bytes | Type: .ps1 | Modified: 2026-01-29 20:06:55.567666
 6649: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 6650:     1: # ShareSplit1M_Complete.ps1
 6651:     2: # ============================================================================
 6652:     3: # CONFIGURATION
 6653:     4: # ============================================================================
 6654:     5: # Lecture de la configuration
 6655:     6: $configPath = ".\..\project_config.json"
 6656:     7: if (Test-Path $configPath) {
 6657:     8:     $config = Get-Content $configPath -Raw | ConvertFrom-Json
 6658:     9:     $PROJECT_NAME = $config.PROJECT_NAME
 6659:    10:     $PROJECT_PATH = $config.PROJECT_PATH
 6660:    11:     $GITHUB_TOKEN = $config.GITHUB_TOKEN
 6661:    12:     $GITHUB_USERNAME = $config.GITHUB_USERNAME
 6662:    13:     $GITHUB_REPO_NAME = $config.GITHUB_REPO_NAME
 6663:    14:     $GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE = $config.GITHUB_REPO_PRIVATE
 6664:    15:     $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION = $config.GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION
 6665:    16: } else {
 6666:    17:     Write-Host "Fichier de configuration non trouv√©." -ForegroundColor Red
 6667:    18:     exit 1
 6668:    19: }
 6669:    20:
 6670:    21: # ============================================================================
 6671:    22: # FONCTION POUR TROUVER LES FICHIERS SOURCES DU PROJET
 6672:    23: # ============================================================================
 6673:    24: function Get-SourceFiles {
 6674:    25:     param(
 6675:    26:         [string]$BasePath = "."
 6676:    27:     )
 6677:    28:
 6678:    29:     Write-Host "Recherche des fichiers sources du projet..." -NoNewline
 6679:    30:
 6680:    31:     # Obtenir le chemin absolu du projet
 6681:    32:     $projectRoot = Resolve-Path $BasePath
 6682:    33:
 6683:    34:     # D√©finir les extensions de fichiers sources
 6684:    35:     $sourceExtensions = @(
 6685:    36:         '.ps1', '.psm1', '.psd1',         # PowerShell
 6686:    37:         '.py',                            # Python
 6687:    38:         '.js', '.jsx', '.ts', '.tsx',     # JavaScript/TypeScript
 6688:    39:         '.vue', '.svelte',                # Frameworks JS
 6689:    40:         '.html', '.htm', '.css', '.scss', '.sass', '.less', # Web
 6690:    41:         '.json', '.xml', '.yaml', '.yml', '.toml', # Configurations
 6691:    42:         '.md', '.txt', '.rst',            # Documentation
 6692:    43:         '.cs', '.java', '.cpp', '.c', '.h', '.hpp', # Langages compil√©s
 6693:    44:         '.go', '.rs', '.rb', '.php',      # Autres langages
 6694:    45:         '.sql', '.psql',                  # Bases de donn√©es
 6695:    46:         '.dockerfile',                    # Docker
 6696:    47:         '.gitignore', '.gitattributes',   # Git
 6697:    48:         '.env.example', '.env.sample',    # Environnement (exemples)
 6698:    49:         '.config', '.ini', '.cfg',        # Configuration
 6699:    50:         '.bat', '.cmd', '.sh', '.bash',   # Scripts shell
 6700:    51:         '.csproj', '.sln', '.vcxproj'     # Projets Visual Studio
 6701:    52:     )
 6702:    53:
 6703:    54:     # Dossiers √† exclure
 6704:    55:     $excludeDirs = @(
 6705:    56:         '.git',
 6706:    57:         'node_modules',
 6707:    58:         '.vscode',
 6708:    59:         '.idea',
 6709:    60:         '__pycache__',
 6710:    61:         'bin',
 6711:    62:         'obj',
 6712:    63:         'Debug',
 6713:    64:         'Release',
 6714:    65:         'dist',
 6715:    66:         'build',
 6716:    67:         'out',
 6717:    68:         'coverage',
 6718:    69:         '.vs',
 6719:    70:         '.cache',
 6720:    71:         '.next',
 6721:    72:         '.angular',
 6722:    73:         '.nuget',
 6723:    74:         '.sonarlint',
 6724:    75:         '.svn',
 6725:    76:         '.hg',
 6726:    77:         'PROJECT_SHARE_*',
 6727:    78:         'GISTS_INDEX_*',
 6728:    79:         'GITHUB_PUBLISH_*'
 6729:    80:     )
 6730:    81:
 6731:    82:     # Fichiers √† exclure
 6732:    83:     $excludeFiles = @(
 6733:    84:         'project_config.json',
 6734:    85:         '.env',
 6735:    86:         '.env.local',
 6736:    87:         'desktop.ini',
 6737:    88:         'Thumbs.db',
 6738:    89:         '.DS_Store',
 6739:    90:         '*.log',
 6740:    91:         '*.tmp',
 6741:    92:         '*.temp',
 6742:    93:         '*.bak',
 6743:    94:         '*.backup',
 6744:    95:         '*.exe',
 6745:    96:         '*.dll',
 6746:    97:         '*.so',
 6747:    98:         '*.dylib',
 6748:    99:         'package-lock.json',
 6749:   100:         'yarn.lock',
 6750:   101:         'pnpm-lock.yaml'
 6751:   102:     )
 6752:   103:
 6753:   104:     # Rechercher tous les fichiers
 6754:   105:     $allFiles = Get-ChildItem -Path $projectRoot -File -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
 6755:   106:
 6756:   107:     # Filtrer les fichiers sources
 6757:   108:     $sourceFiles = @()
 6758:   109:
 6759:   110:     foreach ($file in $allFiles) {
 6760:   111:         $filePath = $file.FullName
 6761:   112:         $relativePath = $filePath.Substring($projectRoot.Path.Length + 1)
 6762:   113:         $fileName = $file.Name
 6763:   114:         $fileExt = [System.IO.Path]::GetExtension($fileName).ToLower()
 6764:   115:
 6765:   116:         # V√©rifier si le fichier est dans un dossier exclu
 6766:   117:         $inExcludedDir = $false
 6767:   118:         foreach ($excludeDir in $excludeDirs) {
 6768:   119:             if ($relativePath -like "*\$excludeDir\*" -or $relativePath.StartsWith("$excludeDir\")) {
 6769:   120:                 $inExcludedDir = $true
 6770:   121:                 break
 6771:   122:             }
 6772:   123:         }
 6773:   124:
 6774:   125:         if ($inExcludedDir) {
 6775:   126:             continue
 6776:   127:         }
 6777:   128:
 6778:   129:         # V√©rifier si le fichier est exclu par nom
 6779:   130:         $isExcludedFile = $false
 6780:   131:         foreach ($excludeFile in $excludeFiles) {
 6781:   132:             if ($excludeFile.StartsWith('*.')) {
 6782:   133:                 if ($fileExt -eq $excludeFile.Substring(1)) {
 6783:   134:                     $isExcludedFile = $true
 6784:   135:                     break
 6785:   136:                 }
 6786:   137:             } elseif ($fileName -eq $excludeFile) {
 6787:   138:                 $isExcludedFile = $true
 6788:   139:                 break
 6789:   140:             }
 6790:   141:         }
 6791:   142:
 6792:   143:         if ($isExcludedFile) {
 6793:   144:             continue
 6794:   145:         }
 6795:   146:
 6796:   147:         # V√©rifier si c'est un fichier source (par extension)
 6797:   148:         if ($sourceExtensions -contains $fileExt) {
 6798:   149:             $sourceFiles += @{
 6799:   150:                 File = $file
 6800:   151:                 Path = $relativePath
 6801:   152:                 FullPath = $filePath
 6802:   153:                 Extension = $fileExt
 6803:   154:             }
 6804:   155:         }
 6805:   156:     }
 6806:   157:
 6807:   158:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 6808:   159:     Write-Host "  Fichiers sources trouv√©s: $($sourceFiles.Count)" -ForegroundColor Green
 6809:   160:
 6810:   161:     return $sourceFiles
 6811:   162: }
 6812:   163:
 6813:   164: # ============================================================================
 6814:   165: # FONCTION POUR LIRE UN FICHIER AVEC NUM√âROS DE LIGNE (pour le fichier unique)
 6815:   166: # ============================================================================
 6816:   167: function Get-FileContentForSingleFile {
 6817:   168:     param(
 6818:   169:         [string]$FilePath,
 6819:   170:         [string]$RelativePath
 6820:   171:     )
 6821:   172:
 6822:   173:     try {
 6823:   174:         # Lire le contenu du fichier
 6824:   175:         $content = Get-Content -Path $FilePath -Raw -Encoding UTF8 -ErrorAction Stop
 6825:   176:
 6826:   177:         # Ajouter les num√©ros de ligne
 6827:   178:         $lines = $content -split "`n"
 6828:   179:         $numberedContent = ""
 6829:   180:
 6830:   181:         for ($i = 0; $i -lt $lines.Count; $i++) {
 6831:   182:             $lineNum = $i + 1
 6832:   183:             $numberedContent += "${lineNum}: $($lines[$i])`n"
 6833:   184:         }
 6834:   185:
 6835:   186:         return $numberedContent
 6836:   187:
 6837:   188:     } catch {
 6838:   189:         return "ERREUR: Impossible de lire le fichier $RelativePath`n$($_.Exception.Message)"
 6839:   190:     }
 6840:   191: }
 6841:   192:
 6842:   193: # ============================================================================
 6843:   194: # FONCTION POUR G√âN√âRER UN SEUL FICHIER LOCAL AVEC TOUS LES SOURCES
 6844:   195: # ============================================================================
 6845:   196: function Generate-LocalSingleFile {
 6846:   197:     param(
 6847:   198:         [string]$Description = ""
 6848:   199:     )
 6849:   200:
 6850:   201:     Write-Host "`n=== G√âN√âRATION D'UN FICHIER UNIQUE AVEC TOUS LES SOURCES ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 6851:   202:
 6852:   203:     # S'assurer d'√™tre dans le bon r√©pertoire
 6853:   204:     $currentDir = Get-Location
 6854:   205:     $projectDir = Resolve-Path $PROJECT_PATH -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
 6855:   206:
 6856:   207:     if ($currentDir.Path -ne $projectDir.Path) {
 6857:   208:         Write-Host "ERREUR: Vous devez √™tre dans le dossier du projet!" -ForegroundColor Red
 6858:   209:         Write-Host "Ex√©cutez: cd '$PROJECT_PATH'" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 6859:   210:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Mauvais r√©pertoire" }
 6860:   211:     }
 6861:   212:
 6862:   213:     # Obtenir les fichiers sources
 6863:   214:     $sourceFiles = Get-SourceFiles -BasePath $currentDir
 6864:   215:
 6865:   216:     if ($sourceFiles.Count -eq 0) {
 6866:   217:         Write-Host "‚ùå Aucun fichier source trouv√©" -ForegroundColor Red
 6867:   218:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Aucun fichier source" }
 6868:   219:     }
 6869:   220:
 6870:   221:     # Utiliser la description du projet si aucune fournie
 6871:   222:     if (-not $Description) {
 6872:   223:         $Description = $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION
 6873:   224:     }
 6874:   225:
 6875:   226:     # Cr√©er un seul fichier de sortie
 6876:   227:     $timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyyMMdd_HHmmss"
 6877:   228:     $outputFile = "PROJECT_SOURCES_$timestamp.txt"
 6878:   229:
 6879:   230:     Write-Host "Cr√©ation du fichier unique: $outputFile" -ForegroundColor Green
 6880:   231:     Write-Host "Lecture de $($sourceFiles.Count) fichiers sources..." -NoNewline
 6881:   232:
 6882:   233:     # Cr√©er le contenu du fichier unique
 6883:   234:     $fileContent = "=" * 100 + "`n"
 6884:   235:     $fileContent += "PROJET: $PROJECT_NAME`n"
 6885:   236:     $fileContent += "DESCRIPTION: $Description`n"
 6886:   237:     $fileContent += "DATE: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')`n"
 6887:   238:     $fileContent += "FICHIERS SOURCES: $($sourceFiles.Count)`n"
 6888:   239:     $fileContent += "=" * 100 + "`n`n"
 6889:   240:
 6890:   241:     $processedFiles = 0
 6891:   242:     $totalLines = 0
 6892:   243:
 6893:   244:     # Parcourir tous les fichiers sources
 6894:   245:     foreach ($sourceFile in $sourceFiles | Sort-Object { $_.Path }) {
 6895:   246:         $relativePath = $sourceFile.Path
 6896:   247:         $fileName = $sourceFile.File.Name
 6897:   248:
 6898:   249:         # Ajouter l'en-t√™te du fichier
 6899:   250:         $fileContent += "=" * 80 + "`n"
 6900:   251:         $fileContent += "FICHIER: $fileName`n"
 6901:   252:         $fileContent += "CHEMIN: $relativePath`n"
 6902:   253:         $fileContent += "TAILLE: $([math]::Round($sourceFile.File.Length/1024, 2)) KB`n"
 6903:   254:         $fileContent += "=" * 80 + "`n`n"
 6904:   255:
 6905:   256:         # Lire le contenu du fichier avec num√©ros de ligne
 6906:   257:         $fileLines = Get-FileContentForSingleFile -FilePath $sourceFile.FullPath -RelativePath $relativePath
 6907:   258:
 6908:   259:         # Compter les lignes
 6909:   260:         $lineCount = ($fileLines -split "`n").Count
 6910:   261:         $totalLines += $lineCount
 6911:   262:
 6912:   263:         # Ajouter le contenu au fichier unique
 6913:   264:         $fileContent += $fileLines
 6914:   265:         $fileContent += "`n"  # Espace entre les fichiers
 6915:   266:
 6916:   267:         $processedFiles++
 6917:   268:
 6918:   269:         # Afficher la progression
 6919:   270:         if ($processedFiles % 10 -eq 0) {
 6920:   271:             Write-Host " ($processedFiles/$($sourceFiles.Count))..." -NoNewline
 6921:   272:         }
 6922:   273:     }
 6923:   274:
 6924:   275:     # Ajouter les statistiques √† la fin
 6925:   276:     $fileContent += "`n" + "=" * 100 + "`n"
 6926:   277:     $fileContent += "STATISTIQUES FINALES`n"
 6927:   278:     $fileContent += "=" * 100 + "`n"
 6928:   279:     $fileContent += "Fichiers trait√©s: $processedFiles`n"
 6929:   280:     $fileContent += "Lignes totales: $totalLines`n"
 6930:   281:     $fileContent += "Date de g√©n√©ration: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')`n"
 6931:   282:
 6932:   283:     # Statistiques par extension
 6933:   284:     $extStats = $sourceFiles | Group-Object Extension | Sort-Object Count -Descending
 6934:   285:     $fileContent += "`nR√âPARTITION PAR EXTENSION:`n"
 6935:   286:     foreach ($stat in $extStats) {
 6936:   287:         $extName = if ($stat.Name) { $stat.Name } else { "(sans extension)" }
 6937:   288:         $fileContent += "  - $extName: $($stat.Count) fichiers`n"
 6938:   289:     }
 6939:   290:
 6940:   291:     $fileContent += "=" * 100 + "`n"
 6941:   292:
 6942:   293:     # √âcrire le fichier unique
 6943:   294:     $fileContent | Out-File $outputFile -Encoding UTF8
 6944:   295:
 6945:   296:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 6946:   297:     Write-Host "`n‚úÖ FICHIER UNIQUE CR√â√â AVEC SUCC√àS !" -ForegroundColor Green
 6947:   298:
 6948:   299:     # Afficher les informations du fichier
 6949:   300:     $fileInfo = Get-Item $outputFile
 6950:   301:     $fileSize = if ($fileInfo.Length -lt 1024) { "$($fileInfo.Length) B" }
 6951:   302:                 elseif ($fileInfo.Length -lt 1048576) { "$([math]::Round($fileInfo.Length/1KB, 2)) KB" }
 6952:   303:                 else { "$([math]::Round($fileInfo.Length/1MB, 2)) MB" }
 6953:   304:
 6954:   305:     Write-Host "üìÑ Fichier cr√©√©: $outputFile" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 6955:   306:     Write-Host "üìä Taille: $fileSize" -ForegroundColor Gray
 6956:   307:     Write-Host "üìÅ Fichiers sources inclus: $processedFiles" -ForegroundColor Gray
 6957:   308:     Write-Host "üìà Lignes totales: $totalLines" -ForegroundColor Gray
 6958:   309:
 6959:   310:     # Aper√ßu du contenu (premi√®res 10 lignes)
 6960:   311:     Write-Host "`nüìã APER√áU DU CONTENU (premi√®res 10 lignes):" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 6961:   312:     Get-Content $outputFile -TotalCount 10 | ForEach-Object { Write-Host "  $_" -ForegroundColor Gray }
 6962:   313:
 6963:   314:     if ($totalLines > 10) {
 6964:   315:         Write-Host "  ... ($($totalLines - 10) lignes suppl√©mentaires)" -ForegroundColor Gray
 6965:   316:     }
 6966:   317:
 6967:   318:     return @{
 6968:   319:         success = $true
 6969:   320:         output_file = $outputFile
 6970:   321:         file_size = $fileInfo.Length
 6971:   322:         file_size_human = $fileSize
 6972:   323:         source_files = $sourceFiles
 6973:   324:         files_count = $processedFiles
 6974:   325:         total_lines = $totalLines
 6975:   326:     }
 6976:   327: }
 6977:   328:
 6978:   329: # ============================================================================
 6979:   330: # FONCTION POUR LIRE UN FICHIER AVEC NUM√âROS DE LIGNE (pour Gists)
 6980:   331: # ============================================================================
 6981:   332: function Get-FileContentWithLineNumbers {
 6982:   333:     param(
 6983:   334:         [string]$FilePath,
 6984:   335:         [string]$RelativePath
 6985:   336:     )
 6986:   337:
 6987:   338:     try {
 6988:   339:         # Lire le contenu du fichier
 6989:   340:         $content = Get-Content -Path $FilePath -Raw -Encoding UTF8 -ErrorAction Stop
 6990:   341:
 6991:   342:         # Ajouter les num√©ros de ligne
 6992:   343:         $lines = $content -split "`n"
 6993:   344:         $numberedContent = ""
 6994:   345:
 6995:   346:         for ($i = 0; $i -lt $lines.Count; $i++) {
 6996:   347:             $lineNum = $i + 1
 6997:   348:             $numberedContent += "${lineNum}: $($lines[$i])`n"
 6998:   349:         }
 6999:   350:
 7000:   351:         # Ajouter l'en-t√™te avec le chemin du fichier
 7001:   352:         $header = "=" * 80 + "`n"
 7002:   353:         $header += "FICHIER: $RelativePath`n"
 7003:   354:         $header += "=" * 80 + "`n`n"
 7004:   355:
 7005:   356:         return $header + $numberedContent
 7006:   357:
 7007:   358:     } catch {
 7008:   359:         return "ERREUR: Impossible de lire le fichier $RelativePath`n$($_.Exception.Message)"
 7009:   360:     }
 7010:   361: }
 7011:   362:
 7012:   363: # ============================================================================
 7013:   364: # FONCTION POUR CR√âER DES GISTS AVEC CONTENU DES FICHIERS
 7014:   365: # ============================================================================
 7015:   366: function Create-SourceGists {
 7016:   367:     param(
 7017:   368:         [string]$Token,
 7018:   369:         [string]$Username,
 7019:   370:         [string]$Description,
 7020:   371:         [array]$SourceFiles
 7021:   372:     )
 7022:   373:
 7023:   374:     Write-Host "`n=== CR√âATION DES GISTS ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 7024:   375:
 7025:   376:     if ($SourceFiles.Count -eq 0) {
 7026:   377:         Write-Host "‚ùå Aucun fichier source √† publier" -ForegroundColor Red
 7027:   378:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Aucun fichier source" }
 7028:   379:     }
 7029:   380:
 7030:   381:     # Trier les fichiers par taille (du plus gros au plus petit)
 7031:   382:     $sortedFiles = $SourceFiles | Sort-Object { $_.File.Length } -Descending
 7032:   383:
 7033:   384:     # Limite de taille par Gist : 1 Go
 7034:   385:     $maxGistSize = 1GB
 7035:   386:
 7036:   387:     Write-Host "Organisation des fichiers dans les Gists..." -NoNewline
 7037:   388:
 7038:   389:     # Algorithme de bin packing
 7039:   390:     $gistBuckets = @()
 7040:   391:
 7041:   392:     foreach ($sourceFile in $sortedFiles) {
 7042:   393:         $fileSize = $sourceFile.File.Length
 7043:   394:
 7044:   395:         # Ajouter une estimation pour les num√©ros de ligne (environ 10% suppl√©mentaire)
 7045:   396:         $estimatedSize = [math]::Round($fileSize * 1.1)
 7046:   397:
 7047:   398:         # Trouver un Gist existant o√π ce fichier peut rentrer
 7048:   399:         $placed = $false
 7049:   400:         for ($i = 0; $i -lt $gistBuckets.Count; $i++) {
 7050:   401:             $currentBucketSize = $gistBuckets[$i].size
 7051:   402:             if (($currentBucketSize + $estimatedSize) -le $maxGistSize) {
 7052:   403:                 $gistBuckets[$i].files += $sourceFile
 7053:   404:                 $gistBuckets[$i].size += $estimatedSize
 7054:   405:                 $placed = $true
 7055:   406:                 break
 7056:   407:             }
 7057:   408:         }
 7058:   409:
 7059:   410:         # Si le fichier n'a pas pu √™tre plac√©, cr√©er un nouveau Gist
 7060:   411:         if (-not $placed) {
 7061:   412:             $gistBuckets += @{
 7062:   413:                 files = @($sourceFile)
 7063:   414:                 size = $estimatedSize
 7064:   415:             }
 7065:   416:         }
 7066:   417:     }
 7067:   418:
 7068:   419:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 7069:   420:     Write-Host "  Nombre de Gists n√©cessaires: $($gistBuckets.Count)" -ForegroundColor Gray
 7070:   421:
 7071:   422:     # Cr√©er les Gists
 7072:   423:     $createdGists = @()
 7073:   424:     for ($i = 0; $i -lt $gistBuckets.Count; $i++) {
 7074:   425:         $bucket = $gistBuckets[$i]
 7075:   426:         $gistNumber = $i + 1
 7076:   427:
 7077:   428:         Write-Host "Cr√©ation Gist $gistNumber/$($gistBuckets.Count)..." -NoNewline
 7078:   429:         $gistResult = Create-GistFromSourceFiles -Token $Token -Username $Username `
 7079:   430:             -Description $Description -SourceFiles $bucket.files -GistNumber $gistNumber
 7080:   431:
 7081:   432:         if ($gistResult.success) {
 7082:   433:             Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 7083:   434:             $createdGists += $gistResult
 7084:   435:         } else {
 7085:   436:             Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
 7086:   437:             Write-Host "  Erreur: $($gistResult.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
 7087:   438:         }
 7088:   439:     }
 7089:   440:
 7090:   441:     # Filtrer les Gists r√©ussis
 7091:   442:     $successfulGists = $createdGists | Where-Object { $_.success }
 7092:   443:
 7093:   444:     # Afficher les r√©sultats
 7094:   445:     if ($successfulGists.Count -gt 0) {
 7095:   446:         Write-Host "`n‚úÖ GISTS CR√â√âS AVEC SUCC√àS !" -ForegroundColor Green
 7096:   447:
 7097:   448:         $gistUrls = @()
 7098:   449:         $totalFiles = 0
 7099:   450:
 7100:   451:         foreach ($gist in $successfulGists) {
 7101:   452:             Write-Host "üîó Gist $($gist.gist_number): $($gist.gist_url)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 7102:   453:             Write-Host "   Fichiers: $($gist.files_published)" -ForegroundColor Gray
 7103:   454:             $gistUrls += $gist.gist_url
 7104:   455:             $totalFiles += $gist.files_published
 7105:   456:         }
 7106:   457:
 7107:   458:         # Cr√©er un fichier d'index avec tous les liens
 7108:   459:         $timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyyMMdd_HHmmss"
 7109:   460:         $indexFile = "GISTS_INDEX_$timestamp.txt"
 7110:   461:
 7111:   462:         $indexContent = "=" * 80 + "`n"
 7112:   463:         $indexContent += "INDEX DES GISTS - $PROJECT_NAME`n"
 7113:   464:         $indexContent += "=" * 80 + "`n"
 7114:   465:         $indexContent += "Date: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')`n"
 7115:   466:         $indexContent += "Projet: $PROJECT_NAME`n"
 7116:   467:         $indexContent += "Description: $Description`n"
 7117:   468:         $indexContent += "Total Gists: $($successfulGists.Count)`n"
 7118:   469:         $indexContent += "Total fichiers sources: $totalFiles`n"
 7119:   470:         $indexContent += "`n" + "=" * 80 + "`n"
 7120:   471:         $indexContent += "LIENS DES GISTS:`n"
 7121:   472:         $indexContent += "=" * 80 + "`n`n"
 7122:   473:
 7123:   474:         foreach ($gist in $successfulGists) {
 7124:   475:             $indexContent += "GIST #$($gist.gist_number):`n"
 7125:   476:             $indexContent += "URL: $($gist.gist_url)`n"
 7126:   477:             $indexContent += "Fichiers inclus ($($gist.files_published)):`n"
 7127:   478:
 7128:   479:             foreach ($fileInfo in $gist.file_list) {
 7129:   480:                 $indexContent += "  - $($fileInfo.path)`n"
 7130:   481:             }
 7131:   482:
 7132:   483:             $indexContent += "`n"
 7133:   484:         }
 7134:   485:
 7135:   486:         $indexContent += "=" * 80 + "`n"
 7136:   487:         $indexContent += "STATISTIQUES:`n"
 7137:   488:         $indexContent += "=" * 80 + "`n"
 7138:   489:         $indexContent += "- Fichiers sources totaux: $($SourceFiles.Count)`n"
 7139:   490:         $indexContent += "- Gists cr√©√©s: $($successfulGists.Count)`n"
 7140:   491:         $indexContent += "- Fichiers publi√©s: $totalFiles`n"
 7141:   492:
 7142:   493:         # Statistiques par extension
 7143:   494:         $extStats = $SourceFiles | Group-Object Extension | Sort-Object Count -Descending
 7144:   495:         $indexContent += "`nR√©partition par extension:`n"
 7145:   496:         foreach ($stat in $extStats) {
 7146:   497:             $indexContent += "  - $($stat.Name): $($stat.Count) fichiers`n"
 7147:   498:         }
 7148:   499:
 7149:   500:         $indexContent += "=" * 80 + "`n"
 7150:   501:
 7151:   502:         $indexContent | Out-File $indexFile -Encoding UTF8
 7152:   503:         Write-Host "`nüìÑ Fichier d'index cr√©√©: $indexFile" -ForegroundColor Green
 7153:   504:
 7154:   505:         return @{
 7155:   506:             success = $true
 7156:   507:             gist_urls = $gistUrls
 7157:   508:             total_gists = $successfulGists.Count
 7158:   509:             index_file = $indexFile
 7159:   510:             total_files = $totalFiles
 7160:   511:             gist_details = $successfulGists
 7161:   512:         }
 7162:   513:
 7163:   514:     } else {
 7164:   515:         Write-Host "‚ùå Aucun Gist cr√©√©" -ForegroundColor Red
 7165:   516:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Aucun Gist cr√©√©" }
 7166:   517:     }
 7167:   518: }
 7168:   519:
 7169:   520: # ============================================================================
 7170:   521: # FONCTION POUR CR√âER UN GIST √Ä PARTIR DE FICHIERS SOURCES
 7171:   522: # ============================================================================
 7172:   523: function Create-GistFromSourceFiles {
 7173:   524:     param(
 7174:   525:         [string]$Token,
 7175:   526:         [string]$Username,
 7176:   527:         [string]$Description,
 7177:   528:         [array]$SourceFiles,
 7178:   529:         [int]$GistNumber
 7179:   530:     )
 7180:   531:
 7181:   532:     # Pr√©parer les fichiers pour l'API GitHub
 7182:   533:     $filesObject = @{}
 7183:   534:     $fileList = @()
 7184:   535:
 7185:   536:     foreach ($sourceFile in $SourceFiles) {
 7186:   537:         $fileName = $sourceFile.File.Name
 7187:   538:         $relativePath = $sourceFile.Path
 7188:   539:
 7189:   540:         # Lire le contenu avec num√©ros de ligne
 7190:   541:         $contentWithLines = Get-FileContentWithLineNumbers -FilePath $sourceFile.FullPath -RelativePath $relativePath
 7191:   542:
 7192:   543:         # Cr√©er un nom de fichier pour le Gist (incluant le chemin)
 7193:   544:         $gistFileName = $relativePath -replace '[\\/]', '_'
 7194:   545:         $gistFileName = $gistFileName -replace '[^\w\.\-]', '_'
 7195:   546:
 7196:   547:         $filesObject[$gistFileName] = @{ content = $contentWithLines }
 7197:   548:         $fileList += @{ name = $fileName; path = $relativePath; gist_name = $gistFileName }
 7198:   549:     }
 7199:   550:
 7200:   551:     if ($filesObject.Count -eq 0) {
 7201:   552:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Aucun fichier √† publier" }
 7202:   553:     }
 7203:   554:
 7204:   555:     # Description du Gist
 7205:   556:     $gistDescription = "$Description - $PROJECT_NAME - Part $GistNumber ($($SourceFiles.Count) fichiers)"
 7206:   557:
 7207:   558:     # Pr√©parer le corps de la requ√™te
 7208:   559:     $body = @{
 7209:   560:         description = $gistDescription
 7210:   561:         public = $false
 7211:   562:         files = $filesObject
 7212:   563:     } | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10
 7213:   564:
 7214:   565:     try {
 7215:   566:         $headers = @{
 7216:   567:             "Authorization" = "token $Token"
 7217:   568:             "Accept" = "application/vnd.github.v3+json"
 7218:   569:             "Content-Type" = "application/json"
 7219:   570:         }
 7220:   571:
 7221:   572:         $response = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://api.github.com/gists" `
 7222:   573:             -Method Post `
 7223:   574:             -Headers $headers `
 7224:   575:             -Body $body `
 7225:   576:             -TimeoutSec 30
 7226:   577:
 7227:   578:         # Cr√©er un fichier d'index local pour ce Gist
 7228:   579:         $timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyyMMdd_HHmmss"
 7229:   580:         $gistIndexFile = "GIST_${GistNumber}_${timestamp}.txt"
 7230:   581:
 7231:   582:         $gistIndexContent = "=" * 80 + "`n"
 7232:   583:         $gistIndexContent += "GIST #$GistNumber - $PROJECT_NAME`n"
 7233:   584:         $gistIndexContent += "=" * 80 + "`n"
 7234:   585:         $gistIndexContent += "URL: $($response.html_url)`n"
 7235:   586:         $gistIndexContent += "ID: $($response.id)`n"
 7236:   587:         $gistIndexContent += "Description: $gistDescription`n"
 7237:   588:         $gistIndexContent += "Fichiers: $($SourceFiles.Count)`n"
 7238:   589:         $gistIndexContent += "`n" + "=" * 80 + "`n"
 7239:   590:         $gistIndexContent += "LISTE DES FICHIERS:`n"
 7240:   591:         $gistIndexContent += "=" * 80 + "`n`n"
 7241:   592:
 7242:   593:         foreach ($fileInfo in $fileList) {
 7243:   594:             $gistIndexContent += "Fichier: $($fileInfo.path)`n"
 7244:   595:             $gistIndexContent += "Nom dans Gist: $($fileInfo.gist_name)`n"
 7245:   596:             $gistIndexContent += "-" * 40 + "`n"
 7246:   597:         }
 7247:   598:
 7248:   599:         $gistIndexContent | Out-File $gistIndexFile -Encoding UTF8
 7249:   600:
 7250:   601:         return @{
 7251:   602:             success = $true
 7252:   603:             gist_url = $response.html_url
 7253:   604:             gist_id = $response.id
 7254:   605:             files_published = $SourceFiles.Count
 7255:   606:             gist_number = $GistNumber
 7256:   607:             file_list = $fileList
 7257:   608:             index_file = $gistIndexFile
 7258:   609:         }
 7259:   610:
 7260:   611:     } catch {
 7261:   612:         $errorMsg = "Erreur API GitHub"
 7262:   613:         if ($_.Exception.Response) {
 7263:   614:             $stream = $_.Exception.Response.GetResponseStream()
 7264:   615:             $reader = New-Object System.IO.StreamReader($stream)
 7265:   616:             $responseBody = $reader.ReadToEnd()
 7266:   617:             $reader.Close()
 7267:   618:
 7268:   619:             try {
 7269:   620:                 $errorDetails = $responseBody | ConvertFrom-Json
 7270:   621:                 $errorMsg = "GitHub: $($errorDetails.message)"
 7271:   622:             } catch {
 7272:   623:                 $errorMsg = "Erreur HTTP: $($_.Exception.Message)"
 7273:   624:             }
 7274:   625:         }
 7275:   626:
 7276:   627:         return @{
 7277:   628:             success = $false
 7278:   629:             error = $errorMsg
 7279:   630:             gist_number = $GistNumber
 7280:   631:         }
 7281:   632:     }
 7282:   633: }
 7283:   634:
 7284:   635: # ============================================================================
 7285:   636: # FONCTION POUR PUBLIER SUR GITHUB REPOSITORY
 7286:   637: # ============================================================================
 7287:   638: function Publish-ToGitHubRepo {
 7288:   639:     param(
 7289:   640:         [string]$Token,
 7290:   641:         [string]$Username,
 7291:   642:         [string]$RepoName,
 7292:   643:         [string]$Description,
 7293:   644:         [bool]$IsPrivate
 7294:   645:     )
 7295:   646:
 7296:   647:     Write-Host "`n=== PUBLICATION SUR GITHUB REPOSITORY ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 7297:   648:
 7298:   649:     # V√©rifier que nous sommes dans le bon r√©pertoire
 7299:   650:     Write-Host "V√©rification du r√©pertoire..." -NoNewline
 7300:   651:     $currentDir = Get-Location
 7301:   652:     $projectDir = Resolve-Path $PROJECT_PATH -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
 7302:   653:
 7303:   654:     if ($currentDir.Path -ne $projectDir.Path) {
 7304:   655:         Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
 7305:   656:         Write-Host "ERREUR: Vous devez √™tre dans le dossier du projet!" -ForegroundColor Red
 7306:   657:         Write-Host "Actuel: $currentDir" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 7307:   658:         Write-Host "Projet: $projectDir" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 7308:   659:         Write-Host "Ex√©cutez: cd '$PROJECT_PATH'" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 7309:   660:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Mauvais r√©pertoire" }
 7310:   661:     }
 7311:   662:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 7312:   663:
 7313:   664:     # V√©rifier le token
 7314:   665:     if ([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($Token) -or $Token -notmatch "^ghp_[a-zA-Z0-9]{36,}$") {
 7315:   666:         Write-Host "‚ùå Token invalide ou manquant" -ForegroundColor Red
 7316:   667:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Token GitHub invalide" }
 7317:   668:     }
 7318:   669:
 7319:   670:     # V√©rifier que Git est install√©
 7320:   671:     try {
 7321:   672:         git --version | Out-Null
 7322:   673:     } catch {
 7323:   674:         Write-Host "‚ùå Git non install√©" -ForegroundColor Red
 7324:   675:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Git non install√©" }
 7325:   676:     }
 7326:   677:
 7327:   678:     # Obtenir les fichiers sources
 7328:   679:     $sourceFiles = Get-SourceFiles -BasePath $currentDir
 7329:   680:     if ($sourceFiles.Count -eq 0) {
 7330:   681:         Write-Host "‚ùå Aucun fichier source trouv√©" -ForegroundColor Red
 7331:   682:         return @{ success = $false; error = "Aucun fichier source" }
 7332:   683:     }
 7333:   684:
 7334:   685:     Write-Host "Fichiers √† publier: $($sourceFiles.Count)" -ForegroundColor Gray
 7335:   686:
 7336:   687:     # Nettoyer la configuration Git
 7337:   688:     Write-Host "Nettoyage Git..." -NoNewline
 7338:   689:     git config --global --unset credential.helper 2>$null
 7339:   690:     git config --global credential.helper "" 2>$null
 7340:   691:     Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 7341:   692:
 7342:   693:     try {
 7343:   694:         # Initialiser Git si n√©cessaire
 7344:   695:         if (-not (Test-Path ".git")) {
 7345:   696:             Write-Host "Initialisation Git..." -NoNewline
 7346:   697:             git init
 7347:   698:             Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 7348:   699:         } else {
 7349:   700:             Write-Host "‚úì Git d√©j√† initialis√©" -ForegroundColor Gray
 7350:   701:         }
 7351:   702:
 7352:   703:         # Configurer Git
 7353:   704:         Write-Host "Configuration Git..." -NoNewline
 7354:   705:         git config user.name "$Username"
 7355:   706:         git config user.email "$Username@users.noreply.github.com"
 7356:   707:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 7357:   708:
 7358:   709:         # Cr√©er .gitignore si n√©cessaire
 7359:   710:         if (-not (Test-Path ".gitignore")) {
 7360:   711:             $gitignoreContent = @"
 7361:   712: # Fichiers g√©n√©r√©s
 7362:   713: PROJECT_SHARE_*
 7363:   714: GISTS_INDEX_*
 7364:   715: GITHUB_PUBLISH_*
 7365:   716:
 7366:   717: # Fichiers sensibles
 7367:   718: project_config.json
 7368:   719: .env
 7369:   720: .env.local
 7370:   721:
 7371:   722: # Dossiers syst√®me
 7372:   723: node_modules/
 7373:   724: .vscode/
 7374:   725: .idea/
 7375:   726: __pycache__/
 7376:   727: bin/
 7377:   728: obj/
 7378:   729: dist/
 7379:   730: build/
 7380:   731: out/
 7381:   732: coverage/
 7382:   733: "@
 7383:   734:             $gitignoreContent | Out-File ".gitignore" -Encoding UTF8
 7384:   735:         }
 7385:   736:
 7386:   737:         # Pr√©parer l'URL avec le token
 7387:   738:         $remoteUrl = "https://x-access-token:${Token}@github.com/${Username}/${RepoName}.git"
 7388:   739:         Write-Host "Remote: https://github.com/${Username}/${RepoName}" -ForegroundColor Gray
 7389:   740:
 7390:   741:         # G√©rer le remote
 7391:   742:         git remote remove origin 2>$null
 7392:   743:         git remote add origin $remoteUrl
 7393:   744:
 7394:   745:         # Ajouter tous les fichiers
 7395:   746:         Write-Host "Ajout fichiers..." -NoNewline
 7396:   747:         git add .
 7397:   748:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 7398:   749:
 7399:   750:         # Commit
 7400:   751:         Write-Host "Commit..." -NoNewline
 7401:   752:         $commitMsg = "$Description - $PROJECT_NAME - Publication: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')"
 7402:   753:         git commit -m $commitMsg --quiet
 7403:   754:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 7404:   755:
 7405:   756:         # Cr√©er la branche main
 7406:   757:         Write-Host "Branche..." -NoNewline
 7407:   758:         git branch -M main
 7408:   759:         Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 7409:   760:
 7410:   761:         # Push vers GitHub
 7411:   762:         Write-Host "Push vers GitHub..." -NoNewline
 7412:   763:         $env:GIT_TERMINAL_PROMPT = "0"
 7413:   764:
 7414:   765:         $pushOutput = git push -u origin main 2>&1
 7415:   766:
 7416:   767:         if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) {
 7417:   768:             if ($pushOutput -match "failed to push some refs" -or $pushOutput -match "unrelated histories" -or $pushOutput -match "non-fast-forward") {
 7418:   769:                 Write-Host " (tentative avec --force)..." -NoNewline -ForegroundColor Yellow
 7419:   770:                 $pushOutput = git push -u origin main --force 2>&1
 7420:   771:             }
 7421:   772:         }
 7422:   773:
 7423:   774:         if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
 7424:   775:             Write-Host " ‚úì" -ForegroundColor Green
 7425:   776:             Write-Host "‚úÖ PUBLICATION R√âUSSIE !" -ForegroundColor Green
 7426:   777:             Write-Host "üîó https://github.com/$Username/$RepoName" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 7427:   778:
 7428:   779:             # Cr√©er un fichier d'index local
 7429:   780:             $timestamp = Get-Date -Format "yyyyMMdd_HHmmss"
 7430:   781:             $indexFile = "GITHUB_PUBLISH_$timestamp.txt"
 7431:   782:
 7432:   783:             $indexContent = @"
 7433:   784: ==========================================
 7434:   785: GITHUB REPOSITORY PUBLICATION
 7435:   786: ==========================================
 7436:   787: Date: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
 7437:   788: Projet: $PROJECT_NAME
 7438:   789: Repository: https://github.com/$Username/$RepoName
 7439:   790: Description: $Description
 7440:   791: Fichiers publi√©s: $($sourceFiles.Count)
 7441:   792:
 7442:   793: D√âTAILS:
 7443:   794: - Description: $Description - $PROJECT_NAME
 7444:   795: - Date: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
 7445:   796: - Nombre de fichiers: $($sourceFiles.Count)
 7446:   797: ==========================================
 7447:   798: "@
 7448:   799:
 7449:   800:             $indexContent | Out-File $indexFile -Encoding UTF8
 7450:   801:             Write-Host "üìÑ Fichier cr√©√©: $indexFile" -ForegroundColor Green
 7451:   802:
 7452:   803:             return @{
 7453:   804:                 success = $true
 7454:   805:                 repo_url = "https://github.com/$Username/$RepoName"
 7455:   806:                 index_file = $indexFile
 7456:   807:                 message = "Publication r√©ussie"
 7457:   808:                 files_count = $sourceFiles.Count
 7458:   809:             }
 7459:   810:         } else {
 7460:   811:             Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
 7461:   812:             $errorMsg = "Erreur Git"
 7462:   813:             if ($pushOutput -match "Authentication failed") {
 7463:   814:                 $errorMsg = "Token invalide - Reg√©n√©rez-le sur GitHub"
 7464:   815:             } elseif ($pushOutput -match "Repository not found") {
 7465:   816:                 $errorMsg = "Repository non trouv√© - Cr√©ez-le d'abord sur GitHub"
 7466:   817:             } elseif ($pushOutput -match "GH013" -or $pushOutput -match "secret") {
 7467:   818:                 $errorMsg = "GitHub a bloqu√© le push (secret d√©tect√©) - Autorisez-le sur GitHub"
 7468:   819:             } else {
 7469:   820:                 $errorMsg = "Erreur: $($pushOutput | Select-Object -First 2)"
 7470:   821:             }
 7471:   822:             Write-Host "‚ùå $errorMsg" -ForegroundColor Red
 7472:   823:             return @{
 7473:   824:                 success = $false
 7474:   825:                 error = $errorMsg
 7475:   826:                 git_output = $pushOutput
 7476:   827:             }
 7477:   828:         }
 7478:   829:     } catch {
 7479:   830:         Write-Host " ‚úó" -ForegroundColor Red
 7480:   831:         Write-Host "‚ùå Erreur inattendue: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
 7481:   832:         return @{
 7482:   833:             success = $false
 7483:   834:             error = $_.Exception.Message
 7484:   835:         }
 7485:   836:     }
 7486:   837: }
 7487:   838:
 7488:   839: # ============================================================================
 7489:   840: # MENU PRINCIPAL
 7490:   841: # ============================================================================
 7491:   842: function Show-MainMenu {
 7492:   843:     Clear-Host
 7493:   844:     Write-Host ""
 7494:   845:     Write-Host "=" * 60 -ForegroundColor Cyan
 7495:   846:     Write-Host "SHARE SPLIT 1M - $PROJECT_NAME" -ForegroundColor Cyan

 7498:   849:     Write-Host "=== MENU PRINCIPAL ===" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 7499:   850:     Write-Host "1. Publier sur GitHub Repository" -ForegroundColor Green
 7500:   851:     Write-Host "2. Cr√©er des Gists avec fichiers sources (lignes num√©rot√©es)" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 7501:   852:     Write-Host "3. G√©n√©rer un fichier unique avec tous les sources (lignes num√©rot√©es)" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 7502:   853:     Write-Host "4. Quitter" -ForegroundColor Red

 7506:   857:     switch ($choice) {
 7507:   858:         '1' {
 7508:   859:             Write-Host "`n=== PUBLICATION GITHUB REPOSITORY ===" -ForegroundColor Cyan

 7511:   862:             if (-not $GITHUB_TOKEN -or $GITHUB_TOKEN -eq "*** REMOVED FOR SECURITY ***") {
 7512:   863:                 Write-Host "üîë TOKEN GITHUB REQUIS" -ForegroundColor Yellow
 7513:   864:                 Write-Host "Collez votre token GitHub (commence par 'ghp_'):"
 7514:   865:                 $GITHUB_TOKEN = Read-Host
 7515:   866:             }
 7516:   867:
 7517:   868:             # V√©rifier les autres informations
 7518:   869:             $githubUsername = $GITHUB_USERNAME
 7519:   870:             if (-not $githubUsername) {
 7520:   871:                 $githubUsername = Read-Host "Nom d'utilisateur GitHub"
 7521:   872:             }
 7522:   873:
 7523:   874:             $repoName = Read-Host "Nom du repository"
 7524:   875:
 7525:   876:             # S'assurer d'√™tre dans le bon r√©pertoire
 7526:   877:             Write-Host "`nV√©rification du r√©pertoire..." -ForegroundColor Yellow

 7529:   880:                 Write-Host "Ex√©cutez d'abord: cd '$PROJECT_PATH'" -ForegroundColor Cyan
 7530:   881:                 Read-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
 7531:   882:                 return
 7532:   883:             }
 7533:   884:
 7534:   885:             # Ex√©cuter la publication
 7535:   886:             $result = Publish-ToGitHubRepo -Token $GITHUB_TOKEN `
 7536:   887:                 -Username $githubUsername `
 7537:   888:                 -RepoName $repoName `
 7538:   889:                 -Description $GITHUB_REPO_DESCRIPTION `
 7539:   890:                 -IsPrivate $false
 7540:   891:
 7541:   892:             if ($result.success) {
 7542:   893:                 Write-Host ""
 7543:   894:                 Write-Host "‚úÖ Publication r√©ussie sur GitHub!" -ForegroundColor Green

 7547:   898:             } else {
 7548:   899:                 Write-Host ""
 7549:   900:                 Write-Host "‚ùå √âchec de la publication" -ForegroundColor Red
 7550:   901:                 Write-Host "Erreur: $($result.error)" -ForegroundColor Red
 7551:   902:             }
 7552:   903:             Write-Host ""
 7553:   904:             Read-Host "Appuyez sur Entr√©e pour continuer..."
 7554:   905:         }

 7582:   933:

 7600:   951:

 7838:    67:

 7840:    69:     """Sous-agent sp√©cialis√© en architecture cloud"""
 7841:    70:

 7843:    72:         super().__init__(config_path)
 7844:    73:         self.cloud_providers = self.config.get("capabilities", {}).get("cloud_providers", [])

 7847:    76:     async def initialize(self) -> bool:
 7848:    77:         """Initialise le sous-agent"""
 7849:    78:         self.logger.info(f"Initialisation du sous-agent Cloud Architect")
 7850:    79:         self.logger.info(f"Sp√©cialisations: {list(self.specializations.keys())}")
 7851:    80:         return True
 7852:    81:
 7853:    82:     async def design_cloud_architecture(self, requirements: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 7854:    83:         """Con√ßoit une architecture cloud"""
 7855:    84:         self.logger.info("Conception de l'architecture cloud...")
 7856:    85:
 7857:    86:         # Analyse des besoins
 7858:    87:         analysis = await self._analyze_requirements(requirements)
 7859:    88:
 7860:    89:         # S√©lection du provider
 7861:    90:         provider = await self._select_cloud_provider(requirements)
 7862:    91:
 7863:    92:         # Conception de l'architecture
 7864:    93:         architecture = await self._design_architecture(analysis, provider)
 7865:    94:
 7866:    95:         # Estimation des co√ªts
 7867:    96:         cost_estimation = await self._estimate_costs(architecture, provider)
 7868:    97:
 7869:    98:         # G√©n√©ration de la documentation
 7870:    99:         documentation = await self._generate_documentation(architecture, cost_estimation)
 7871:   100:
 7872:   101:         return {
 7873:   102:             "provider": provider,
 7874:   103:             "architecture": architecture,
 7875:   104:             "cost_estimation": cost_estimation,
 7876:   105:             "documentation": documentation,
 7877:   106:             "terraform_configs": await self._generate_terraform_configs(architecture)
 7878:   107:         }
 7879:   108:
 7880:   109:     async def _analyze_requirements(self, requirements: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 7881:   110:         """Analyse les besoins techniques"""
 7882:   111:         analysis = {
 7883:   112:             "compute_needs": self._calculate_compute_needs(requirements),
 7884:   113:             "storage_needs": self._calculate_storage_needs(requirements),
 7885:   114:             "network_needs": self._calculate_network_needs(requirements),
 7886:   115:             "security_requirements": requirements.get("security", {}),
 7887:   116:             "compliance_requirements": requirements.get("compliance", [])
 7888:   117:         }
 7889:   118:         return analysis
 7890:   119:
 7891:   120:     async def _select_cloud_provider(self, requirements: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:
 7892:   121:         """S√©lectionne le meilleur fournisseur cloud"""
 7893:   122:         # Logique de s√©lection bas√©e sur les besoins
 7894:   123:         provider_scores = {}
 7895:   124:
 7896:   125:         for provider in self.cloud_providers:
 7897:   126:             score = 0
 7898:   127:
 7899:   128:             # Score bas√© sur les besoins
 7900:   129:             if requirements.get("budget_constrained"):
 7901:   130:                 if provider in ["OVH Cloud", "Scaleway"]:
 7902:   131:                     score += 3
 7903:   132:
 7904:   133:             if requirements.get("needs_global_presence"):
 7905:   134:                 if provider in ["AWS", "GCP", "Azure"]:
 7906:   135:                     score += 2
 7907:   136:
 7908:   137:             if requirements.get("blockchain_integration"):
 7909:   138:                 if provider in ["AWS", "Azure"]:  # AWS Managed Blockchain, Azure Blockchain Service
 7910:   139:                     score += 2
 7911:   140:
 7912:   141:             provider_scores[provider] = score
 7913:   142:
 7914:   143:         # Retourne le provider avec le meilleur score
 7915:   144:         return max(provider_scores, key=provider_scores.get)
 7916:   145:
 7917:   146:     async def _design_architecture(self, analysis: Dict[str, Any], provider: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 7918:   147:         """Con√ßoit l'architecture d√©taill√©e"""
 7919:   148:         architecture = {
 7920:   149:             "provider": provider,
 7921:   150:             "compute": await self._design_compute_layer(analysis["compute_needs"], provider),
 7922:   151:             "storage": await self._design_storage_layer(analysis["storage_needs"], provider),
 7923:   152:             "network": await self._design_network_layer(analysis["network_needs"], provider),
 7924:   153:             "security": await self._design_security_layer(analysis["security_requirements"], provider),
 7925:   154:             "monitoring": await self._design_monitoring_layer(provider)
 7926:   155:         }
 7927:   156:         return architecture
 7928:   157:
 7929:   158:     async def _generate_terraform_configs(self, architecture: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 7930:   159:         """G√©n√®re les configurations Terraform"""
 7931:   160:         terraform_configs = {
 7932:   161:             "main.tf": await self._generate_main_tf(architecture),
 7933:   162:             "variables.tf": await self._generate_variables_tf(architecture),
 7934:   163:             "outputs.tf": await self._generate_outputs_tf(architecture),
 7935:   164:             "providers.tf": await self._generate_providers_tf(architecture["provider"])
 7936:   165:         }
 7937:   166:         return terraform_configs
 7938:   167:
 7939:   168:     async def execute(self, task: Dict[str, Any], context: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 7940:   169:         """Ex√©cute une t√¢che d'architecture cloud"""
 7941:   170:         task_type = task.get("type", "design_architecture")
 7942:   171:
 7943:   172:         if task_type == "design_architecture":
 7944:   173:             return await self.design_cloud_architecture(task.get("requirements", {}))
 7945:   174:         elif task_type == "cost_optimization":
 7946:   175:             return await self.optimize_costs(task.get("current_architecture", {}))
 7947:   176:         elif task_type == "security_review":
 7948:   177:             return await self.review_security(task.get("architecture", {}))
 7949:   178:         else:
 7950:   179:             return {"error": f"Type de t√¢che non support√©: {task_type}"}
 7951:   180:
 7952:   181:     async def optimize_costs(self, architecture: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 7953:   182:         """Optimise les co√ªts cloud"""
 7954:   183:         optimizations = []
 7955:   184:
 7956:   185:         # Analyse des ressources surdimensionn√©es
 7957:   186:         if architecture.get("compute", {}).get("instance_type"):
 7958:   187:             current_instance = architecture["compute"]["instance_type"]
 7959:   188:             optimized_instance = await self._suggest_optimized_instance(current_instance)
 7960:   189:             if optimized_instance != current_instance:
 7961:   190:                 optimizations.append({
 7962:   191:                     "type": "compute_optimization",
 7963:   192:                     "current": current_instance,
 7964:   193:                     "optimized": optimized_instance,
 7965:   194:                     "savings_estimate": "~30%"
 7966:   195:                 })
 7967:   196:
 7968:   197:         # Analyse du stockage
 7969:   198:         if architecture.get("storage", {}).get("type"):
 7970:   199:             storage_type = architecture["storage"]["type"]
 7971:   200:             optimized_storage = await self._suggest_optimized_storage(storage_type)
 7972:   201:             if optimized_storage != storage_type:
 7973:   202:                 optimizations.append({
 7974:   203:                     "type": "storage_optimization",
 7975:   204:                     "current": storage_type,
 7976:   205:                     "optimized": optimized_storage,
 7977:   206:                     "savings_estimate": "~40%"
 7978:   207:                 })
 7979:   208:
 7980:   209:         return {
 7981:   210:             "optimizations": optimizations,
 7982:   211:             "total_savings_estimate": await self._calculate_total_savings(optimizations)
 7983:   212:         }
 7984:   213: '@
 7985:   214:
 7986:   215: $cloudAgentCode | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\agents\architect\sous_agents\cloud_architect.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8

 8142:    77: # agents/coder/sous_agents/backend_coder.py
 8143:    78: import asyncio
 8144:    79: from typing import Dict, Any, List
 8145:    80: from pathlib import Path
 8146:    81: import yaml
 8147:    82: import json
 8148:    83: from ...shared.base_agent import BaseAgent
 8149:    84:
 8150:    85: class BackendCoderSubAgent(BaseAgent):
 8151:    86:     """Sous-agent sp√©cialis√© en d√©veloppement backend"""
 8152:    87:
 8153:    88:     def __init__(self, config_path: str):
 8154:    89:         super().__init__(config_path)
 8155:    90:         self.languages = self.config.get("capabilities", {}).get("languages", [])
 8156:    91:         self.frameworks = self._extract_frameworks()
 8157:    92:
 8158:    93:     def _extract_frameworks(self) -> Dict[str, List[str]]:
 8159:    94:         """Extrait les frameworks par langage"""
 8160:    95:         frameworks = {}
 8161:    96:         for lang_cap in self.languages:
 8162:    97:             if '(' in lang_cap:
 8163:    98:                 lang = lang_cap.split('(')[0].strip()
 8164:    99:                 framework_str = lang_cap.split('(')[1].rstrip(')')
 8165:   100:                 frameworks[lang] = [f.strip() for f in framework_str.split(',')]
 8166:   101:         return frameworks
 8167:   102:
 8168:   103:     async def initialize(self) -> bool:
 8169:   104:         """Initialise le sous-agent"""
 8170:   105:         self.logger.info(f"Initialisation du Backend Coder")
 8171:   106:         self.logger.info(f"Langages support√©s: {list(self.frameworks.keys())}")
 8172:   107:         return True
 8173:   108:
 8174:   109:     async def develop_api(self, api_spec: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 8175:   110:         """D√©veloppe une API compl√®te"""
 8176:   111:         self.logger.info(f"D√©veloppement de l'API: {api_spec.get('name', 'Unnamed API')}")
 8177:   112:
 8178:   113:         # S√©lection du stack technologique
 8179:   114:         stack = await self._select_technology_stack(api_spec)
 8180:   115:
 8181:   116:         # G√©n√©ration du code
 8182:   117:         generated_code = await self._generate_backend_code(api_spec, stack)
 8183:   118:
 8184:   119:         # Cr√©ation des tests
 8185:   120:         tests = await self._generate_tests(api_spec, stack)
 8186:   121:
 8187:   122:         # Documentation
 8188:   123:         documentation = await self._generate_documentation(api_spec, stack)
 8189:   124:
 8190:   125:         return {
 8191:   126:             "technology_stack": stack,
 8192:   127:             "generated_code": generated_code,
 8193:   128:             "tests": tests,
 8194:   129:             "documentation": documentation,
 8195:   130:             "deployment_config": await self._generate_deployment_config(stack)
 8196:   131:         }
 8197:   132:
 8198:   133:     async def _select_technology_stack(self, api_spec: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 8199:   134:         """S√©lectionne le stack technologique optimal"""
 8200:   135:         requirements = api_spec.get("requirements", {})
 8201:   136:
 8202:   137:         # Crit√®res de s√©lection
 8203:   138:         if requirements.get("high_performance"):
 8204:   139:             # Go ou Rust pour haute performance
 8205:   140:             if "Go" in self.frameworks:
 8206:   141:                 return {
 8207:   142:                     "language": "Go",
 8208:   143:                     "framework": self.frameworks["Go"][0] if self.frameworks["Go"] else "Gin",
 8209:   144:                     "database": "PostgreSQL",
 8210:   145:                     "cache": "Redis"
 8211:   146:                 }
 8212:   147:
 8213:   148:         if requirements.get("rapid_development"):
 8214:   149:             # Python ou Node.js pour d√©veloppement rapide
 8215:   150:             if "Python" in self.frameworks:
 8216:   151:                 return {
 8217:   152:                     "language": "Python",
 8218:   153:                     "framework": self.frameworks["Python"][0] if self.frameworks["Python"] else "FastAPI",
 8219:   154:                     "database": "PostgreSQL",
 8220:   155:                     "cache": "Redis"
 8221:   156:                 }
 8222:   157:
 8223:   158:         # Par d√©faut, utiliser Python
 8224:   159:         return {
 8225:   160:             "language": "Python",
 8226:   161:             "framework": "FastAPI",
 8227:   162:             "database": "PostgreSQL",
 8228:   163:             "cache": "Redis"
 8229:   164:         }
 8230:   165:
 8231:   166:     async def _generate_backend_code(self, api_spec: Dict[str, Any], stack: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 8232:   167:         """G√©n√®re le code backend"""
 8233:   168:         language = stack["language"]
 8234:   169:         framework = stack["framework"]
 8235:   170:
 8236:   171:         code_structure = {
 8237:   172:             "main_file": await self._generate_main_file(api_spec, language, framework),
 8238:   173:             "models": await self._generate_models(api_spec, language),
 8239:   174:             "routes": await self._generate_routes(api_spec, language, framework),
 8240:   175:             "services": await self._generate_services(api_spec, language),
 8241:   176:             "database": await self._generate_database_code(api_spec, stack["database"], language),
 8242:   177:             "middleware": await self._generate_middleware(api_spec, language, framework),
 8243:   178:             "config": await self._generate_config_files(language, framework)
 8244:   179:         }
 8245:   180:
 8246:   181:         return code_structure
 8247:   182:
 8248:   183:     async def _generate_tests(self, api_spec: Dict[str, Any], stack: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 8249:   184:         """G√©n√®re les tests"""
 8250:   185:         language = stack["language"]
 8251:   186:
 8252:   187:         tests = {
 8253:   188:             "unit_tests": await self._generate_unit_tests(api_spec, language),
 8254:   189:             "integration_tests": await self._generate_integration_tests(api_spec, language),
 8255:   190:             "api_tests": await self._generate_api_tests(api_spec),
 8256:   191:             "performance_tests": await self._generate_performance_tests(api_spec)
 8257:   192:         }
 8258:   193:
 8259:   194:         return tests
 8260:   195:
 8261:   196:     async def execute(self, task: Dict[str, Any], context: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 8262:   197:         """Ex√©cute une t√¢che de d√©veloppement backend"""
 8263:   198:         task_type = task.get("type", "develop_api")
 8264:   199:
 8265:   200:         if task_type == "develop_api":
 8266:   201:             return await self.develop_api(task.get("specification", {}))
 8267:   202:         elif task_type == "optimize_performance":
 8268:   203:             return await self.optimize_performance(task.get("codebase", {}))
 8269:   204:         elif task_type == "refactor_code":
 8270:   205:             return await self.refactor_code(task.get("codebase", {}))
 8271:   206:         elif task_type == "add_feature":
 8272:   207:             return await self.add_feature(task.get("feature", {}), task.get("codebase", {}))
 8273:   208:         else:
 8274:   209:             return {"error": f"Type de t√¢che non support√©: {task_type}"}
 8275:   210:
 8276:   211:     async def optimize_performance(self, codebase: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 8277:   212:         """Optimise les performances du code backend"""
 8278:   213:         optimizations = []
 8279:   214:
 8280:   215:         # Analyse des bottlenecks
 8281:   216:         bottlenecks = await self._analyze_bottlenecks(codebase)
 8282:   217:
 8283:   218:         for bottleneck in bottlenecks:
 8284:   219:             optimization = await self._generate_optimization(bottleneck)
 8285:   220:             optimizations.append(optimization)
 8286:   221:
 8287:   222:         # G√©n√©ration du code optimis√©
 8288:   223:         optimized_code = await self._apply_optimizations(codebase, optimizations)
 8289:   224:
 8290:   225:         return {
 8291:   226:             "bottlenecks_found": bottlenecks,
 8292:   227:             "optimizations_applied": optimizations,
 8293:   228:             "optimized_code": optimized_code,
 8294:   229:             "performance_gain_estimate": await self._estimate_performance_gain(optimizations)
 8295:   230:         }
 8296:   231:
 8297:   232:     async def refactor_code(self, codebase: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 8298:   233:         """Refactorise le code pour am√©liorer la qualit√©"""
 8299:   234:         refactoring_actions = []
 8300:   235:
 8301:   236:         # D√©tection des code smells
 8302:   237:         code_smells = await self._detect_code_smells(codebase)
 8303:   238:
 8304:   239:         for smell in code_smells:
 8305:   240:             refactoring = await self._generate_refactoring(smell)
 8306:   241:             refactoring_actions.append(refactoring)
 8307:   242:
 8308:   243:         # Application des refactorings
 8309:   244:         refactored_code = await self._apply_refactorings(codebase, refactoring_actions)
 8310:   245:
 8311:   246:         return {
 8312:   247:             "code_smells_found": code_smells,
 8313:   248:             "refactoring_actions": refactoring_actions,
 8314:   249:             "refactored_code": refactored_code,
 8315:   250:             "quality_metrics": await self._calculate_quality_metrics(refactored_code)
 8316:   251:         }
 8317:   252: '@
 8318:   253:
 8319:   254: $backendAgentCode | Out-File -FilePath "$projectPath\agents\coder\sous_agents\backend_coder.py" -Force -Encoding UTF8
 8320: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 8480:     1: # agents/communication/agent_messaging.py
 8481:     2: class AgentMessage:
 8482:     3:     """Format standardis√© des messages entre agents"""
 8483:     4:
 8484:     5:     def __init__(self, sender: str, receiver: str, message_type: str):
 8485:     6:         self.sender = sender
 8486:     7:         self.receiver = receiver
 8487:     8:         self.message_type = message_type
 8488:     9:         self.timestamp = datetime.now()
 8489:    10:         self.message_id = str(uuid.uuid4())
 8490:    11:
 8491:    12:     @dataclass
 8492:    13:     class Content:
 8493:    14:         task_id: str
 8494:    15:         context: dict
 8495:    16:         payload: Any  # Code, test results, docs, etc.
 8496:    17:         dependencies: List[str]
 8497:    18:         priority: int = 1
 8498:    19:         requires_response: bool = True
 8499:    20:         timeout_seconds: int = 300
 8500:    21:
 8501:    22: # Types de messages support√©s
 8502:    23: MESSAGE_TYPES = {
 8503:    24:     # Code-related
 8504:    25:     "code_review_request": {"from": "coder", "to": "reviewer"},
 8505:    26:     "code_review_completed": {"from": "reviewer", "to": "coder"},
 8506:    27:     "test_execution_request": {"from": "coder", "to": "tester"},

 8508:    29:

 8515:    36:     "task_completion_notification": {"from": "any", "to": "orchestrator"},
 8516:    37:
 8517:    38:     # Quality & Security
 8518:    39:     "security_scan_request": {"from": "orchestrator", "to": "security"},
 8519:    40:     "quality_gate_failed": {"from": "tester", "to": "orchestrator"},
 8520:    41:
